translate: 날렵하고 믿음직스럽지. 튼튼한 일꾼 몇 명만 있으면 아주 훌륭해.

original: But I guess you had something more specific in mind?
translate: 하지만 좀 더 구체적인 계획이 있는 것 같군?

original: I need to sail into the Black Priory
To get off this rock, for good
Try asking me again - and a little more politely - after we've visited my lady the Queen
And when you can reassure me that the many-legged sea-bastard won't smash us into smithereens
translate: 그리고 그 다리 많은 바다 괴물이 우릴 산산조각 내지 않을 거라고 안심시켜 준다면 말이야.

original: I will
I'll ask however I please
#Chapter1MinorEncounters
Dead Sailors
Corpses litter the ground
Tragically, these sailors appear to have made it to shore only to be brutally murdered
translate: 비극적이게도, 이 선원들은 해안에 도착했지만 잔인하게 살해당한 것 같다.

original: The horrid wounds and grusome dismemberments tells you that this must have been the work of mad men
translate: 끔찍한 상처와 처참하게 절단된 시신들은 광인들의 짓임이 분명하다.

original: The work of those bloody reavers no doubt
translate: 틀림없이 그 피에 굶주린 약탈자들 짓이겠군.

original: Rolands growls
Rats
As you enter the darkened lighthouse, you spot a pair of hideously transformed creatures that must once have been rats!
translate: 어두운 등대에 들어서자 흉측하게 변해버린 생물체 두 마리가 보인다. 한때는 쥐였을 것이다!

original: They scurry off into the darkness leaving you with a pounding heart
translate: 놈들은 어둠 속으로 달아나고 당신의 심장은 쿵쿵거린다.

original: You must be carefull as you advance
#Chapter1Mistress
There are many beautiful women, elegantly and richly dressed and coiffed, mincing around the room - but one stands clearly apart
translate: 우아하고 화려하게 차려입은 많은 미녀가 방 안을 거닐고 있지만, 유독 눈에 띄는 한 사람이 있다.

original: Not because she’s somehow on another plane of beatific loveliness - quite the opposite - she’s dressed as plainly as could be considered ‘polite’, her hair is piled high - but more like a stack of bird nests than the latest court fashion
translate: 천상의 아름다움을 지녀서가 아니다. 오히려 그 반대다. '예의'를 갖췄다고 할 수 있을 정도로만 평범하게 입었고, 머리는 높게 쌓아 올렸지만 최신 궁정 유행이라기보다는 새 둥지 더미 같다.

original: It also appears she’s applied her makeup with the intention of looking as fierce as possible
translate: 화장 또한 최대한 사납게 보이려고 한 것 같다.

original: Don’t tell me” she sighs
You forgot your ball gowns
We’re not here for the party
Are you the governor’s mistress?
LEDGERS
Well, I know where keeps his ledgers
translate: 음, 그가 장부를 어디 두는지는 알아.

original: They’re either heavily forged or going to clearly show where the Imperial coin has been going
translate: 심하게 조작됐거나 제국 돈이 어디로 샜는지 명확히 보여주겠지.

original: Would that help?
PAYMENT
Yes, yes
I can easily help you liberate some of his more valuable office of state accoutrement
translate: 그의 값비싼 관직 용품들을 해방시키는 걸 쉽게 도와줄 수 있어.

original: Or, to put it in language someone such as you might understand - I can help you rob him blind
translate: 아니면 당신 같은 사람이 이해하기 쉽게 말해서, 그를 몽땅 털어먹게 도와줄 수 있다고.

original: about her
Elemai, is my name
And I prefer the term ‘consort’, but you have the truth of it
translate: '배우자'라는 말을 더 좋아하지만, 틀린 말은 아니네.

original: Well - to whom do I owe the pleasure?
I'm a mercenary
why here
And you gate-crashed our little soiree - to what, drum up business?
translate: 우리 작은 파티에 불청객으로 난입한 건 뭐, 일거리를 찾으려고?

original: Kill the governor?
Sabotage the canapes?
I need to commandeer a boat
Maybe you can help
I'm just investigating
I'm here to kill the Governor
I'm here to get you out
why boat?
Oh, I’m scandalised
To get into the Black Priory
priory
That place is both locked up tight, and yet also the source of all this...unpleasantness...if I understand correctly
translate: 거긴 꽉 잠겨 있으면서도, 내가 알기론 이 모든... 불쾌한 일들의 근원지인데.

original: We're on a rescue mission
It's a private matter
Someone needs to pay
rescuie her
What would you say to rescuing me into the bargain?
translate: 덤으로 나도 구출해 주는 건 어때?

original: I can make it worth your while
If you don't get in our way, sure
I'm going to need to ask you something first
Absolutely not
It won't be safe
ABOUT GOVERNOR
You mean, aside from the fact he’s a colossal coward, an inveterate dandy and a hopelessly profligate spender?
translate: 엄청난 겁쟁이에, 구제불능 멋쟁이에, 대책 없는 낭비가라는 사실 말고?

original: At least he lets me walk all over him
translate: 적어도 날 마음대로 하게 놔두긴 해.

original: I mean, literally - that’s his favourite - the damn pervert
translate: 말 그대로 밟고 다니게 해준다고. 그게 그 인간 취향이야. 빌어먹을 변태 같으니.

original: That's enough about him
Yes, aside from that
HAPPY?
Happy?
HAPPY?!
She laughs wildly, throwing her head back, before grabbing another fluted glass of wine from a passing servant
translate: 그녀는 머리를 뒤로 젖히며 미친 듯이 웃더니, 지나가는 하인에게서 와인 잔을 낚아챈다.

original: I live in a prison of endless, half-hearted debauchery
translate: 난 끝없이 어설픈 방탕함이라는 감옥에 살고 있어.

original: What more could a girl want?
So come with us
Did the Governor kidnap you?
Much as I’ve come to loathe him, no - I came here of my own volition
translate: 그를 혐오하게 됐지만, 아니야. 제 발로 온 거야.

original: Plan was to elevate my social standing then leave him for dust
translate: 계획은 신분 상승 좀 하고 헌신짝처럼 버리는 거였지.

original: But the light went out on that plan just as they did in Horryn
translate: 하지만 호린처럼 그 계획도 빛이 꺼져버렸어.

original: Understood
I would ask another question
THE PLAN
You mean to carve a path through our guards, crew the ship and somehow guarantee I’ll make it back to the mainland in one piece?
translate: 경비병들을 뚫고, 배에 선원을 태우고, 어떻게든 날 본토까지 안전하게 데려다주겠다는 거야?

original: Precisely
DETAILS
Then I’m in!
But - should we discuss details?
translate: 하지만 세부 사항을 논의해야 하지 않을까?

original: The Governor is still an Imperial agent after all - what's to say we won't be thrown in jail soon as set foot on the mainland?
translate: 총독은 어쨌든 제국 관리잖아. 본토에 발을 딛자마자 감옥에 갇히지 않으란 법 있어?

original: We're going to need insurance
You said you could make it worth my while?
It's not going to be an issue
QUESTIONS
You can but ask
You're not happy here?
What can you tell me about the Governor?
#Chapter1Monolith
Your eyes are drawn in by the mesmerizing spiral symbol
translate: 매혹적인 나선 문양이 당신의 눈길을 끈다.

original: For a brief moment it almost seems to shift
Driina brushes her hand across it
I've seen these spirals before
translate: 이 나선들을 전에도 본 적 있어.

original: The fishermen of Idra paint them on the prows of their boats for luck
translate: 이드라 어부들이 행운을 빌며 뱃머리에 그려 넣지.

original: Foolish superstitions
You avert your eyes and instead shift the small pile of offerings with your foot
translate: 당신은 눈을 돌리고 발로 작은 제물 더미를 툭 건드린다.

original: It occurs to you that these can't be more than a few weeks old
translate: 몇 주도 안 된 것 같다는 생각이 든다.

original: Or perhaps days?
A Standing Stone
A grim monolith rises from the rugged landscape
translate: 거친 풍경 위로 으스스한 거석이 솟아 있다.

original: Ancient and weathered, the stone must have stood here for centuries
translate: 오래되고 풍화된 이 돌은 수세기 동안 이곳에 서 있었을 것이다.

original: Painted on it are crude spiral-shaped runes and at the base of the monolith lie piles of eggshells, flowers and fishbones
translate: 돌에는 조잡한 나선형 룬 문자가 그려져 있고, 바닥에는 달걀 껍데기, 꽃, 생선 뼈가 쌓여 있다.

original: Examine closer
#Chapter1Palace_Guards
A large, stately villa set amidst sprawling gardens is ringed by a large, iron fence
translate: 넓은 정원 한가운데 자리 잡은 웅장한 저택이 거대한 철제 울타리에 둘러싸여 있다.

original: Even from this distance, you can hear the faint noise of merrymaking - and judging from the state of the gardens, this party has been going on for quite some time
translate: 이 거리에서도 왁자지껄한 소리가 희미하게 들린다. 정원 상태를 보니 파티가 꽤 오래전부터 계속된 모양이다.

original: You approach the main gate
There are two lightly armed guards - looking better suited to a pageant than a battle - looking dejected and tired
translate: 전투보다는 가장행렬에 어울릴 법한 가벼운 무장을 한 경비병 두 명이 낙심하고 지친 표정으로 서 있다.

original: One of them half-heartedly tilts his halberd - colourfully adorned with various tassels - at you as you near
translate: 그중 한 명이 다가오는 당신에게 각종 술 장식으로 화려하게 치장된 미늘창을 건성으로 기울인다.

original: Halt
Do you have an invitation?
Invitation?
To what?
You don't need to see my invitation
I have business with the Governor
Attack them
FLEE
should we really flee?
Yah
There's a refugee camp - they could really do with the help
translate: 난민 캠프가 있어. 거긴 정말 도움이 필요할 거야.

original: Do it
I'm about to raise hell in here
Your call, lads
LEMME IN
The two guards exchange glances
The guard that has so far remained silent looks pleadingly at the other
translate: 지금껏 침묵하던 경비병이 애원하는 눈빛으로 다른 경비병을 쳐다본다.

original: Music continues to waft from the villa, while stately silhouettes glide past them the wall windows
translate: 저택에서는 계속 음악이 흘러나오고, 창문 너머로 위엄 있는 실루엣들이 스쳐 지나간다.

original: I'm coming in, either way
I've got a better idea
IN
It's not worth our trouble anyway
Thanks
Wise choice
Gov Qs
Mistress?
Garrison?
The guard addressing you sighs, while his counterpart looks disinterestedly into the distance
translate: 말을 건 경비병은 한숨을 쉬고, 동료는 무관심하게 먼 곳을 바라본다.

original: Look, whatever has happened in Horryn, there’s still order here
translate: 이봐, 호린에 무슨 일이 생겼든 여긴 아직 질서가 있어.

original: And you’ll need at least some kind of reason for us to let you - an armed, and complete stranger - into the villa
translate: 무장한 낯선 사람을 저택에 들여보내려면 적어도 그럴듯한 이유는 있어야 할 거 아니야.

original: You don’t seem very...dutiful
I have urgent business with the Governor
Good luck with that
The Governor is not exactly studiously poring over paperwork these days
translate: 총독이 요즘 서류 업무에 열중하는 건 아니라서 말이야.

original: What is this 'business', anyway?
I bear word from his Chamberlain
It's between me and him
Let me through
I really don't have time for this
Times are strange, but we’re still soldiers of the Empire, with orders to keep anyone from disrupting the ball
translate: 시국이 수상하긴 해도 우린 제국 군인이야. 누구든 무도회를 방해하지 못하게 하라는 명령을 받았어.

original: And to wear these damn parade colours
translate: 그리고 이 빌어먹을 행사용 옷을 입고 있으라고도 했지.

original: Tell us who you are, and perhaps we'll consider it
Mercenaries
And I would see the governor, invitation or no
We're working for the Chamberlain
None of your business, peasant
Barris?!
He's alive?
After Horryn, we promised we'd help him
translate: 호린 사태 이후 그를 돕겠다고 약속했거든.

original: He is
He's administrating the refugee camp
BARGING IN
The second guard stands a little more to attention
translate: 두 번째 경비병이 조금 더 차렷 자세를 취한다.

original: The first one give you an appraising glance, making no disguise of his interest in your weapons
translate: 첫 번째 경비병은 당신의 무기에 대한 관심을 숨기지 않고 훑어본다.

original: I don’t want any trouble
But you’ll make it for us if you barge in
translate: 하지만 네가 밀고 들어오면 우리가 곤란해져.

original: It won't be worse than Horryn
So move
This is not normal
Can't you see that?
You’ve been to Horryn?!
Yeah and it's not pretty
Have you news?
We’ve been desperate to go...to help
But the Governor forbade it - said something about 'protecting the last bastion of Imperial rule on Idra'
translate: 하지만 총독이 금지했지. '이드라에 남은 제국 통치의 마지막 요새를 지켜야 한다'나 뭐라나.

original: What’s happening there?
translate: 거기 무슨 일이 벌어지고 있는 거야?

original: Not sure
Why didn't you go?
The GOvernor wouldn’t let us
He said it’s more important to maintain order of the ‘administrative hub’ than some ‘backwater village full of luddites.’
translate: '시대에 뒤떨어진 놈들로 가득 찬 시골 마을'보다는 '행정 중심지'의 질서를 유지하는 게 더 중요하다고 하더군.

original: You really believe that?
RULES
I mean...the Imperium still stands
We can’t just...the rules!
translate: 우린 그냥... 규칙을 어길 순 없어!

original: The old rules don't apply
Do you really trust the Governor still?
I need to know more about the situation here
SUGGESTIONS
I know what you’re getting at
Don’t think we haven’t joked about it
translate: 우리끼리 농담 삼아 얘기 안 해본 건 아니야.

original: But it's hard to know if any of us would actually go through with it
translate: 하지만 실제로 실행에 옮길 수 있을지는 모르겠어.

original: You could leave
There’s no law left on this island, trust me
translate: 이 섬에 법 따윈 남지 않았어, 믿어봐.

original: He'll bring ruin on you all
translate: 그는 너희 모두를 파멸로 이끌 거야.

original: Unless you act now
Let me in
I'll take care of everything
ABOUT THE CAMP
Refugees?
From...Horryn?
Yeah
Horryn is gone
He's...become extravagant
More so than usual
He's not left the Villa in days
He was always..eccentric, but I'm not afraid to tell you - the lads and I, we're not happy with how he's handling... whatever is going on
translate: 원래 좀... 유별나긴 했지만 솔직히 말해서, 우리 애들이랑 난 그가 지금 상황을 처리하는 방식이... 마음에 안 들어.

original: So take matters into your own hands
More about the gov
Listen to me - what you're talking about is treason
translate: 잘 들어. 네가 하는 말은 반역이야.

original: Or at least...it would be, if his mistress wasn't on board to vouch for us
translate: 적어도... 그녀가 우릴 보증해주지 않았다면 그랬겠지.

original: She's an innocent in this - I won't let her blood be on our hands
translate: 그녀는 죄가 없어. 우리 손에 그녀의 피를 묻힐 순 없다고.

original: I'll get her on side
How will I signal you?
KILL
She wears a ring
Have her send it to us via a servant if she wishes to be a part of this
translate: 그녀가 동참하길 원한다면 하인을 통해 반지를 보내라고 해.

original: I'll be going in then
What is it?
Tell me more about the Governor
What do you know about the mistress?
What's the mood among the garrison?
#Chapter1RatQueenDEFFUNCT
The lady in front of you holds herself with a disciplined ease, her chin tilted proudly up
translate: 당신 앞에 있는 여인은 턱을 당당하게 치켜들고 절제된 여유를 보인다.

original: This is clearly her kingdom - though you'd guess she'd look as confident anywhere else
translate: 이곳은 분명 그녀의 왕국이다. 하지만 그녀라면 어디서든 자신만만해 보일 것이다.

original: Now she is lounging on a “throne” made out of crates and covered in a black sail as they are hiding in a cave
translate: 지금은 동굴에 숨어 상자로 만든 '왕좌'에 검은 돛을 덮고 앉아 있지만.

original: You've seen the alternative
I hardly meant to make this festering sewer system my palace, but needs must
translate: 이 썩어가는 하수구를 궁전으로 삼을 생각은 없었지만, 어쩔 수 없었지.

original: I have more questions
I'm in
A little kingdom called ___
Or at least, it used to be - until the Empire swallowed it whole
translate: 적어도 예전엔 그랬지. 제국이 통째로 삼키기 전까진.

original: Now I'm an itinerant Queen, ruling over a few ships and fair but apparently illegal trade
translate: 지금 난 몇 척의 배와 공정하지만 불법적인 무역을 통치하는 떠돌이 여왕일 뿐이야.

original: I have further questions
I'll help you
Not overly fond
The Freythen rebels pay good coin, but more importantly they do good work
translate: 프레이마크 반란군은 보수도 좋지만, 더 중요한 건 좋은 일을 한다는 거야.

original: I feel very good about my business, but I'd feel even better doing it in broad daylight, free from the Imperial yoke
translate: 내 사업에 자부심을 느끼지만, 제국의 멍에에서 벗어나 대낮에 당당하게 할 수 있다면 더 좋겠지.

original: I would ask something else
Count me in
What's next?
I visited once, a while ago
It's a strange place
I always wondered why a place of learning - as they claim - was so well fortified
translate: 배움의 장소라면서 왜 그리 요새화되어 있는지 항상 궁금했어.

original: If you're going in - just consider what they might be trying to keep from escaping
column3: 그들이 무엇이 빠져나가지 못하게 막고 있는지 생각해 봐.

original: May I ask
Let's work together
Naturally
Find the Harbourmaster's office
Get the codebook
Bring it to me, and together we'll signal the ship and leave this sorry sewer
translate: 그걸 가져와. 함께 배에 신호를 보내고 이 구질구질한 하수구를 뜨자고.

original: Well then, what have we here?
Come to seek an audience with the Rat Queen?
Speak fast, and true
I stumbled upon this place
I've never heard of you
The Rat Queen!?
What kind of name is that?
Just so?
How curious: you're clearly not from Idra; you've not made the mistake of attacking us; you claim not to know me
I would guess you're a mercenary, seeking answers or fortune now that Horryn lies under shadow
translate: 호린이 어둠에 잠긴 지금, 답이나 재물을 찾아다니는 용병 같군.

original: Well deduced
Wrong
We intend to break into the Black Priory
Partly
Our real goal is to infiltrate the Black Priory
translate: 진짜 목표는 검은 수도원에 잠입하는 거야.

original: As it should be
Although - if you did not seek me out, how came you here?
translate: 하지만 날 찾아온 게 아니라면, 여긴 어떻게 왔지?

original: I'm investigating the fall of Horryn
Exploring
I found you by chance
It's my proper title
And if you want to stay in the good graces of myself - and my subjects here - I suggest you use, and respect it
translate: 나와 여기 내 백성들의 눈 밖에 나지 않으려면, 그 칭호를 쓰고 존중하는 게 좋을 거야.

original: I meant no disrespect
My respect is earned
You're ambitious, I like that
And maybe stupid, unless you have a boat
Well, we did have
Perhaps you could help us with that
And if we don't?
But that's not your ultimate goal, is it now?
Sharp
We need to break into the Black Priory
No
We're here to rescue someone from the Priory
The Queen leans forward, some intent you can't place glittering in her eyes
translate: 여왕이 몸을 앞으로 기울인다. 눈 속에서 알 수 없는 의도가 반짝인다.

original: That's a charming term for 'looting'
You needn't play coy with me
As long as that's all it is?
Ultimately, we're on a rescue mission to the Black Priory
We're here to retrieve a girl from the Black Priory
Ah
It seems in this loss, we are alike
What's your plan?
Any ideas how we could get a new one?
Then, by all means, try and walk through the front door
Just let me know so that I can make sure to watch
Maybe a boat makes sense
Can we charter yours?
You see, this is what I was wondering
My ships were smashed by the Leviathan - or whatever that abomination of the sea is called
column3: 아니 그 바다 괴물에게 박살이 났거든.

original: Thankully, it does not seem to venture too close to shore
translate: 다행히 그놈은 해안 가까이까진 안 오는 것 같지만.

original: There is a way we can get one though - and it's imperative that we do so quickly
translate: 하지만 배를 구할 방법이 있어. 그리고 빨리 구해야 해.

original: We have some cargo here that the Imperial Rescue Mission - slow, but inevitable - would be all too happy to confiscate, along with my liberty
translate: 여기에 제국 구조대가 기꺼이 압수해 갈 화물이 있거든. 내 자유와 함께 말이야. 구조대는 느리지만 반드시 올 테니까.

original: I can get a boat
There is one off-shore, awaiting the coded signals that I don't have, because they're stuck in a Harbourmaster's Office that's overrun by twisted creatures
translate: 앞바다에 배가 한 척 있어. 암호 신호를 기다리고 있지. 하지만 뒤틀린 괴물들이 점령한 항만 관리소장 사무실에 신호책이 있어서 신호를 못 보내고 있어.

original: If the Imperials find the signal book, it's over for me - and no ship for you
translate: 제국 놈들이 신호책을 찾으면 난 끝장이고, 너희에게 줄 배도 없어.

original: Help me get it back, and I promise we'll ferry you into the Priory before we escape with the cargo
translate: 되찾는 걸 도와줘. 그럼 화물을 싣고 도망치기 전에 너희를 수도원까지 데려다주겠다고 약속하지.

original: Might even come back to pick you up, if you survive
translate: 살아남는다면 다시 데리러 올 수도 있고.

original: I have to ask
Say no more
I applaud your enthusiasm - but I'm not so sure about your blind trust
Fine, I'll ask some questions
You want this doing, or not?
Go on?
Why are you living down here?
Where did you come from?
How do you feel about the Empire?
What do you know about the Priory?
#Chapter1Roland
Howling laughter fills the air as the mad-men charge towards you!
translate: 울부짖는 듯한 웃음소리가 허공을 가르고 광인들이 당신에게 달려든다!

original: The man licks his sore lips excitedly
You… you hear it too?
The call?
I do!
Where... or what, is it coming from?
Straining to see through the dense fog, you finally spot them
translate: 짙은 안개 속을 뚫어지게 응시하다 마침내 그들을 발견한다.

original: A group of men prowling the shoreline like carrion-eaters looking for dead flesh
translate: 시체를 찾아 헤매는 짐승들처럼 해안가를 배회하는 무리다.

original: They are unkempt and dressed in rags with bare torsos and broad shoulders adorned by a strange mixture of sailor's tattoos and crude symbols
column3: 드러난 상체와 넓은 어깨에는 선원의 문신과 조잡한 상징들이 기이하게 뒤섞여 있다.

original: They carry an assortment of cruel-looking, rusted tools turned to weapons
translate: 그들은 무기로 변한 잔인해 보이는 녹슨 도구들을 들고 있다.

original: Gibbering chatter, laughter and whimpering drifts across the fog in a steady stream, Whoever these men are, their minds are long gone
translate: 횡설수설하는 소리, 웃음소리, 훌쩍임이 안개 너머로 끊임없이 들려온다. 이들이 누구든, 제정신이 아닌 건 분명하다.

original: You sit still until a group of them passes you by
translate: 당신은 무리가 지나갈 때까지 가만히 있는다.

original: Perhaps you might be able to slip past them?
Call out to the men
Leave quietly
The spiral patterns look oddly familiar though you are certain you’ve never seen it before
translate: 나선 문양이 묘하게 낯익지만 분명 처음 보는 것이다.

original: It’s something deeper
Something primal
It draws you in!
Here - to this place
This is the beginning and the end
The Reavers notice you staring
You hear it don’t you?
The call of... what?
The men fan out and regard you with a cruel glare
translate: 남자들이 흩어지며 잔인한 눈빛으로 당신을 바라본다.

original: I’m going to enjoy this
one of them snarls as he draws a rusty dagger
translate: 한 놈이 녹슨 단검을 꺼내며 으르렁거린다.

original: I'm going to put you down like a rabid dog!
Let's be civil about this!
You see a figure, thrashing violently at something, obscured by the low fog
translate: 낮게 깔린 안개에 가려져 무언가를 격렬하게 내리치는 형체가 보인다.

original: Whatever this person is doing, it's producing loud crunching, wet squelches, and a stream of curses
translate: 그가 무엇을 하든, 으드득거리는 소리, 질척거리는 소리, 그리고 욕설이 끊임없이 들려온다.

original: Move closer
You see the scene for what it is
Roland, soaked through and spattered with ichor, is laying waste to a number of grotesque looking creatures with a piece of driftwood
translate: 흠뻑 젖고 체액으로 뒤범벅된 롤랜드가 유목 한 조각으로 기괴한 생물체들을 박살 내고 있다.

original: He snarls like a wounded beast and his eyes are black with rage
As the last of the horrid beasts falls twitching back into the shallows, Roland snaps his gaze to you - dead eyes staring at some distant point on the horizon behind you
translate: 마지막 흉측한 짐승이 경련을 일으키며 얕은 물로 쓰러지자, 롤랜드가 당신을 홱 쳐다본다. 죽은 듯한 눈동자는 당신 뒤 지평선 어딘가를 응시하고 있다.

original: Eventually, the tension drains from his muscles, and he lowers his makeshift weapon
translate: 마침내 그의 근육에서 긴장이 풀리고, 임시 무기를 내린다.

original: Thought I was carrion they did
I nearly was
I didn't think you'd make it
Seems I've got a few lives left in me, for all they're worth
translate: 아직 목숨 줄이 몇 개 남은 모양이야. 쓸모가 있을진 몰라도.

original: Roland sighs deeply and slumps down onto a nearby rock
translate: 롤랜드는 깊은 한숨을 내쉬며 근처 바위에 주저앉는다.

original: You tried to save me
You bloody idiot
Not exactly the thanks I was expecting
The mission needs you
Was half hoping I wouldn't
He looks around at the driftwood and chunks of flesh, bobbing around your ankles
translate: 그는 유목과 발목 주위에 떠다니는 살점들을 둘러본다.

original: It's about time I payed my debts
You wanted to die?
I'm counting on you to get this job done
I think it's best we part ways
translate: 각자 갈 길 가는 게 좋겠어.

original: There's no room for being a bloody hero in work like this
translate: 이런 일에 영웅 놀이 따위 설 자리는 없어.

original: It's just shit, blood, and bad men doing worse things to others
translate: 그저 똥과 피, 그리고 나쁜 놈들이 다른 사람들에게 더 나쁜 짓을 하는 것뿐이지.

original: It's about time I paid my debts
And yet, here we are
You sound like you didn't want to be saved
Spoken like a true mercenary!
There might be hope for one of us after all
translate: 우리 중 한 명에겐 희망이 있을지도 모르겠어.

original: Well, now there's work to be done
What do you mean?
As you say
But heed this: if you want to survive you need to drop the bloody heroics
translate: 하지만 명심해. 살고 싶으면 빌어먹을 영웅 놀이는 집어치워.

original: This business makes your hands dirty - and nothing gets them clean again
translate: 이 일은 손을 더럽히지. 그리고 그 무엇으로도 다시 깨끗해질 수 없어.

original: Trust me on that
Speaking of which, I suppose I still work for you
translate: 말이 나왔으니 말인데, 난 아직 자네 밑에서 일하는 거겠지.

original: We should get going
I'm counting on you
Let's get going
Roland looks out across the uncaring sea
Not many get to be my age in our line of work
translate: 우리 바닥에서 내 나이까지 사는 놈은 별로 없어.

original: The things that I've seen - that I've done
Memories like that prey upon you
Like bloody wolves circling a camp, with the fire dying out
translate: 마치 불이 꺼져가는 야영지를 맴도는 늑대 떼처럼.

original: Second you let your guard down, they pounce
Your time isn't over yet, old man
translate: 당신 시간은 아직 안 끝났어, 영감.

original: Why don't you retire?
So would you rather I'd let you die?
translate: 그래서 널 죽게 내버려 뒀어야 했다는 거야?

original: I tried, once
The quiet only made the memories louder
You wait, expecting Roland to elaborate
He merely stares blanky ahead
translate: 그는 그저 멍하니 앞을 응시할 뿐이다.

original: We need to be on our way
No I
Rolands words catch in his throat
He thinks for a moment and then looks up at you with a determined look
translate: 그는 잠시 생각하더니 결의에 찬 눈빛으로 당신을 올려다본다.

original: When my time is up, my time is up
translate: 내 때가 되면, 그때 가는 거지.

original: Do you understand?
Alright Roland
Roland nods solemnly, brushes a sticky glob of ichor off his arm, and trudges over to you
translate: 롤랜드는 엄숙하게 고개를 끄덕이고, 팔에 묻은 끈적한 체액을 털어내며 당신에게 터벅터벅 걸어온다.

original: His lips part as if to speak, but he hesitates
translate: 말하려는 듯 입술을 떼지만, 이내 망설인다.

original: Let's just go
The brute scowls at you for a moment
If that's what you want, I'm not going to stop you
Maybe I'll rest at that Lighthouse awhile
No hard feelings
On second thoughts, I'm going to need you
Roland does not seem to hear you
translate: 롤랜드는 당신의 말을 듣지 못한 것 같다.

original: Instead he is staring intently ahead
translate: 대신 그는 앞을 뚫어지게 응시하고 있다.

original: There are men in the fog
I thought I heard them earlier
I'm certain they're not from the Zephyr and I'd wager they're less than friendly
I don't care if you're itching for a fight or not, but either way - we should tread carefully
translate: 싸우고 싶어 몸이 근질거리든 아니든 상관없지만, 어쨌든 조심해서 나쁠 건 없지.

original: I don't care if you're itching for a fight or not, but either way - you should tread carefully
translate: 싸우고 싶어 몸이 근질거리든 아니든 상관없지만, 어쨌든 조심하는 게 좋을 거야.

original: Rolands slinks off into the thick fog
translate: 롤랜드는 짙은 안개 속으로 살금살금 사라진다.

original: He smiles a toothless grin
That’s the question ain’t it?
The men lower their weapons
When you’re ready, Father is waiting for you
In Horryn
Without another word the men turn and wander off into the fog
translate: 남자들은 아무 말 없이 돌아서서 안개 속으로 사라진다.

original: Soon they are gone
I’ll have you talking once I stick this knife in your gut!
translate: 네 배에 칼을 꽂아주면 술술 불게 될 거야!

original: The largest of the group steps menacingly towards you
translate: 무리의 가장 큰 놈이 위협적으로 당신에게 다가온다.

original: If it's a fight you want
Look closer at the men's tattoos
I'm here to join you!
#EvilMercs
A group of warriors dressed in drab armor with crudely painted wolf skulls on their chests
translate: 가슴에 늑대 해골이 조잡하게 그려진 칙칙한 갑옷을 입은 전사들의 무리다.

original: They are picking their way through the rocky terrain like prowling felines and you have no doubt these are killers who excel at their job
translate: 사냥하는 고양잇과 동물처럼 바위 지대를 헤쳐나가는 그들은 의심할 여지 없는 노련한 살인자들이다.

original: #IdraCostalPassCombat
Your ploy is for naught
One of the cackling cultists points in your direction and a cry of alarm goes up!
translate: 깔깔대던 광신도 중 하나가 당신 쪽을 가리키며 경보를 울린다!

original: The beast abruptly halts its feasting and eyestalks eagerly spin around
translate: 괴수는 식사를 멈추고 눈자루를 바쁘게 굴린다.

original: As it spots you, it offers a deafening roar before charging!
translate: 당신을 발견하자 귀가 먹먹할 듯한 포효를 지르며 돌진한다!

original: You carefully pick your way forwards when movement on the top of the cliffs catches your eyes
translate: 조심스럽게 앞으로 나아가던 중 절벽 꼭대기에서 움직임이 포착된다.

original: Robed and hooded figures emerge as they appear to be dragging something towards the edge of the cliff
translate: 로브를 입고 두건을 쓴 인물들이 나타나 무언가를 절벽 끝으로 끌고 가는 것 같다.

original: More of the rabid dogs
spits Roland
No doubt the same mad-men you saw earlier
To your horror you realize what the party is dragging
translate: 끔찍하게도 그들이 끌고 가는 것이 무엇인지 깨닫는다.

original: A naked man and woman, bound and gagged, are struggling desperately as they are mercilessly pushed towards the edge of the cliff
translate: 재갈이 물리고 묶인 채 벌거벗은 남녀가 절벽 끝으로 무자비하게 떠밀리며 필사적으로 저항하고 있다.

original: whispers Kat, almost too loud
We have to do something!
Terror rises in you as you understand what is about to unfold
translate: 무슨 일이 벌어질지 알기에 공포가 밀려온다.

original: You need to do something!
Look around
One of the cultists shouts and points towards the surf in elation
translate: 광신도 중 하나가 기쁨에 차 소리치며 파도 쪽을 가리킨다.

original: Utter terror fills the eyes of the moribund couple
translate: 죽음을 앞둔 남녀의 눈에 극심한 공포가 서린다.

original: You follow their gaze and turn to see, emerging from the surf, a creature of sheer horror
translate: 그들의 시선을 따라 고개를 돌리자, 파도 속에서 순수한 공포 그 자체인 생물체가 나타난다.

original: That’s the question, ain’t it?
Pincers snapping and tentacles squirming greedily
Before you can react further the cultists hurl the two naked forms from the cliffs
translate: 당신이 반응하기도 전에 광신도들은 두 나신을 절벽 아래로 던져버린다.

original: The pair impact the ground below with a sickening splat and with surprising speed, the hulking beast falls upon their remains
translate: 두 사람은 역겨운 소리를 내며 바닥에 부딪히고, 거대한 괴수가 놀라운 속도로 그들의 시신을 덮친다.

original: Standing transfixed you watch as the horror consumes the remains of the unfortunate wretches
translate: 당신은 멍하니 서서 그 끔찍한 존재가 불행한 이들의 시신을 먹어 치우는 것을 지켜본다.

original: Sickening snaps and wet pops fill the air as the creature feeds
translate: 괴물이 식사하는 동안 역겨운 뼈 부러지는 소리와 질척한 소리가 공기를 채운다.

original: All the while, the robed cultists stand swaying and chanting on the ledge above
translate: 그동안 로브를 입은 광신도들은 절벽 위에서 몸을 흔들며 주문을 외우고 있다.

original: Attack the terror
Carefully attempt to sneak away
Sink to your knees and join in the worship
You don’t dare to breathe as you slowly pick your way back the way you came
translate: 당신은 숨도 제대로 쉬지 못하고 왔던 길을 천천히 되돌아간다.

original: As soon as you feel certain you’re out of sight, panic takes over and you run as fast as you can
translate: 시야에서 벗어났다고 확신하는 순간, 공포에 질려 전력으로 달린다.

original: By the time you stop you’re utterly exhausted but at least you are still alive
translate: 멈췄을 땐 녹초가 되었지만 적어도 살아남았다.

original: Dropping to your knees, you close your eyes and begin mock-chanting
translate: 무릎을 꿇고 눈을 감은 채 숭배하는 척 주문을 외우기 시작한다.

original: Tears press on but you find that, strangely enough, words begin to take form
translate: 눈물이 차오르지만 이상하게도 말이 형체를 갖추기 시작한다.

original: Words that make sense then and there but that you will never again be able to recall
translate: 그 순간에는 이해되지만 다시는 기억해 낼 수 없는 말들.

original: A spiral burns in your mind - it calls you
A jolt passes through you and you open your eyes wide to find the horrid creature and cultists gone
translate: 전율이 흐르고 눈을 번쩍 뜨자 끔찍한 괴물과 광신도들은 사라져 있다.

original: How long were you gone?
It felt like minutes!
Or was it hours?
Days?
Nonetheless, the terror from the deep seems to have spared you
translate: 어쨌든 심연의 공포는 당신을 살려준 것 같다.

original: You rise painfully on unsteady legs and leave
translate: 당신은 휘청거리는 다리로 고통스럽게 일어나 자리를 뜬다.

original: #IdraCostalPassEnter
Said many a short-lived young fool
translate: 일찍 죽은 젊은 바보들이 흔히 그렇게 말하지.

original: Let’s just be on our bloody way!
The winding coastal road constricts as steep cliffs press in from the north
translate: 가파른 절벽이 북쪽에서 압박해 오며 구불구불한 해안 도로가 좁아진다.

original: The dense fog reduces visibility to a mere stone’s throw and you feel an uneasiness rise in your stomach
translate: 짙은 안개 때문에 시야는 돌 던지면 닿을 거리로 좁아지고

original: You swallow hard as you ponder the dangers that may lay ahead
translate: 앞에 도사리고 있을 위험을 생각하며 마른침을 삼킨다.

original: Then, as in response to your concern, a bizarre monstrous growl echoes through the cliffs ahead of you
translate: 그때 걱정에 화답이라도 하듯, 기괴하고 거대한 으르렁거림이 앞쪽 절벽에 메아리친다.

original: Frozen mid-step you scan the mists when the unmistaken stench of rotting flesh is wafted towards you
Something large and deadly lies ahead
Though you feel well armed and prepared, the creature in the mist is no doubt dangerous
translate: 무장도 잘하고 준비도 했다고 느끼지만, 안개 속의 생물은 의심할 여지 없이 위험하다.

original: Your road lies ahead but you must proceed with caution
translate: 길은 앞에 있지만 조심해서 나아가야 한다.

original: Though you do not know what lies ahead, your gut instinct tells you that you must be cautious
translate: 무엇이 있는지 모르지만, 직감이 조심해야 한다고 경고한다.

original: You wonder if perhaps for now, you would be better off spending a bit more time preparing and arming yourself?
translate: 지금은 잠시 시간을 들여 준비와 무장을 더 하는 게 낫지 않을까?

original: Roland places his hand on the hilt of his weapon as he scowls into the mist
translate: 롤랜드는 무기 자루에 손을 얹고 안개를 노려본다.

original: Keep your wits about you
I fear we may have our work cut out for us
translate: 꽤 힘든 일이 될 것 같군.

original: Whatever lies ahead I fear it is yet beyond our mettle
translate: 앞에 뭐가 있든 우리 실력으론 벅찰 것 같아.

original: What do you recommend?
I don’t need your advice old man!
Not so keen to die anymore?
translate: 이제 죽고 싶어 안달 난 게 아닌가 보군?

original: I say we forge ahead
But let’s keep our wits about us
I’m inclined to agree with the big man
Kat adds as she looks around nervously
I say we turn back for now
We need more time to prepare for whatever lies ahead
translate: 뭐가 있든 대비할 시간이 더 필요해.

original: I agree
Roland shoots you a look that is somewhere between hurt and enraged
translate: 롤랜드는 상처와 분노가 뒤섞인 눈빛으로 당신을 쳐다본다.

original: Then, as he opens his mouth to say something he’s interrupted by yet another terrible howl
translate: 그가 입을 열어 뭔가 말하려는데, 또다시 끔찍한 울음소리가 말을 끊는다.

original: Let’s just be on our way
# Chapter_1_Forest
#Chapter1ForestDeadHorse
As you finish up the grisly task you are rewarded with a large quantity of rotting horse-flesh
translate: 끔찍한 작업을 마치자 썩어가는 말 고기를 잔뜩 얻게 되었다.

original: Utterly inedible to humans but perhaps a treat for some other beastie?
translate: 사람은 도저히 먹을 수 없겠지만 다른 짐승에겐 별미일지도?

original: A dead horse
The bloated corpse has begun to fester and fat flies buzz over it
translate: 부풀어 오른 시체는 곪기 시작했고 살찐 파리들이 그 위를 윙윙거리고 있다.

original: Carve flesh from the corpse
As you begin carving up the rotting corpse, the stench of decay is nearly overwhelming
Clouds of flies swarm you and crawl over every unexposed part of your skin
translate: 파리 떼가 당신에게 몰려들어 노출된 피부 구석구석을 기어 다니기 시작한다.

original: No doubt to the insectile fiends great delight, you are overwhelmed by nausea and end up on your knees, vomiting profusely
column3: 당신은 메스꺼움을 이기지 못하고 무릎을 꿇은 채 심하게 구토하고 만다.

original: There is however only one way forward and having purged yourself adequately, you return to the work of cutting up the poor animal
column3: 속을 적당히 비워낸 당신은 불쌍한 동물을 해체하는 작업으로 돌아간다.

original: Nonetheless, you steel yourself and make good progress
translate: 그럼에도 당신은 마음을 다잡고 작업을 꽤 진척시킨다.

original: #Chapter1ForestRottenMeat
You heave large chunks of the disgusting flesh into the feeding pile
translate: 당신은 역겨운 살점 덩어리들을 먹이 더미 위로 던진다.

original: Almost immediately you hear a number of hisses from deeper inside the cave
translate: 거의 즉시 동굴 깊은 곳에서 여러 마리가 쉭쉭거리는 소리가 들린다.

original: Dinner is apparently served
Hide and observe
Slavering scaled beasts lumber into the chamber with their forked tongues greedily sampling the air
translate: 침을 흘리는 비늘 덮인 짐승들이 갈라진 혀로 탐욕스럽게 공기 맛을 보며 방으로 어슬렁거려 들어온다.

original: A feeding frenzy erupts as the pack tears into the rotting flesh
translate: 무리가 썩은 살점을 뜯어먹으며 광란의 식사 시간이 펼쳐진다.

original: Within seconds the flesh is gone and the reprehensible reptiles stagger back into the depths of the cave as the post feeding drowsiness overcomes them
column3: 포식 후의 졸음이 밀려오자 흉측한 파충류들은 동굴 깊은 곳으로 비틀거리며 돌아간다.

original: Soon hissing snores echo throughout the caves
translate: 곧 쉭쉭거리는 코골이 소리가 동굴 전체에 울려 퍼진다.

original: Perhaps the beasts will be slightly more easy to sneak past now?
translate: 이제 짐승들 몰래 지나가기가 조금 더 수월해지지 않았을까?

original: A disgusting pile of torn and rotting meat litters the floor
translate: 찢기고 썩은 고기 조각들이 역겹게 바닥에 널려 있다.

original: Despite the rancid smell assaulting your senses, it appears the two lizards were greedily gorging themselves on it
column3: 도마뱀 두 마리가 탐욕스럽게 그것을 먹어 치우고 있었던 것 같다.

original: Examine the pile more closely
Examine the area
Place the rotting horse-flesh in the pile
Judging by the number of tracks and quantity of broken bones, a large number of these creatures seem to use this area as a communal feeding ground
translate: 발자국 수와 부서진 뼈의 양으로 보아
column3: 상당히 많은 수의 생물들이 이곳을 공동 사냥터로 사용하는 것 같다.

original: Beyond that, you would rather just get away from the stench
translate: 그 외에는 그저 이 악취에서 벗어나고 싶은 마음뿐이다.

original: You’ve heard that reptiles like these tend to eat large quantities when food is readily available before waddling off to sleep for days afterwards
translate: 이런 파충류들은 먹이가 있을 때 엄청난 양을 먹어 치우고 며칠 동안 잠만 잔다는 이야기를 들은 적이 있다.

original: Perhaps this can be used to your advantage?
translate: 어쩌면 이걸 이용할 수 있지 않을까?

original: The lingering stench also gives you the impression that this particular species has a preference for rotted flesh
translate: 남아있는 악취로 보아 이 종은 썩은 고기를 선호하는 것 같다.

original: #Chapter1KataksChild
A Scream
As you make your way through the dense underbrush a terrible, inhuman scream cuts through the forest
translate: 빽빽한 덤불 숲을 헤치고 나아가는데 끔찍하고 비인간적인 비명이 숲을 가른다.

original: You instantly recognize it as the foul abomination that fled from 'Mother' Katak's cottage
translate: 당신은 즉시 그것이 '어머니' 카탁의 오두막에서 도망친 그 더러운 흉물임을 알아차린다.

original: No doubt the creature still lives
A Shadow
You stop dead in your tracks as you suddenly see a shadow in the corner of your eyes
translate: 시야 구석에 갑자기 그림자가 보이자 당신은 걸음을 멈춘다.

original: As you turn to look, it's gone
Then suddenly, an unmistakable piping sounds from behind you
translate: 그때 갑자기 등 뒤에서 그 특유의 피리 소리 같은 것이 들린다.

original: You whirl around but once again the source is gone
translate: 홱 돌아보지만 소리의 근원은 또다시 사라졌다.

original: There is no doubt however
Mother Katak's child is stalking you
translate: 어머니 카탁의 아이가 당신을 노리고 있다.

original: #Chapter1LizardCave
The temperature is noticeably higher in this chamber
translate: 이 방은 온도가 눈에 띄게 높다.

original: Strange nest-like structures cover the ground and in each of them, lies a clutch of large yellowish eggs
translate: 기이한 둥지 같은 구조물이 바닥을 덮고 있고
column3: 그 안에는 누르스름한 큰 알들이 무더기로 놓여 있다.

original: #Chapter1Witch
The old woman smiles
Why, my wonderful little greedy piglet!
translate: 어머, 우리 멋지고 욕심 많은 아기 돼지!

original: Can you believe I found him in the woods just a few days ago?
translate: 며칠 전에 숲에서 이 아이를 발견했다면 믿겠니?

original: Poor baby was starved
You found him?
In the woods?
It's a blessing from the Emperors themselves!
Now I really am a mother, just like all the women I've helped
translate: 이제 나도 내가 도와줬던 모든 여자들처럼 진짜 엄마가 됐어.

original: An inhuman scream escapes the crib
The blanket bulges, as if something much larger than a baby is moving around
translate: 담요가 불룩 튀어나온다. 마치 아기보다 훨씬 큰 무언가가 움직이는 것처럼.

original: Look in the crib
I'm leaving
NO!
He's MINE!
The old woman lunges to her feet and defiantly places herself between you and the crib
translate: 노파는 벌떡 일어나 당신과 요람 사이를 저항하듯 가로막는다.

original: The screams from the crib grow more frantic
translate: 요람에서 들려오는 비명 소리가 더욱 광란적으로 변한다.

original: Stand aside!
Listen to me
That is not a child!
She lets out a pained sound
He's just a baby!
Please, I've lost so many already, I can't lose another
column3: 난 이미 너무 많이 잃었어. 또 잃을 순 없다고.

original: I'm sorry
Push aside the old woman
You push aside the old woman to get to the crib
As you pull off the blanket you see an inhuman squirming mass of teeth, eyes and what appears to be tentacles
column3: 그리고 촉수처럼 보이는 것들이 뒤엉킨 비인간적인 덩어리가 꿈틀거리는 것이 보인다.

original: The eyes stare at you without blinking
translate: 눈들이 눈도 깜박이지 않고 당신을 쏘아본다.

original: And then the creature howls
Abomination!
Driina utters in shock
Bludgeon the thing
I'm leaving!
The horror lunges at you with inhuman speed
translate: 공포의 존재가 비인간적인 속도로 당신에게 달려든다.

original: You thrash around the cottage as it snaps at your face, until finally, you manage to smash it into the wall
translate: 놈이 얼굴을 물어뜯으려 하자 당신은 오두막 안에서 몸부림치다 마침내 벽에 처박아 버린다.

original: The screams of the abomination mix with those of the old woman as it rapidly scuttles off, up the chimney and into the woods
translate: 흉물의 비명이 노파의 비명과 섞이는가 싶더니
column3: 놈은 재빨리 굴뚝을 타고 올라가 숲으로 달아나 버린다.

original: Ohhh look at these beautiful eggs!
The crone strokes gently
They will do fine
My concoction is nearly ready!
She cracks the large eggs open and dumps the squirming contents into her cauldron
translate: 그녀는 커다란 알을 깨뜨려 꿈틀거리는 내용물을 가마솥에 쏟아붓는다.

original: Steam begins to rise and the mixture changes color to a deep crimson
translate: 증기가 피어오르고 혼합물은 짙은 진홍색으로 변한다.

original: Look what you've done!
The old woman falls to her knees and burries her face in her hands
translate: 노파는 무릎을 꿇고 두 손에 얼굴을 파묻는다.

original: Roland stares at the scene - mouth agape
translate: 롤랜드는 입을 벌린 채 그 광경을 멍하니 바라본다.

original: This is insanity!
Take the medicine and leave
The old woman begins to tremble as tears run down her cheeks
translate: 노파는 뺨 위로 눈물을 흘리며 떨기 시작한다.

original: Then a broad, manic smile twists across her face
translate: 그러다 그녀의 얼굴에 광기 어린 넓은 미소가 뒤틀리며 번진다.

original: My boy is hungry
He says I'm not enough for him anymore
The old woman pulls her robes slightly down, revealing her torso
translate: 노파는 로브를 살짝 내려 상체를 드러낸다.

original: It is mared by half a dozen obscene, round wounds
translate: 그곳에는 징그러운 둥근 상처가 십여 개나 나 있다.

original: A hearty meal will do him good
the woman smiles serenely as a horrid chirp escapes the crib
translate: 요람에서 끔찍한 찍찍거리는 소리가 새어 나오자 여자는 온화하게 미소 짓는다.

original: The blanket in the crib ripples as something much larger than a child rises from it
translate: 요람 속 담요가 일렁이더니 아이보다 훨씬 큰 무언가가 솟아오른다.

original: An inhuman squirming mass of teeth, eyes and what appears to be tentacles
column4: 촉수 같은 것들이 뒤엉킨 비인간적인 덩어리다.

original: This is madness!
Mother Katak
An old woman sits beside a crib, her silver hair loose and tangled around her shoulders
translate: 한 노파가 은발을 헝클어뜨린 채 어깨에 늘어뜨리고 요람 옆에 앉아 있다.

original: She hums to herself as she rocks the crib back and forth, a smile tugging at her weathered lips
translate: 그녀는 콧노래를 흥얼거하며 요람을 앞뒤로 흔들고

original: The cottage is dimly lit, and the room is filled with various dried plants
translate: 오두막은 어두침침하고 방 안은 각종 말린 식물들로 가득하다.

original: The air is heavy with the scents of lavendar, thyme, and the unmistakeable taint of rot
column3: 그리고 명백한 부패의 냄새가 짙게 배어 있다.

original: Are you Mother Katak?
Do you have anything to trade?
The woman looks up at you with ancient gray eyes
translate: 여자가 오래된 회색 눈으로 당신을 올려다본다.

original: That I am indeed
What can I do for you, child?
A strange coo escapes the crib
It sounds off
You try to peer inside, but the old woman shifts, obscuring your view
Explain about the outbreak in the camp
As you explain the situation, the woman absentmindedly rocks the cradle by her side
translate: 상황을 설명하는 동안 여자는 건성으로 옆에 있는 요람을 흔든다.

original: She chuckles softly
So the fine folk of Horryn have a bit of a belly-ache and they thought ‘who better to save us then kindly old Katak?
column3: 호린의 고귀한 분들이 배가 좀 아프니까 '친절한 늙은 카탁 말고 누가 우릴 구해주겠어?' 하고 생각했나 보지?

original: It was Hannah who sent me here
Her boy is sick as well
The old woman decants the mixture into a glass bottle
This will do
Soak bread in a thimble of this and it will purge your guts of any foulness
translate: 골무만큼 덜어서 빵을 적셔 먹으면 뱃속의 더러운 것들을 싹 비워낼 게다.

original: She hands you the bottle and before slumping heavily down in her chair
translate: 그녀는 병을 건네고는 의자에 털석 주저앉는다.

original: Suddenly the previously animated woman looks exhausted
translate: 방금 전까지 활기차던 여자가 갑자기 지쳐 보인다.

original: The crib rocks slightly as a low growl escapes it
translate: 요람이 살짝 흔들리며 낮은 으르렁거리는 소리가 새어 나온다.

original: What's in the crib?
Little Allyn?
Oh, he's such a lovely little boy!
Almost like my little piglet here
She pats the crib
The strange, piping sound coming from it sounds nothing like a child
translate: 그 안에서 들려오는 기이한 피리 소리 같은 것은 전혀 아이 소리 같지 않다.

original: I’ll help of course
No need to fret
the old woman says with a chuckle
Getting rid of your tummy aches takes old magic
Magic from the earth!
What do you need?
Find me the unborn of the scaled ones!
translate: 비늘 덮인 놈들의 태어나지 않은 것들을 찾아다오!

original: They dwell not far from here: north of the great oak and past the fetid pools!
translate: 여기서 멀지 않아. 큰 떡갈나무 북쪽

original: But beware!
The scaled ones are fierce and guard their un-born well!
translate: 비늘 덮인 놈들은 사납고 새끼들을 잘 지키거든!

original: the old woman chuckles
Do you mean these lizard eggs?
I suppose I'll do my best
The old woman either can’t or won’t hear you
She rattles on unfazed
The old woman chuckles again
Even the coldest of hearts pour the warmest of love into their young!
translate: 아무리 차가운 심장이라도 새끼에게는 가장 따뜻한 사랑을 쏟는 법이지!

original: Makes the flesh of the unborn oh so tender
And potent you know!
Now off you go!
Me babe needs his sleep
The crone is babbling incoherently while tears stream down her face
Suddenly she seems to notice you
You did this!!
You took my boy from me!
There is nothing more for you here
The crone hums to herself as she gently rocks the crib back and forth
translate: 노파는 혼자 흥얼거리며 요람을 부드럽게 앞뒤로 흔든다.

original: I have the eggs!
Want to trade?
#SantaFury2
Come to think of it, a bit of bloodshed might be just what I need right now!
column3: 지금 내게 필요한 건 피를 좀 보는 것 같군!

original: Come on then, you bastard
There are people, groups even, you just do not talk about and I’m not about to start with you
translate: 입에 담아서는 안 될 사람들과 집단이 있어. 그리고 너한테 그걸 말해줄 생각은 없다.

original: Since you’re moments away from death however, I’ll give you this much
translate: 하지만 넌 곧 죽을 테니 이 정도는 알려주지.

original: There are secrets in the Empire so deeply hidden you’ll only ever be able to perceive the faintest of their outlines
translate: 제국에는 너무 깊이 숨겨져 있어서 그 윤곽조차 희미하게만 감지할 수 있는 비밀들이 있어.

original: So monumental are they, that even though they’re in front of your very nose, you’re unable to perceive them
translate: 너무나 거대해서 바로 코앞에 있어도 인식할 수 없을 정도지.

original: The rest of Carylla’s group looks at her anxiously
translate: 카릴라의 일행 나머지가 그녀를 불안하게 쳐다본다.

original: Cary, you shouldn't
one of them whispers to her
Carylla’s eyes narrow
Have no fear Pieter
This one’s at the end of the road
Wait, I had some more questions first!
Prepare to die you bitch!
The group exchanges nervous glances
I’m paid well to not ask questions and that’s a particularly dangerous question to ask
translate: 난 질문하지 않는 대가로 돈을 넉넉히 받았어. 그리고 그건 특히나 위험한 질문이군.

original: Let’s just say, someone was willing to put a lot of gold towards recovering this
translate: 그냥 누군가가 이걸 되찾는 데 엄청난 금화를 걸었다고만 해두지.

original: Carylla pats the bag hanging by her side
So, shall I gut you now?
I had some more questions first
Who's paying you?
Let's dance!
As you approach the camp, a group of armed men and women whirl to face you
translate: 야영지에 다가가자 무장한 남녀 무리가 획 돌아 당신을 마주한다.

original: You recognize them as the troupe who ‘relieved’ you of the Santa Fury idol
translate: 당신에게서 '산타 퓨리' 우상을 '덜어주었던' 그 일행임을 알아본다.

original: They do, however, look quite a bit rougher compared to when you saw them last
translate: 하지만 마지막으로 봤을 때보다 꽤 거칠어진 모습이다.

original: Carylla, the leader of the group draws her sword and points it at you
translate: 무리의 리더인 카릴라가 칼을 뽑아 당신을 겨눈다.

original: You?
Tell me, is your death-wish truly that strong?
column3: 그렇게 죽고 싶어 안달이 난 거야?

original: All I want is to get paid for this bloody idol and leave this fucking island!
translate: 난 그냥 이 빌어먹을 우상 값이나 받고 이 좆같은 섬을 뜨고 싶을 뿐이라고!

original: Turns out that’s rather difficult at the moment and now I have to take time off from my drinking to spill your stinking guts as well?!
translate: 지금 당장은 그게 좀 어려운 상황인데
column3: 이제 술 마시는 시간까지 쪼개서 네 더러운 내장까지 쏟아내게 해야겠어?!

original: Wait, let's parlay!
What are we waiting for?
I'll indulge you
What is that idol?
Who hired you?
How about I just take the idol of your hands?
translate: 그냥 그 우상을 내가 가져가면 어떨까?

original: Enought talk!
Time to die!
Carylla lets out a sound somewhere between a snort and a laugh
translate: 카릴라는 콧방귀와 웃음 사이의 소리를 낸다.

original: Pray tell, why would I do that?
For all her bravado, there is something
The slightest hint of doubt
Hand it over and I'll let you live
One of the lackeys look pleadingly at her but Carylla is adamant
translate: 부하 중 하나가 애원하듯 쳐다보지만 카릴라는 단호하다.

original: You don’t understand do you?
There are forces at work far more powerful and much darker than you can fathom
translate: 네가 상상할 수 있는 것보다 훨씬 강력하고 어두운 힘이 작용하고 있어.

original: Your threats pale in comparison to what they would do
translate: 네 협박은 그들이 할 짓에 비하면 아무것도 아니야.

original: The group quickly and quietly slinks off into the forest leaving you behind with the idol
translate: 무리는 당신과 우상을 남겨두고 빠르고 조용히 숲속으로 사라진다.

original: As you remove it from the sack and gaze upon the grotesque form, a ringing rises in your ears
translate: 자루에서 우상을 꺼내 그 기괴한 형태를 바라보자

original: This is no mere mundane item - of that you have no doubt
translate: 이건 평범한 물건이 아니다. 그건 확실하다.

original: As you stow it in your pack, you can’t help but wonder if Carylla’s final words were true
translate: 배낭에 넣으면서 카릴라의 마지막 말이 사실인지 궁금해하지 않을 수 없다.

original: Have you drawn the ire of other, darker forces?
translate: 다른 더 어두운 세력의 분노를 산 것일까?

original: One of the men leans in, speaking to Carylla
translate: 남자 중 한 명이 몸을 숙여 카릴라에게 말한다.

original: Cary, ’s onto something yeah?
column3: 쟤 말이 일리 있는 거 아니야?

original: Let’s get out of here and leave that bleedin’ thing for them?
translate: 그냥 여기서 나가고 저 피 묻은 물건은 쟤들한테 넘겨주자고.

original: Let them deal with it!
Carylla swallows hard
Then throws you a sack with something heavy in it
translate: 그러고는 무거운 것이 든 자루를 당신에게 던진다.

original: Have the fucking thing!
Maybe I’ll finally get to sleep now
But hear me
Men will be coming for that
Men far more powerful than me and my lot
translate: 나나 내 일행보다 훨씬 강력한 자들이.

original: So you best sleep with one eye open from now on
translate: 그러니 이제부터는 한쪽 눈은 뜨고 자는 게 좋을걸.

original: If you’re able to sleep at all, that is
Take the idol
#SpiderCaveSon
Ol’ mother Katak’s cottage lies to the north-east
Has a great big tree growing through it so you can’t miss it
translate: 큰 나무가 오두막을 뚫고 자라고 있어서 못 찾을 수가 없지.

original: Ol’ lady’s a bit strange but she knows things!
translate: 할멈이 좀 이상하긴 해도 아는 건 많아!

original: Potions and herbs and such
Might even have some to sell you
Anything else?
Aye!
There’s a bit of marshland north of the big oak
translate: 큰 떡갈나무 북쪽에 늪지대가 좀 있어.

original: I’d stay out of there
There’s lizards and such and they say even a single bite is enough to kill ya on account of the disease they carry in their mouths!
column3: 입에 병균을 달고 다녀서 한 번만 물려도 죽을 수 있대!

original: Thanks!
I'll get going then
Tombs bless you!
If... when you find my dar, tell him I’ll be waiting for him at home!
The boy sets off into the woods and once more, the forest is quiet
translate: 소년은 숲으로 떠나고 다시 한번 숲은 고요해진다.

original: To your surprise, a young man crashes through the undergrowth ahead of you
translate: 놀랍게도 한 젊은이가 앞쪽 덤불을 헤치며 뛰어 나온다.

original: His face is red and he’s panting heavily as he spots you
translate: 그는 얼굴이 붉게 상기된 채 거친 숨을 몰아쉬며 당신을 발견한다.

original: He... help!
They took ‘im!
They took who?
My dar!
We were working at the lumber-camp when they just burst out of the trees!
translate: 벌목장에서 일하고 있는데 놈들이 나무 사이에서 튀어나왔어요!

original: My dar took a swing at em with ‘is axe an told me to run!
translate: 아빠는 도끼를 휘두르며 제게 도망치라고 하셨고요!

original: The boy breaks down and sobs
But I saw ‘em take ‘im and drag ‘im into the forest!
translate: 하지만 놈들이 아빠를 잡아서 숲으로 끌고 가는 걸 봤어요!

original: What took your father?
I couldn’t tell you because they kind of hid in the undergrowth!
translate: 덤불 속에 숨어 있어서 제대로 못 봤어요!

original: But they were large as hounds and all I saw was the gleam from their terrible eyes!
column3: 제가 본 건 그 끔찍한 눈빛뿐이었어요!

original: Please
You have to go look for 'im!
He’s all I got left since ma died!
translate: 엄마가 돌아가신 뒤로 남은 건 아빠뿐이에요!

original: I'll try
Camp’s to the east of here!
Just go past the big oak and then you’ll eventually see our lean-to and campfire!
translate: 큰 떡갈나무를 지나면 우리 오두막과 모닥불이 보일 거예요!

original: Please hurry!
Anything else of note in the area?
translate: 이 근처에 다른 특이 사항은 없나?

original: #SpiderCaveSurvivor
I’ll make my own way out
Surely my boy is waiting
Fare thee well and be careful - These are dark times
The man bows deeply and leaves
You recoil in shock as the cocoon shifts under your hands!
translate: 고치가 손 아래서 꿈틀거리자 당신은 충격에 뒤로 물러선다!

original: Whatever is inside is still alive
As you stand there dumbstruck, you can hear faint moaning
translate: 멍하니 서 있는데 희미한 신음 소리가 들린다.

original: Cut open the cocoon
You carefully cut open the cocoon and a large man stumbles out
translate: 조심스럽게 고치를 자르자 거구의 사내가 비틀거리며 나온다.

original: No doubt shaken and disoriented from the ordeal, the poor fellow looks at you with wide eyes
translate: 충격과 혼란에 빠진 불쌍한 사내는 눈을 크게 뜨고 당신을 바라본다.

original: What
Who
Where?
Your son sent me to look for you!
Recollection creeps back into the man’s eyes
So
So Lon’s alive?
He made it!?
Thank the Golden!
And you
You risked your own life to save me?
How can I ever repay you?
No reward is necessary
Surely you have something?
In that case, you have my eternal gratitude my lord!
In that case, you have my eternal gratitude my lady!
Here
Take my axe!
It's as well crafted as they come and I'm sure it'll fetch you a pretty penny at the market!
translate: 아주 잘 만든 물건이라 시장에서 꽤 비싸게 팔릴 겁니다!

original: Thank you!
# Chapter_1_Glen
#Chapter1ArrivalInGlen
You shield your face from the cold winds and icy drizzle as you survey the area
translate: 차가운 바람과 얼음 같은 이슬비로부터 얼굴을 가리며 주변을 살핀다.

original: In the secluded valley that lies ahead, you spot the unmistakable, shaggy white forms of a flock of goats
translate: 앞쪽 외딴 계곡에 털이 수북한 흰 염소 떼가 있는 것이 보인다.

original: You’re just about to make your way towards them when a strange undulating howl echoes through the small valley
translate: 그쪽으로 가려는데 기이하게 울려 퍼지는 울음소리가 작은 계곡에 메아리친다.

original: There's more than goats in this area
translate: 이 구역엔 염소만 있는 게 아니군.

original: #Chapter1Shepherd
The pale-faced youth looks at you with desperation
translate: 창백한 얼굴의 소년이 절박한 표정으로 당신을 쳐다본다.

original: What about them?
I talked to your dad
We're to take the goats to camp
These goats are going to the camp
Never mind
I have some questions
I have to go
Stay here for now
The boy lets out a pathetic yelp as he swings his staff at you!
translate: 소년은 애처로운 비명을 지르며 당신에게 지팡이를 휘두른다!

original: Before you can step aside, Roland’s fist shatters the boy’s jaw
translate: 당신이 피하기도 전에 롤랜드의 주먹이 소년의 턱을 부순다.

original: He tumbles to the ground and with a sickening crack, his skull smashes open against a large rock
column3: 끔찍한 소리와 함께 큰 바위에 머리가 깨진다.

original: His swing goes wild and he tumbles to the ground
There her remains, sobbing
You fail to get another word out of him and decide it’s best to be on your way
translate: 당신은 그에게서 더 이상 말을 듣지 못하고 길을 떠나는 게 낫겠다고 판단한다.

original: Lead the animals away
He clings to his blanket with trembling fingers
translate: 그는 떨리는 손가락으로 담요를 꼭 쥔다.

original: I...I don't know
Nothin' on Idra should be able to make a sound like that
translate: 이드라의 어떤 것도 그런 소리를 낼 순 없어요.

original: Whatever it is, it ain't human
I never see 'em
Every night the mist rolls in, and then shapes appear just outside the circle of my fire
And then I...I can feel 'em!
The boy starts to sob
I know they're there, but no matter how terrified I am, I can't stay awake!
column3: 아무리 무서워도 깨어 있을 수가 없어요!

original: I always fall asleep, and when I wake up the next morning
The boy drops his head into his trembling hands
translate: 소년은 떨리는 두 손에 고개를 파묻는다.

original: I never see 'em do it, but every mornin' there are fresh marks on my goats...on me
translate: 그들이 하는 걸 본 적은 없지만
column3: 매일 아침 염소들에게... 그리고 저에게 새로운 상처가 생겨 있어요.

original: They're feeding on us, I know they are!
The goats suddenly get to their feet, bleating nervously
Their gazes are fixed on something beyond the grey sea-mist that constantly blanks Idra
translate: 그들의 시선은 이드라를 끊임없이 뒤덮는 회색 바다 안개 너머 무언가에 고정되어 있다.

original: The youth sinks to the ground and begins sobbing loudly
translate: 소년은 바닥에 주저앉아 크게 흐느끼기 시작한다.

original: You don’t get any more sense out of him and there is nothing left to do but lead the animals away
translate: 더 이상 대화가 통하지 않아 동물들을 끌고 가는 것 외에는 할 일이 없다.

original: Huddled inside a hollow mountain crevice is a young man surrounded by half a dozen goats
translate: 산의 틈새 안에 웅크리고 있는 젊은이가 대여섯 마리의 염소에 둘러싸여 있다.

original: He is shivering violently beneath a worn blanket, his gaunt face pale in the dim light
translate: 그는 낡은 담요 아래서 심하게 떨고 있고
column3: 어두운 빛 속에서 핼쑥한 얼굴이 창백해 보인다.

original: The goats look no healthier
W-w-who goes there!?
Keep away - I've got nothing for you!
Who are you?
You're Jakub's boy, I presume?
The boy looks up at you with wide, too-trusting eyes
translate: 소년은 너무나 순진한 눈으로 당신을 올려다본다.

original: M-my name is Aiden
I live at a farm just outside of Horryn
Dar trusts me to
Why are you out here?
It isn't safe
I
I'm doin' my part for the family!
translate: 전 가족을 위해 제 몫을 하고 있는 거예요!

original: An inhuman shriek once again cuts through the mountains
translate: 비인간적인 비명이 다시 한번 산을 가른다.

original: The boy freezes in terror
What was that?
The shepherd eyes you suspiciously
I m-might be
Did he
Before he can finish an inhuman shriek once again cuts through the mountains
translate: 그가 말을 마치기도 전에 비인간적인 비명이 다시 한번 산을 가른다.

original: Working as fast as you can, you get the ragged flock moving and set off towards the camp
translate: 당신은 최대한 서둘러 지친 무리를 이끌고 캠프로 출발한다.

original: No, wait!
Aiden looks suddenly terrified
translate: 에이든이 갑자기 공포에 질린 표정을 짓는다.

original: I...I can't go!
My dar told me if I bring the goats back to the farm, the chamberlain will slaughter them for food and it'll be the end for ma and dar!
translate: 아빠가 염소들을 농장으로 데려가면 시종장이 식량으로 도축해 버릴 거고

original: What if I talk to your father?
translate: 내가 네 아버지랑 얘기해 보면 어때?

original: It makes no difference
I'm taking these goats to camp
The young man shudders in relief
I know of hidden trails - we'll be in the camp in no time!
translate: 숨겨진 길을 알아요. 금방 캠프에 도착할 거예요!

original: The goats start bleeting
But we must hurry!
Lead the way
I’m not going to let you do that!
The scrawny teen struggles to his feet brandishing his shepherd's staff
translate: 비쩍 마른 소년이 양치기 지팡이를 휘두르며 힘겹게 일어선다.

original: If I lose these animals my dar’ll kill me!
translate: 이 동물들을 잃어버리면 아빠가 절 죽일 거예요!

original: Don't do anything stupid now
I need to rethink this
Fine by me
attack
The boy shivers from cold and exhaustion
Wh… what now?
Why haven't you just left?
About the animals
I need to go
The boy somehow looks even paler than he did last time you saw him
translate: 소년은 지난번 봤을 때보다 더 창백해 보인다.

original: I don’t know how much longer we can take it
translate: 얼마나 더 버틸 수 있을지 모르겠어요.

original: We need to talk?
The boy is clearly heartbroken, but he makes no effort to move
translate: 소년은 분명 상심했지만 움직이려 하지 않는다.

original: Alright, if that's what dar wants
You'd do that for me?
Oh, Golden Dead bless you!!
I'll be back soon
My dar would kill me
He sent me up here to keep the goats safe and I’m not leaving until he permits it!
translate: 염소들을 안전하게 지키라고 절 여기 보내셨고

original: The lad’s eyes water up
# Chapter_1_Horryn
#HorrynAmbush
The men whirl around at the sound, and elation spreads across their faces as they spot you
Dragging their captives along, the reavers fan out around you with moronic grins and weapons drawn
translate: 포로들을 끌고 약탈자들이 멍청한 미소를 짓고 무기를 든 채 당신 주위로 흩어진다.

original: One of them makes a piercing whistle and it's echoed by another behind you - a new group of six reavers file into the street, cutting off any chance you had at a retreat
translate: 한 명이 날카로운 휘파람을 불자 뒤에서 다른 누군가가 호응한다. 여섯 명의 새로운 약탈자 무리가 거리로 들어와 퇴로를 차단한다.

original: You spring stealthily out of hiding, determined to get within killing range before your foes spot you
translate: 당신은 적들이 발견하기 전에 사거리에 들겠다는 일념으로 은신처에서 은밀하게 튀어 나간다.

original: Your heart pounds in your chest as you prepare to strike the first blow!
translate: 첫 일격을 가할 준비를 하며 심장이 쿵쾅거린다!

original: But a piercing whistling cuts through the silence and stops you dead in your tracks
translate: 하지만 날카로운 휘파람 소리가 적막을 깨고 당신을 제자리에 멈춰 세운다.

original: You whirl around to see another group of six reavers file into the street behind you, cutting you off from your escape route
translate: 홱 돌아보니 여섯 명의 약탈자 무리가 뒤쪽 거리로 들어와 퇴로를 차단하고 있다.

original: Elated laughter sounds from the first group as they notice the prey now caught between them and their comrades
translate: 자신들과 동료들 사이에 갇힌 먹잇감을 알아챈 첫 번째 무리에서 의기양양한 웃음소리가 들린다.

original: The reavers fan out around you, dragging their captives along, with moronic grins and weapons drawn
translate: 포로들을 끌고 약탈자들이 멍청한 미소를 짓고 무기를 든 채 당신 주위로 흩어진다.

original: An 'end'?
There are no ends here!
Only new beginnings... new life!
The men roar with laughter
I am not
But He is waiting for you
He has so much to show you
When you're ready
We've come to put and end to you!
The man's breathing deepens in perverse delight as he pulls his hostage's head back by her long, auburn hair
translate: 남자는 인질의 긴 적갈색 머리채를 뒤로 잡아당기며 변태적인 기쁨에 거칠게 숨을 몰아쉰다.

original: A thousand young will heed her call!
translate: 천 마리의 새끼들이 그녀의 부름에 답할 것이다!

original: He places the knife across the woman's throat
A THOUSAND YOUNG WILL HEAR HER CALL!
translate: 천 마리의 새끼들이 그녀의 부름을 들으리라!

original: Stop!!
Before you can react, the big man slits the poor woman's throat
translate: 당신이 반응하기도 전에 거구의 남자가 가여운 여자의 목을 긋는다.

original: Blood gushes forth as she stumbles towards you with utter panic in her eyes!
translate: 피가 솟구치고 그녀는 공포에 질린 눈으로 당신에게 비틀거리며 다가온다!

original: Driina lunges towards her and frantically begins the hopeless task of stopping the bleeding
translate: 드리나가 그녀에게 달려들어 지혈이라는 가망 없는 일을 필사적으로 시작한다.

original: In the ensuing chaos, half of the wicked pack falls upon you from behind as the leader and a handful of his lackeys slip away with the surviving hostages
translate: 혼란스러운 틈을 타 사악한 무리의 절반이 뒤에서 당신을 덮치고
column3: 우두머리와 몇몇 부하들은 남은 인질들을 데리고 빠져나간다.

original: As you approach the city-square, panicked cries of fear, pain and despair echo across the plaza
column4: 절망에 찬 공포의 외침이 울려 퍼진다.

original: You move closer and spy a large group of reavers rounding up and binding villagers
translate: 가까이 다가가니 약탈자 무리가 마을 사람들을 모아 묶고 있는 것이 보인다.

original: The poor souls are bloodied and abused and the reavers tie them in ranks as though they intend to march them away
column3: 약탈자들은 그들을 어딘가로 끌고 가려는 듯 줄지어 묶고 있다.

original: Call to the reavers
The brute stares at you for a moment, then smiles
translate: 짐승 같은 놈은 잠시 당신을 쳐다보더니 미소를 짓는다.

original: He stabs his dagger into the woman’s thigh and she screams in shock and pain
translate: 그가 여자의 허벅지에 단검을 꽂자 여자가 충격과 고통에 비명을 지른다.

original: Blood sprays uncontrollably from the wound as he pushes her roughly towards you
translate: 상처에서 피가 걷잡을 수 없이 뿜어져 나오고
column3: 그는 여자를 당신 쪽으로 거칠게 떠민다.

original: She stumbles into your arms, her face a mask of pleading and terror
translate: 그녀는 애원과 공포가 뒤섞인 얼굴로 당신 품에 쓰러진다.

original: The wound is deep but she may yet be saved
translate: 상처는 깊지만 아직 구할 수 있을지도 모른다.

original: Attempt to bind her wounds!
You cannot threaten me
All that can change now is just how many vessels Father will offer up to Her by the day's end
translate: 지금 바뀔 수 있는 건 오늘이 가기 전에 아버지께서 그녀에게 얼마나 많은 제물을 바칠지 뿐이야.

original: Can't you see?
This is your chance to be part of something so much bigger than yourself!
translate: 이건 네 자신보다 훨씬 더 큰 무언가의 일부가 될 기회라고!

original: Fine - take them!
Take the rest but leave the auburn woman
translate: 나머지는 데려가고 저 적갈색 머리 여자는 놔줘.

original: You're all insane!
The wound is too deep and the bleeding too severe
The woman bleeds out in your arms
translate: 여자는 당신 품에서 피를 쏟으며 죽어간다.

original: As you look around the pack of reavers have fled with their hostages and the plaza now lies empty
translate: 주위를 둘러보니 약탈자 무리는 인질들을 데리고 도망쳤고 광장은 텅 비어 있다.

original: Driina holds the dead woman's hand as she recites a prayer under her breath
translate: 드리나는 죽은 여자의 손을 잡고 나지막이 기도를 읊조린다.

original: The wound has cut one of the large blood vessels in her thigh and the situation is dire
translate: 상처가 허벅지의 큰 혈관을 건드려 상황이 심각하다.

original: Acting quickly, you loosen your belt and wrap it around her leg
translate: 당신은 재빨리 행동하여 허리띠를 풀어 그녀의 다리를 감싼다.

original: Using a stick you craft a tourniquet and manage to apply enough pressure to halt the bleeding
translate: 막대기를 이용해 지혈대를 만들고 충분한 압박을 가해 지혈에 성공한다.

original: The woman’s life has been saved
You sit with the woman and catch your breath
translate: 당신은 여자 곁에 앉아 숨을 고른다.

original: Out of the fog, coming from the Fisherman’s Gate, a thin wretch of a man limps into view
translate: 안개 속 어부의 문 쪽에서 비쩍 마른 불쌍한 남자가 절뚝거리며 나타난다.

original: Natia!!
By the Golden Dead: you saved her!
Philip rushes to her side with tears streaming down his face
translate: 필립은 눈물을 흘리며 그녀 곁으로 달려간다.

original: No doubt, the poor man followed you into the city to look for his wife
translate: 분명 이 불쌍한 남자는 아내를 찾으러 당신을 따라 도시로 들어왔을 것이다.

original: She needs a safe place to rest!
Our old home is nearby
It will have to do!
Philip picks up his wife and leads you a short way through the mist to a meager home
translate: 필립은 아내를 안아 들고 안개 속을 지나 가까운 허름한 집으로 당신을 안내한다.

original: As you follow Driina places a hand on your shoulder and offers a soft smile
translate: 뒤따라가는데 드리나가 당신 어깨에 손을 얹으며 부드러운 미소를 짓는다.

original: A small reprieve amongst all this suffering, no?
translate: 이 모든 고통 속에서도 작은 위안이네요

original: One of the struggling captives manages to break free
translate: 반항하던 포로 중 한 명이 가까스로 풀려난다.

original: She is swiftly caught and her throat slit for the trouble
translate: 그녀는 금세 잡히고 소란을 피운 대가로 목이 그어진다.

original: The other captives cry out in terror
translate: 다른 포로들이 공포에 질려 비명을 지른다.

original: Laughing, the reavers pull the rest to their feet and make for the opposite side of the square, towards the keep that looms over Horryn
translate: 약탈자들은 웃으며 나머지 사람들을 일으켜 세우고 광장 반대편
column3: 호린 위로 솟아 있는 성채 쪽으로 향한다.

original: We must act now, or all will be lost!
translate: 지금 행동하지 않으면 다 잃게 돼요!

original: Driina hisses
Stay hidden
As the cries of the captives echo across the empty square, you tread cautiously back the way you came
translate: 포로들의 비명 소리가 텅 빈 광장에 메아리칠 때

original: A whistle cuts painfully through the eerie silence
translate: 으스스한 적막을 가르는 휘파람 소리가 고막을 찌른다.

original: You whirl around to see another group of six reavers file into the street behind you, cutting off your retreat
translate: 홱 돌아보니 여섯 명의 약탈자 무리가 뒤쪽 거리로 들어와 퇴로를 차단하고 있다.

original: Elated laughter spills from the first group, as they turn back to exult in their freshly caught quarry
translate: 첫 번째 무리가 갓 잡은 사냥감을 보고 기뻐하며 의기양양한 웃음을 터뜨린다.

original: As the cries of the captives being dragged away echo in the empty square, Driina looks you straight in the eyes, measuring your resolve
translate: 끌려가는 포로들의 비명이 텅 빈 광장에 울려 퍼질 때
column3: 드리나는 당신의 결의를 가늠하듯 똑바로 쳐다본다.

original: Before you can muster a response, she steps from your hiding place
translate: 당신이 대답하기도 전에 그녀는 은신처에서 걸어 나간다.

original: Her voice booms across the square
By the Golden Dead - stand and answer for your crimes!
The man's voice rises, speaking as much to the other reavers as to you
translate: 남자의 목소리가 커지며 당신뿐만 아니라 다른 약탈자들에게도 말한다.

original: We stand at the dawn of a new age - of old masters, reclaiming their rightful thrones!
translate: 우리는 새로운 시대의 여명에 서 있다. 옛 주인들이 정당한 왕좌를 되찾는 시대 말이야!

original: And you will all play your part in ushering it in
translate: 그리고 너희 모두 그 시대를 여는 데 한몫하게 될 것이다.

original: The hooded man smiles cruelly at Driina
translate: 두건 쓴 남자가 드리나를 보고 잔인하게 미소 짓는다.

original: The reavers close in around you
This ends now!
What now?
Steady on
Roland whispers as he grabs your wrist, pulling you back into the shadows
translate: 롤랜드가 당신의 손목을 잡고 어둠 속으로 끌어당기며 속삭인다.

original: There's plenty more of them than us - attacking head on is a poor bet even for me
translate: 쪽수에서 우리가 훨씬 밀려. 정면승부는 나한테도 승산 없는 도박이야.

original: Wait till they move and we'll take their rear
translate: 놈들이 움직일 때까지 기다렸다가 뒤를 치자.

original: Might even the odds before they know what's hit 'em
translate: 놈들이 눈치채기 전에 승산이 생길지도 몰라.

original: We'll wait!
We attack now!
Not in a rush to die anymore Roland?
translate: 이젠 빨리 죽고 싶지 않은가 보네

original: Roland scowls
I may be shitty company, but that doesn't mean I'm happy to let my comrades throw their lives away on a whim
column3: 동료가 개죽음당하는 꼴을 보고 싶진 않아.

original: The man points his blade at you
We will meet again soon!
He whistles loudly and the pack sets off at a run, driving the hostages before themselves like pigs to the slaughter
translate: 그가 크게 휘파람을 불자 무리는 도살장에 끌려가는 돼지처럼 인질들을 몰고 달리기 시작한다.

original: Roland puts a heavy hand on your shoulder
translate: 롤랜드가 당신 어깨에 묵직한 손을 얹는다.

original: If we had fought them it would have been the end of the hostages
Now, at least, we may yet have a chance to rescue them
translate: 이제 적어도 그들을 구할 기회는 남았잖아.

original: Behind you Driina sinks to her knees and sobs from rage and helplessness
translate: 뒤에서 드리나가 분노와 무력감에 무릎을 꿇고 흐느낀다.

original: You tell yourself that combat would certainly have resulted in the death of the hostages
translate: 싸웠다면 분명 인질들이 죽었을 거라고 스스로 되뇌인다.

original: At least now you may yet find a second chance to rescue them
translate: 적어도 지금은 그들을 구할 두 번째 기회가 있을지 모른다.

original: A hulk of a man steps to the fore, dressed only in ragged trousers and a half hood
translate: 누더기 바지와 반쪽짜리 두건만 걸친 거구의 남자가 앞으로 나온다.

original: His swollen barrel chest is covered in sailor tattoos
translate: 부풀어 오른 통 같은 가슴은 선원 문신으로 뒤덮여 있다.

original: He hefts a rusty serrated dagger, and drags a terrified woman behind him by her auburn hair
translate: 그는 녹슨 톱니 단검을 들어 올리며 겁에 질린 여자의 적갈색 머리채를 잡고 뒤로 끈다.

original: He smiles serenely as he approaches, revealing a few remaining, yellow teeth
translate: 그는 몇 개 남지 않은 누런 이를 드러내며 온화하게 미소 짓고 다가온다.

original: You have no idea how glad I am to see you here!
translate: 여기서 당신을 보게 되어 얼마나 기쁜지 모를 거요!

original: There is no scorn or malice in his voice
Only genuine joy
You're truly blessed to be a part of this
translate: 이 일에 동참하게 된 건 정말 축복받은 거요.

original: He slowly, almost tenderly places the knife against the womans throat as he speaks
column3: 거의 부드럽게 여자의 목에 칼을 댄다.

original: Are you the one they call 'Father'?
A part of what?
The man's breathing deepens in perverse delight as he pulls his hostage's head back by her long auburn hair
translate: 남자는 인질의 긴 적갈색 머리채를 뒤로 잡아당기며 변태적인 기쁨에 거칠게 숨을 몰아쉰다.

original: We bring these children to Father’s flock
translate: 우린 이 아이들을 아버지의 무리로 데려가는 거요.

original: You are free to roam and frolic with my brothers and sisters
translate: 당신은 내 형제자매들과 마음껏 어울려 놀아도 좋소.

original: I’m sure Oleg or Kala will welcome you with open arms!
translate: 올렉이나 칼라도 두 팔 벌려 환영할 거요!

original: Let the villagers go!
Not a chance!
#HorrynReaverChief1
Oh the Butcher’s a good boy but he’s truly gone astray
Blood-drunk I say
I’ve seen it before
Once you taste the flesh and blood and guts of the weak, your hands just start going by themselves
column3: 내장을 맛보고 나면 손이 저절로 움직이기 시작하거든.

original: Becomes like gutting fish
Knife in - knife out
Oleg smiles broadly as he imitates a sawing motion with his hand
translate: 올렉은 손으로 톱질하는 시늉을 하며 활짝 웃는다.

original: But the Father still needs him - The tablets are whispering it to me!
translate: 하지만 아버지껜 아직 그가 필요해. 석판이 내게 속삭이고 있거든!

original: Seek him out in front of the temple, over in the western part of town, and tell that to him!
translate: 마을 서쪽 사원 앞에 있는 그를 찾아가서 그렇게 전해줘!

original: I have some other questions
About the other chieftains
A shadow falls over Oleg’s face
Father is a great man
I was the one to receive the word from the Deep but Father was the one who was truly chosen
translate: 심연의 말씀을 받은 건 나였지만 진정으로 선택받은 건 아버지였지.

original: I won’t lie
I was jealous!
I hated him for it!
The tablets came to me after all!
Why was he the one to receive the gift?!
translate: 왜 그가 그 선물을 받은 거지?!

original: What is his 'work'?
He sighs
Then again, his work is so important
So… beautiful even I cannot begin to comprehend it
translate: 너무나... 아름다워서 나조차도 이해할 수 없을 정도야.

original: And we must all play our part in it
translate: 그리고 우리 모두 그 안에서 각자의 역할을 해야 해.

original: My siblings will fall in line and you have been chosen for the task
translate: 내 형제들은 따를 것이고 당신은 그 임무를 위해 선택받았어.

original: Oh do not worry!
You’ll meet him soon enough and all will be made clear
translate: 곧 그분을 만나게 될 거고 모든 게 분명해질 거야.

original: It is whispered
Sweet little sister Kala!
She and her brood caught more of the prey than any other!
translate: 그녀와 그 무리가 다른 누구보다 사냥감을 많이 잡았지!

original: Sniffed them out from their cellars and attics and cupboards and sent them to Father!
column4: 찬장에서 냄새를 맡아 찾아내 아버지께 보냈어!

original: Though he only takes the fit
The very young and very old were left for her to play with
translate: 아주리 어리거나 늙은 것들은 그녀가 가지고 놀도록 남겨졌지.

original: Oleg chuckles genially
I fear she’s grown bored and lazy now that there’s hardly more prey to be had
translate: 이제 사냥감이 거의 없으니 지루하고 게을러진 것 같아 걱정이야.

original: She just sits around and stews over in the pack-house on the docks now
translate: 지금은 부두 창고에 앉아 속만 끓이고 있지.

original: It’s time she was reminded that she has a role to play yet!
translate: 아직 할 일이 있다는 걸 상기시켜 줄 때가 됐어!

original: Prey?
Do you mean people?
The old man smiles serenely and appears to either not hear or not comprehend your question
translate: 노인은 온화하게 미소 지으며 당신의 질문을 듣지 못했거나 이해하지 못한 것 같다.

original: The filthy pack of robed and hooded mad-men roar in insane anger and charge towards you as they draw strangely curved blades and cruel looking axes!
translate: 로브를 입고 두건을 쓴 더러운 광인 무리가 미친 듯이 분노하여 울부짖으며
column3: 기이하게 휘어진 칼과 잔인해 보이는 도끼를 꺼내 들고 당신에게 달려든다!

original: Tell me about Kala!
Tell me about the Butcher!
Tell me about the Father!
I have other questions
The band of madmen file out of the lodge and into the city
translate: 광인 무리가 오두막에서 나와 도시로 향한다.

original: Keeping your distance, you follow them as they set up an ambush in the plaza
translate: 당신은 거리를 두고 그들을 따라가며 광장에 매복하는 것을 지켜본다.

original: Like mangey, starving wolves they fidget with the anticipation of bloodshed
translate: 옴이 오르고 굶주린 늑대처럼 그들은 피를 볼 기대감에 안절부절못한다.

original: Finally their quarry arrives
The Butcher and his filthy brood prowl into the square with weapons drawn
translate: 도살자와 그의 더러운 무리가 무기를 들고 광장으로 어슬렁거리며 들어온다.

original: An arrow is loosened and then mad cries from the ambushers fill the air as a furious melee erupts!
translate: 화살이 날아가고 매복자들의 광기 어린 외침이 허공을 채우며 격렬한 난투극이 벌어진다!

original: Savage blades make bloody work
Intestines spill, blood pours and limbs are torn from bodies
Screams of pain and terror mix with the howls and snarls of men utterly lost to insane bloodlust
translate: 고통과 공포의 비명이 미친 피의 욕망에 완전히 사로잡힌 남자들의 울부짖음과 으르렁거림에 섞인다.

original: The Butcher finds Oleg on the field and with a mighty swing the old man is slain
As the fiend tears his ‘brother’s’ hearth from his chest, he howls in triumph
translate: 그 악귀는 '형제'의 가슴에서 심장을 뜯어내며 승리의 포효를 지른다.

original: As the screams die down and all the savagery is sated, the ground is slick with blood
Your memory tugs at you, urging you on to the centre of the maze
translate: 기억이 당신을 이끌어 미로 중심으로 재촉한다.

original: In the darkness his eyes burn like white hot coals
translate: 어둠 속에서 그의 눈이 하얗게 달아오른 석탄처럼 타오른다.

original: As he raises his bloody axe towards you, an inhuman scream echoes across the plaza
translate: 그가 피 묻은 도끼를 당신에게 들어 올리자

original: It seems the mad-man has one more sacrifice yet to make!
translate: 광인에게는 아직 바칠 제물이 하나 더 남은 모양이다!

original: Attack!
What?!
My patience is limited!
About your tablets
Regarding the other chieftains
I'm here to end you!
It's time I left
An old man,graying but endowed with a physique sculpted by a lifetime of hard manual labor, looks up at you as you approach
translate: 머리가 희끗하지만 평생의 고된 노동으로 다져진 체격을 가진 노인이 다가오는 당신을 올려다본다.

original: A smile of genuine surprise spreads warmly across his face in a manner that stands in stark contrast to the grotesque surroundings
translate: 기괴한 주변 환경과는 극명하게 대조되는 진심 어린 놀라움의 미소가 그의 얼굴에 따뜻하게 번진다.

original: Ah!
You came!
You were expecting me?
Your coming was whispered
Such are the blessings of the Depths
Cast your nets and receive the bounty
All my life I’ve been at sea
Wind and rain and frozen fingers
And let me tell you
Them Imperial hymns never did me any good
translate: 제국 찬송가는 내게 아무런 도움도 안 됐어.

original: Twasn't afore we started using the old incantations that the Deep started rewarding us
translate: 심연이 보답하기 시작한 건 우리가 고대 주문을 사용하기 시작한 뒤부터였지.

original: And rewarded me it did
The Whispering Tablets came to me
That’s where we first received the deep word and that’s where I heard of your coming
translate: 거기서 우린 처음으로 심연의 말씀을 받았고

original: Whispering tablet?
The Butcher has stolen your tablets!
Aye
The words of the Deep - written in stone
Given to me and me alone
Those two upstarts, Kala and that butcher, covet it and even the Father himself pretends he no longer needs it
translate: 그 건방진 칼라와 도살자 놈이 그걸 탐내고, 아버지조차 더 이상 필요 없는 척하지.

original: No longer needs me
A flash of anger comes across the face of the kindly old man
translate: 인자해 보이던 노인의 얼굴에 분노가 스친다.

original: But I’ll remind him
I’ll make the Father remember
How?
Sister Kala and brother Butcher have lost their way
translate: 자매 칼라와 형제 도살자는 길을 잃었어.

original: All the bloodshed has gone to their heads and they’ve strayed!
translate: 피를 너무 많이 봐서 머리가 어떻게 된 거지

original: Lost their way!
Meanwhile, the Father has gone to the keep to begin the holy work
translate: 그동안 아버지는 성스러운 과업을 시작하러 성채로 가셨지.

original: He’s left it to me to put my wayward siblings right
translate: 내게 빗나간 형제들을 바로잡는 일을 맡기셨어.

original: Or put them down
Like diseased dogs
And you think I'll help you?
It does not matter what I think
The tablets whispered and here you are
Before this is over you will have more blood on your hands
translate: 이 일이 끝나기 전에 당신 손에는 더 많은 피가 묻을 거야.

original: So much more blood
Go to them
Tell them to return to the family or suffer the consequences
translate: 가족에게 돌아오지 않으면 대가를 치를 거라고 전해.

original: The Butcher is culling the flock in front of the temple and you’ll find Kala holding court at the east-end of the docks
translate: 도살자는 사원 앞에서 무리를 솎아내고 있고
column3: 칼라는 부두 동쪽 끝에서 재판을 벌이고 있을 거야.

original: Begone now and do not return until you are done
translate: 이제 가봐. 일을 끝낼 때까지 돌아오지 마.

original: Not so fast
I have questions!
Oleg pauses a moment and then smiles conspiratorily
translate: 올렉은 잠시 멈칫하더니 음흉하게 미소 짓는다.

original: Kala!
Together we’ll slay brother Butcher and once we feast on his putrid entrails, she’ll make a fine consort for old Oleg!
translate: 함께 도살자 형제를 죽이고 그의 썩은 내장을 먹어 치우면
column3: 그녀는 늙은 올렉의 훌륭한 짝이 될 거야!

original: Go to her!
Tell her that together we shall put an end to the Butcher’s obstinance and win Father’s favor!
translate: 함께 도살자의 고집을 꺾고 아버지의 총애를 얻자고 전해!

original: What do you want?
I have some questions!
The robed cultists stop dead in their tracks as they spot you
translate: 로브를 입은 광신도들이 당신을 발견하고 제자리에 멈춰 선다.

original: You
You're not supposed to be here!
Come here so I can gut you!
Oleg sent me!
INTERLOPER!
DIE!
The Reavers appear taken aback, not knowing what to say
translate: 약탈자들은 당황한 듯 무슨 말을 해야 할지 모른다.

original: Instead they say nothing, whirl around and clamber up the ladder leading to the surface
translate: 대신 그들은 아무 말 없이 돌아서서 지상으로 이어지는 사다리를 기어올라간다.

original: What in the depths are you doing back here?!
translate: 대체 여기서 다시 뭘 하는 거야?!

original: To arms lads!
Yes?
I've taken the tablets for myself!
Can I see them?
Tell me more about them!
The man eyes you suspiciously
They’re none of your fucking business is what they are!
translate: 네가 빌어먹게 상관할 바 아니란 거다!

original: They came to me and me alone!
It was MY nets that caught them and my boat that carried them ashore!
translate: 그걸 건져 올린 건 내 그물이었고
column3: 해변으로 실어 나른 건 내 배였어!

original: Not the Butcher, not Kala and not even Father himself!
ME!
Oleg wipes a drop of sweat from his brow
Now, you best get going
He offers a polite, slight smile
I have more questions!
Oleg chuckles fatherly
Oh my, no
They are for me and me alone
They lie in darkness; safe and untouched by the filth of my wayward siblings
translate: 그것들은 어둠 속에 있어. 내 빗나간 형제들의 더러움이 닿지 않는 안전한 곳에.

original: What can you tell me about them?
translate: 그것들에 대해 뭘 말해줄 수 있지?

original: I had some other questions
The man’s eyes widen in shock and rage
What have you done!?
You’re unraveling the thread!
Are you mad??!
You’ll pay for this!
Oleg instinctively senses the truth in your words and his eyes widen in shock and terror
translate: 올렉은 본능적으로 당신 말의 진실을 감지하고 눈이 충격과 공포로 커진다.

original: Then, utter rage
That upstart!
I gave him a chance to come to my side and he betrays me instead?!
translate: 내 편에 설 기회를 줬는데 배신을 해?!

original: And now you say he intends to make an offering of me?!
We shall see who’s bones will be laid out in the sun to dry come dawn!
translate: 새벽이 오면 누구 뼈가 햇볕에 말려질지 두고 보자고!

original: Children, sharpen your blades!
We’ll get the jump on the upstart yet!
Watch them leave
