original: For a moment you're back on the deck of the Zephyr
translate: 잠시 제피르 호의 갑판으로 돌아간 듯하다.

original: Monstrous tentacles rise above the ship like strange alien towers
translate: 괴물의 촉수가 이상한 외계의 탑처럼 배 위로 솟아오른다.

original: Terrified screams fill the air
You shudder
Kat’s voice snaps you out of it
If we ever get off this bloody island and back to the mainland, the Guild will pay well to have that returned
translate: 우리가 이 빌어먹을 섬을 탈출해서 본토로 돌아간다면, 길드는 그걸 돌려받으려고 후하게 쳐줄 거야.

original: All I ask is you remember who told you about it
Don't worry
We'll split the coin
You can keep the coin
All I want is to be done with the Guild
translate: 난 그냥 길드랑 끝내고 싶을 뿐이야.

original: Be free to wander as I like
translate: 내 맘대로 돌아다니며 자유롭게 살고 싶어.

original: Maybe wander up to my brother and stick a knife in his fat gut
translate: 어쩌면 내 형제를 찾아가서 그 뚱뚱한 배에 칼을 꽂아줄지도 모르고.

original: Your brother?
Twas my older brother who sold me off to the Guild
translate: 날 길드에 팔아넘긴 게 바로 내 형이었어.

original: I was bloody twelve!
Twenty years is what I owe them on account of that bastard
translate: 그 자식 때문에 내가 놈들에게 빚진 세월이 20년이야.

original: I’ve already wasted 10 years
Her voice breaks for a moment before steel creeps back into her otherwise soft features
translate: 그녀의 목소리가 잠시 떨리더니 부드러웠던 표정에 다시 독기가 서린다.

original: Like I said; gutting the bastard will go a long way towards setting things right
translate: 말했듯이 그 자식 배를 가르는 게 일을 바로잡는 데 큰 도움이 될 거야.

original: And the amulet will help you somehow?
Sure, I’m free enough for now, but the Guild doesn’t like to let their assets go and they have a way of catching up with those who jump ship
translate: 물론 지금은 자유롭지만, 길드는 자산을 놓아주는 걸 싫어하고 도망친 놈들을 잡는 방법이 있거든.

original: Even someone as lowly as me
Dangling a recovered captain’s seal in front of them is exactly the kind of thing that might sway them
translate: 되찾은 선장의 인장을 미끼로 던지면 그들이 마음을 돌릴지도 몰라.

original: We'll do what we can!
translate: 할 수 있는 건 다 해보자고!

original: I’m liking you more and more
Let’s start by getting off this bloody island alive!
translate: 일단 이 빌어먹을 섬에서 살아서 나가는 것부터 시작하자!

original: Kat’s eyes narrow slightly as if she tries to get a read on you
translate: 캣은 당신의 속을 읽으려는 듯 눈을 가늘게 뜬다.

original: Let’s just get moving
We might have our work cut out just getting off this bloody island
translate: 이 빌어먹을 섬을 빠져나가는 것만으로도 벅찰지 몰라.

original: You have indeed heard about this type of device before
translate: 이런 종류의 장치에 대해 들어본 적이 있다.

original: As you understand it, it allows the officers of a Nautical Guild ship to operate the vessel’s complicated navigational instruments
translate: 알고 있는 바로는, 항해 길드 선박의 장교들이 배의 복잡한 항해 장비를 조작할 수 있게 해주는 것이다.

original: But more than that, it also serves as a device that records the captain’s log
translate: 하지만 그보다 더 중요한 건 선장 일지를 기록하는 장치 역할도 한다는 것이다.

original: #Chapter1WreckPicker
The man looks at you, eyes wide in genuine surprise and shock
translate: 남자는 눈을 크게 뜨고 진심으로 놀라 충격받은 표정으로 당신을 바라본다.

original: Then a mask of pure rage falls across his face
translate: 이내 그의 얼굴에 순수한 분노가 서린다.

original: You shouldn't be all healthy and like!
Mother Maelstrom offered you up for me!
Basilo will make you stop squirming little fish!
translate: 바실로가 더 이상 꿈틀거리지 못하게 해주마

original: Marita's little runts
Oleg and Anja I think
Spends most of their time playing with their mother in the well
translate: 대부분 시간을 우물 안에서 엄마랑 놀며 보내지.

original: Oh no
Don't worry!
Little ones are right as rain!
Sometimes I even hear them laughing and singing rhymes all night down in the well!
translate: 가끔은 밤새 우물 아래서 웃고 노래하는 소리도 들리는걸!

original: Crabs and critters and such
Growing large and... strange this time of year
Get your leg in their clippers and they'll lob it right off
translate: 집게발에 다리가 걸리면 댕강 잘려나갈 거야.

original: So you best be careful!
But not to worry
Basilo's always given them the laugh - even when he was wee
translate: 바실로는 항상 놈들을 따돌렸으니까. 어릴 때도 그랬지.

original: Must'a been just as big back then
Though it doesn't really feel that way
The old man's brows furrow and for a moment he is lost in deep thought
translate: 노인은 미간을 찌푸리며 잠시 깊은 생각에 잠긴다.

original: In any case
The old man reaches into the leather pouch and pulls out a handful of strange coins that look nothing like standard Imperial coinage
translate: 노인은 가죽 주머니에 손을 넣어 제국 표준 주화와는 전혀 다른 이상한 동전 한 줌을 꺼낸다.

original: Though they are no doubt valuable, they’re covered in greenish grime that make them almost look more like sea-shells than coins
translate: 분명 가치 있는 것이겠지만, 초록색 때로 뒤덮여 있어 동전이라기보단 조개껍데기처럼 보인다.

original: Bounty from the deep!
Handed down from me da’ who got it from me granda’
He used to say granda’ was so strong in the old faith that Mother Maelstrom would let him go down into the deep and visit with them who live there
translate: 할아버지는 신앙심이 깊어서 소용돌이 대모께서 심연으로 내려가 그곳에 사는 자들을 만나게 해주셨다고 아버지가 그랬어.

original: Came back with sacks of this he did
Nice a place as ever you'll see!
Warm fire, roof over your head
Marita’s good to old Basilo letting him stay here
translate: 마르티타는 늙은 바실로가 여기 머물게 해줘서 참 착해.

original: Take care of her in return Basilo does
She spends all her time playing in the yard with her kids these days and she forgets to eat
translate: 요즘은 마당에서 아이들이랑 노느라 밥 먹는 것도 잊어버리거든.

original: Some days I have to feed her to make sure she don’t waste away
translate: 어떤 날은 말라죽지 않게 내가 먹여줘야 해.

original: The old man smiles warmly
There are children here?
The fireplace casts a warm glow across the piles of old fishbones, broken furniture and strange trinkets that litter the ruined home
translate: 벽난로 불빛이 폐허가 된 집안에 널려 있는 오래된 생선 뼈, 부서진 가구, 이상한 장신구 더미를 따뜻하게 비춘다.

original: Basilo hums contently to himself
Let's trade
Where did you get all that coin?
What's wrong with the well?
What happened to this place?
I've choosen to end you!
The Wreck Picker
A lanky man with skin like sun-dried leather stares slack-jawed at you
translate: 햇볕에 말린 가죽 같은 피부를 가진 마른 남자가 입을 벌린 채 당신을 쳐다본다.

original: He’s dressed in rags and with a wide brimmed hat and a large bundle of scrap slung over his shoulder
translate: 그는 누더기를 걸치고 챙이 넓은 모자를 썼으며 어깨에는 고철 덩어리가 든 큰 자루를 메고 있다.

original: Do Basilo’s eyes deceive him?
More ghosts?
Or did the sea spit you back out alive?
translate: 아니면 바다가 널 살려 보낸 건가?

original: Not many are that lucky!
translate: 그렇게 운 좋은 놈은 많지 않은데!

original: Your eyes fall on the crude spiked club that hangs in his belt
translate: 당신의 시선이 그의 허리띠에 매달린 조잡한 스파이크 곤봉에 머문다.

original: Basilo makes his living picking at what the mother of maelstroms does not swallow
translate: 바실로는 소용돌이 대모께서 삼키지 않은 것들을 주워서 먹고살지.

original: And it’s been rich pickings as of late
Crates and barrels and even the odd fleshy morsel!
The man bares a row of blackened teeth in what you assume is a smile
translate: 남자가 검게 변한 치아를 드러내며 미소라고 생각되는 표정을 짓는다.

original: Rich pickings?
What's the club for?
Listen here; Basilo has a proposal for you!
The man smiles in greedy anticipation
translate: 남자가 탐욕스러운 기대를 품고 미소 짓는다.

original: Shore’s bursting with bounty today!
Man can make a fortune if he sets his mind to it
translate: 마음만 먹으면 한몫 챙길 수 있다고.

original: Basilo will be warming his bones up at the old abandoned farm house right behind us
translate: 바실로는 바로 뒤에 있는 낡은 버려진 농가에서 몸 좀 녹이고 있을게.

original: Find me there!
I had some questions
The club is caked in dried blood and of crude design
translate: 곤봉은 말라붙은 피로 떡져 있고 디자인이 조잡하다.

original: It has the look of a tool used well and often
Basilo offers up a chuckle that is chillingly out of place as he pats it
translate: 바실로는 곤봉을 두드리며 소름 끼치게 어울리지 않는 킬킬거리는 웃음소리를 낸다.

original: Every now and then, Mother Maelstrom offers up little fish that have a bit of fight left in them
translate: 가끔 소용돌이 대모께서 아직 팔팔한 물고기들을 올려보내 주시거든.

original: All Basilo does is help put them to rest
translate: 바실로는 그놈들이 편히 쉬게 도와주는 것뿐이야.

original: How many 'fish' did you put to sleep today?
He looks taken aback by the question
Basilo did them all nice
Just like father taught him!
Anyone still squirming gets a knock on his shell till he’s good and floppy
translate: 아직 꿈틀거리는 놈은 축 늘어질 때까지 껍질을 두들겨 주는 거지.

original: Not to worry
Been doing it for years
Used to help my da’ hold em down while he did the knocking
translate: 아버지가 두들기는 동안 내가 잡아주곤 했지.

original: Quick as you like
Basilo offers an eager smile as if to reassure you that he’s very good at what he does
translate: 바실로는 자기가 일을 아주 잘한다는 걸 안심시키려는 듯 열정적인 미소를 짓는다.

original: You murder survivors to steal their belongings?
You monster!
Basilo fidgets in obvious discomfort at not understanding what you’re trying to get at
translate: 바실로는 당신이 무슨 말을 하려는지 이해하지 못해 분명히 불편한 기색으로 안절부절못한다.

original: The drowned men belong to Mother Maelstrom!
translate: 물에 빠진 놈들은 소용돌이 대모의 것이야!

original: Doesn’t matter if a few of them manage to wriggle onto shore for a last gulp of air
translate: 몇 놈이 마지막 숨을 쉬려고 해변으로 기어 올라왔어도 상관없어.

original: They’re drowned men nonetheless and all Basilo is doing is sending them back to where they belong
translate: 어쨌든 물에 빠진 놈들이고 바실로는 그놈들을 원래 있던 곳으로 돌려보내는 것뿐이야.

original: That’s the way we used to do on these islands
Now, most folk have forgotten
But not me
Not Basilo
My family has been here for a long time
You deserve death!
The man slinks off into the fog, heading north
translate: 남자는 북쪽을 향해 안개 속으로 슬그머니 사라진다.

original: As his form dissolves into the nothingness of the mist, you can hear him muttering to himself excitedly
translate: 그의 형체가 안개 속 허공으로 사라질 때, 그가 흥분해서 혼잣말하는 소리가 들린다.

original: No need for Basilo to risk his hide!
You seem fit enough and I’ve got coin!
translate: 너 튼튼해 보이는데 나 돈 좀 있어!

original: I’ll buy whatever you bring me
Might even have a piece or two to sell if you’re interested
translate: 관심 있으면 한두 개 팔 수도 있고.

original: Just beware them clippers
Clippers?
I'd rather end you right here!
Not here out in the cold!
Find Basilo up by the farmhouse
Might even have some soup cooking for you
There's the one who cheated Mother Maelstrom!
translate: 소용돌이 대모를 속인 놈이 여기 있네!

original: And loaded with trinkets for old Basilo perhaps?
translate: 늙은 바실로를 위한 장신구도 잔뜩 가지고 있나?

original: There might be some fine coin in it for you
The old man shakes a worn leather pouch at you that clinks with the sound of coins
translate: 노인이 동전 소리가 짤랑거리는 낡은 가죽 주머니를 흔들어 보인다.

original: Stay as long as ye like
Just don’t drink the water in the well
Best not drink the water there
translate: 거기 물은 안 마시는 게 좋아.

original: Tastes funny and gives you strange dreams
translate: 맛도 이상하고 이상한 꿈을 꾸게 하거든.

original: Besides, the children mostly use it for their games these days
translate: 게다가 요즘은 아이들이 놀 때 주로 쓰니까.

original: #IdraLandingHowl
A blood-curdling howl cuts through the fog
translate: 피가 얼어붙을 듯한 울음소리가 안개를 가른다.

original: Whatever its source, it’s not far away and it sounds dangerous
translate: 무엇이 내는 소리든 멀지 않고 위험해 보인다.

original: It may be unwise to proceed if you are still alone and poorly armed
translate: 아직 혼자이고 무장이 부실하다면 나아가는 것은 현명하지 않을 수 있다.

original: # Chapter_1_Lighthouse
#Chapter1DeadSailors
The stench of rotting flesh fills your nostrils
Ahead of you, grotesquely misshapen crustacean horrors feast greedily on the corpses of the dead crew of the Zephyr
translate: 앞쪽에는 기괴하게 변형된 갑각류 괴물들이 제피르 호의 죽은 선원들의 시체를 탐욕스럽게 먹어 치우고 있다.

original: Blasted horrors!
Kat spits through gritted teeth!
What manner of force has spawned these creatures?
translate: 어떤 힘이 이런 생명체들을 만들어낸 거지?

original: #Chapter1IdraLighthouseCave
The weathered box crumbles as you touch it, revealing an ancient knife of exquisitely carved greenish stone
translate: 손을 대자 낡은 상자가 부서지며 정교하게 조각된 녹색 돌로 만든 고대 단검이 드러난다.

original: With trembling hands you pick it up and for a moment the air around you seems to become charged with eldritch energies
translate: 떨리는 손으로 집어 들자 잠시 주위 공기가 기이한 에너지로 충전되는 듯하다.

original: Sounds die down and your nostrils fill with the metallic tinge of ozone
translate: 소리가 잦아들고 코에는 금속성 오존 냄새가 채워진다.

original: No doubt this is the object Mathias the lighthousekeeper asked you to retrieve
translate: 이것이 등대지기 마티아스가 찾아달라고 했던 물건임이 틀림없다.

original: No doubt the blade is an object of strange and ancient magics
translate: 이 칼날이 기이하고 고대의 마법이 깃든 물건임은 의심할 여지가 없다.

original: A sickly, wet bubbling sound snaps you back into focus
translate: 역겹고 질척거리는 거품 소리에 정신이 번쩍 든다.

original: All around you, the clay jars begin to stir and then, one after another, they burst with loud cracks as a thick substance pours from them
translate: 주변의 점토 항아리들이 들썩이기 시작하더니 하나둘씩 큰 소리를 내며 터지고 걸쭉한 물질이 쏟아져 나온다.

original: To your horror, the viscous substance begins to move of its own volition towards you!
translate: 끔찍하게도 그 끈적한 물질이 제 의지를 가진 듯 당신을 향해 움직이기 시작한다!

original: Driina slowly walks around the slab, taking in the strange sight
translate: 드리나는 천천히 석판 주위를 돌며 기이한 광경을 살펴본다.

original: There is ritual at work here
Though nothing like the Imperial rites of Sepulcation
This is something different
There is a sense of technicality to it
Like children observing a parent practicing some complex craft and trying to emulate it
translate: 마치 아이들이 부모가 복잡한 기술을 부리는 걸 보고 흉내 내려는 것처럼요.

original: She shudders
It terrifies me
The dead stare indignantly at you with empty eye sockets as you examine their naked forms
translate: 나체를 조사하는 동안 죽은 자들은 빈 눈구멍으로 당신을 분개한 듯 쳐다본다.

original: You find several lesions on them - no doubt caused by the strange instruments that surround them
translate: 그들에게서 여러 상처를 발견한다. 주위에 널린 이상한 도구들 때문에 생긴 것이 분명하다.

original: As to the purpose of the cuts, you have no idea
translate: 상처의 목적에 대해서는 전혀 알 수 없다.

original: As you look more closely it becomes clear to you that these are not the incisions that are commonly associated with the removal of organs for embalming
translate: 자세히 보니 방부 처리를 위해 장기를 제거할 때 흔히 내는 절개가 아니라는 것이 분명해진다.

original: In fact, from what you can tell, the corpses’ organs are still intact
translate: 사실 당신이 보기엔 시체의 장기는 그대로 남아 있는 것 같다.

original: This ritual seems to have served another purpose
translate: 이 의식은 다른 목적이 있었던 것 같다.

original: Though what, you cannot possibly guess
Carefully brushing away dust and cobwebs you survey the oddly shaped instruments
translate: 조심스럽게 먼지와 거미줄을 털어내고 기이하게 생긴 도구들을 살펴본다.

original: Their shapes vary from small blades to hooks and other, stranger forms
translate: 작은 칼날부터 갈고리, 그리고 더 이상한 형태까지 다양하다.

original: You have no idea as to their purpose
As you stand there pondering the strange scene before you, your eyes fall on a small wooden box
translate: 눈앞의 기이한 광경을 곰곰이 생각하며 서 있는데, 작은 나무 상자가 눈에 들어온다.

original: Examine the box
Even a cursory examination reveals that these instruments were likely used on the corpses but as far as you can tell they do not seem to be embalming tools
translate: 대충 훑어봐도 이 도구들이 시체에 사용되었을 가능성이 크지만 방부 처리 도구는 아닌 것 같다.

original: Instead they seem more like primitive imitations of the tools Imperial surgeons use
translate: 오히려 제국 외과 의사들이 사용하는 도구를 원시적으로 모방한 것 같다.

original: An Ancient Corpse
Two desiccated corpses lie carefully placed on a carved stone slab
translate: 말라비틀어진 시체 두 구가 조각된 돌판 위에 조심스럽게 놓여 있다.

original: There is a deliberateness in their arrangement that gives the strong impression of forgotten secrets and ancient rituals
translate: 배열에 의도성이 있어 잊힌 비밀과 고대 의식의 인상을 강하게 풍긴다.

original: Scattered about the corpses are several strange looking metal instruments
translate: 시체 주변에는 이상하게 생긴 금속 도구들이 흩어져 있다.

original: Examine the corpses
Driina, what do you make of this?
Examine the instruments
Sprawled on the ground ahead of you lies the mangled body of a man
translate: 앞바닥에 훼손된 남자의 시체가 널브러져 있다.

original: Stacked high against the walls behind the poor fellow are crates of goods and you have a feeling you've stumbled upon a smuggler's hideout
translate: 그 불쌍한 친구 뒤쪽 벽에는 상품 상자가 높이 쌓여 있고
column3: 밀수꾼의 은신처를 우연히 발견한 것 같은 느낌이 든다.

original: One that has seen fairly recent use
You enter into the larger chamber ahead and the temperature drops noticeably
translate: 앞쪽의 더 큰 방으로 들어가자 온도가 눈에 띄게 떨어진다.

original: As the swirling dust and ghostly vapors subside, you make out the intimidating form of an ancient, carved monolith
translate: 소용돌이치는 먼지와 유령 같은 증기가 가라앉자, 고대 조각이 새겨진 거석의 위압적인 형태가 드러난다.

original: Painted on its face, you immediately recognize the crude spiral sign you saw on the standing stones above ground
translate: 표면에 그려진 것은 지상의 선돌에서 보았던 조잡한 나선형 표식임을 즉시 알아본다.

original: Painted on its face, you can make out the crude shape of a red spiral
translate: 표면에 붉은색 나선형의 조잡한 모양이 그려져 있는 것을 알아볼 수 있다.

original: Carefully arranged before the monolith lies two diminutive, desiccated corpses and along the edges of the chamber stand strange urns of unknown design
translate: 거석 앞에는 작고 말라비틀어진 시체 두 구가 정성스럽게 놓여 있고, 방 가장자리에는 알 수 없는 디자인의 기이한 항아리들이 서 있다.

original: The chamber has an aura of age beyond comprehension and your head begins to spin as you realize you may be the first to set foot in it for millennia
translate: 이 방은 이해할 수 없을 만큼 오래된 분위기를 풍기고
column3: 수천 년 만에 이곳에 발을 들인 첫 번째 사람일지도 모른다는 생각에 현기증이 난다.

original: We shouldn't be here
translate: 여기 있으면 안 될 것 같아.

original: Kat whispers behind you
The Tunnel
Creeping through the narrow and cobweb covered tunnel it occurs to you that you’re likely the first to use it in decades
translate: 좁고 거미줄로 뒤덮인 터널을 기어가다 보니 수십 년 만에 처음 이용하는 사람일 거라는 생각이 든다.

original: It appears that neither the smugglers, nor whoever lies on the other end of the tunnel, knew of its existence
translate: 밀수꾼들도, 터널 반대편에 있는 그 누구도 이 존재를 몰랐던 것 같다.

original: The wall ahead is no doubt another door and you put your shoulder to it
translate: 앞쪽 벽은 분명 또 다른 문일 것이라 생각하고 어깨로 밀어본다.

original: Expecting the massive slab of rock to be heavy, you're surprised to find it easily swings open and you nearly stumble into the room ahead
translate: 거대한 바위판이 무거울 거라 예상했지만, 놀랍게도 쉽게 열려 하마터면 앞방으로 넘어질 뻔한다.

original: It occurs to you that given the doors clever design, there would likely have been no way of finding this door from the other side
translate: 문의 교묘한 디자인을 보니 반대편에서는 이 문을 찾을 방법이 없었을 것 같다.

original: #Chapter1Lighthouse
Mathias seems troubled by the questions and shifts uncomfortably
translate: 마티아스는 질문에 곤란해하며 불편한 기색을 보인다.

original: Had an assistant
Caspar
Went mad, the fool did!
Had a head full of grand ideas and I kept telling him
translate: 머릿속에 거창한 생각만 가득해서 내가 계속 말해줬지.

original: This here is a place for the quiet mind
Threw himself from the tower
Found him broken on the cliffs
I can’t be blamed!
Mathias’ jaw quivers and his eyes water over
translate: 마티아스의 턱이 떨리고 눈에 눈물이 고인다.

original: Mathias begins sobbing
I should have known
Gotten him off this rock
When he started talking about the cave and something about a blade calling him I should have known
translate: 동굴이랑 자기를 부르는 칼날 얘기를 시작했을 때 알았어야 했어.

original: I could have saved him but I couldn’t bear the thought of being alone again
translate: 구할 수도 있었는데 다시 혼자가 된다는 생각을 견딜 수가 없었어.

original: The silence is unbearable!
Ask about the cave and blade
He would babble about the cave underneath here for hours
translate: 여기 밑에 있는 동굴에 대해 몇 시간이고 떠들어대곤 했지.

original: I’d tell him those were smuggler’s caves and that he was to leave them alone!
translate: 난 그건 밀수꾼 동굴이니까 건드리지 말라고 했어!

original: Smugglers keep to themselves but no telling what they’ll do if you bother em
translate: 밀수꾼들은 자기들끼리만 지내지만 건드리면 무슨 짓을 할지 모른다고.

original: As to the 'blade' he talked about, that must’ve been the ravings of a mad man?
A soul lost to drink and loneliness!
Oh poor boy
Mathias wipes his eyes and exhales wearily
translate: 마티아스는 눈물을 닦고 지친 듯 숨을 내쉰다.

original: Then again
What if it is down there?
The black blade
Hidden in some ancient recess, glistening in the dark
translate: 고대의 틈새에 숨겨져 어둠 속에서 번들거리는 그것.

original: Mathias’ gaze grows distant for a moment
translate: 마티아스의 시선이 잠시 먼 곳을 향한다.

original: If it is, we needs to retrieve the blasted thing and destroy it!
translate: 만약 있다면, 그 빌어먹을 물건을 회수해서 파괴해야 해!

original: And that's where I come in?
Would you help an old man set things right?
I’ll make it worth your while!
Find that black blade and bring it here
translate: 그 검은 칼날을 찾아서 여기로 가져와.

original: I needs to see the thing that took Caspar at least once before we destroy it!
translate: 부수기 전에 카스파를 데려간 그 물건을 적어도 한 번은 봐야겠어!

original: The entrance to the cave lies in the gully underneath the broken bridge
translate: 동굴 입구는 부서진 다리 밑 협곡에 있어.

original: Be careful!
I think I've already found the blade in question
translate: 말씀하신 칼날을 이미 찾은 것 같아요.

original: You mentioned smugglers?
I should get going
Go to the smuggler-caves beneath the lighthouse and seek the blade that Caspar saw in his dreams
translate: 등대 밑 밀수꾼 동굴로 가서 카스파가 꿈에서 봤던 그 칼날을 찾아봐.

original: You’ll find the cave entrance underneath the broken bridge but once inside I know nothing save that the blade lies in deepest darkness
translate: 입구는 부서진 다리 밑에 있지만 안으로 들어가면 칼날이 가장 깊은 어둠 속에 있다는 것 말고는 아는 게 없어.

original: Show the ancient dagger
I had a few more questions!
Show it!
the old man stammers excitedly
As you reveal the blade to him, his eyes widen and he tentatively reaches out for it
translate: 칼날을 보여주자 눈이 커지며 조심스럽게 손을 뻗는다.

original: It’s… beautiful
Then his jaw clenches in determination and he recoils in apparent disgust
translate: 그러다 결심한 듯 턱을 앙다물고 역겨운 듯 뒤로 물러선다.

original: But it’s evil
Cursed I tell you!
Don’t you feel it?
It has power!
And hunger
I want nothing to do with this
Take it and bring it far away from here
Destroy it!
All I would ask is you don’t throw it in the ocean
There are beings there that would wield it
In any case, I promised to make it worth your while and I will
Take this!
The old man hands you an amulet
This’ll serve you well on your journeys
It’ll keep your body strong and free of disease!
translate: 몸을 튼튼하게 하고 병에 걸리지 않게 해주지!

original: That being said, I would ask another thing of you
translate: 그건 그렇고, 하나 더 부탁할 게 있는데.

original: Horryn went dark, about the same time the animals ran amok
translate: 동물들이 날뛰기 시작한 무렵 호린이 어둠에 잠겼어.

original: There was smoke on the wind - and screams too, I could swear it
translate: 바람에 연기가 실려 왔고 비명 소리도 들렸지, 맹세해.

original: Sounded like battle
Or perhaps slaughter is more like it
But I think there is a camp of sorts just north of town
translate: 마을 바로 북쪽에 캠프 같은 게 있는 것 같아.

original: Ragged tents and such
Survivors perhaps?
I thought about going there to see for myself
But I changed my mind
The old man hangs his head dejectedly, before continuing in a whisper
translate: 노인은 낙담한 듯 고개를 떨구더니 속삭이듯 말을 잇는다.

original: Safer here
Tending to the light
As you enter the lighthouse gallery, a haggard face peers out at you from the gloom
translate: 등대 갤러리에 들어서자 어둠 속에서 수척한 얼굴이 당신을 쳐다본다.

original: Moving closer, you see it belongs to an old man, who clutches a makeshift spear tightly to his chest
translate: 가까이 다가가니 임시로 만든 창을 가슴에 꼭 껴안은 노인이다.

original: Somehow he looks both fearful yet greatly relieved to see you
translate: 왠지 두려워하면서도 당신을 보고 안도하는 눈치다.

original: Mother of maelstroms!
The man croaks
Who are ye, then?
Who did I summon?
Come, sit, you must be weary
Sit!
The man gestures frantically to a battered chair in the corner
translate: 남자는 구석에 있는 낡은 의자를 향해 미친 듯이 손짓한다.

original: Travellers
Nothing more
I was shipwrecked here
By something foul
Either way, the tides have brought ye to me!
I knew my signals and prayers would be answered
translate: 내 신호와 기도가 응답받을 줄 알았어.

original: The mother of maelstroms is a cruel mistress, it must be said, it's only fit she repays me in such a darkened hour
translate: 소용돌이 대모는 잔인한 여주인이지만, 이런 암흑의 시간에 보답해 주시는 게 마땅하지.

original: What happened here?
We were shipwrecked
By a leviathan
Something foul is growing on Idra
A taint on the land!
There are lights!
Lights as you've never seen; like those sailors from the high north talk of
translate: 한 번도 본 적 없는 빛들

original: But the colors
It's like they bleed into your very dreams!
If you can manage to sleep that is
It got to the animals first though
Warped them in both mind and body!
Made 'em cruel and dangerous
I ain't never seen nothing like it!
It's unnatural I tell you!
But worse still, Horryn is dead as a tomb!
translate: 하지만 더 최악인 건, 호린이 무덤처럼 죽어버렸다는 거야!

original: Was a right bedlam of cries and screams two days ago - then nothing!
translate: 이틀 전만 해도 울음과 비명으로 아수라장이었는데

original: Not as much as a lit candle at night!
translate: 밤에 촛불 하나 켜진 게 없다고!

original: Only the deep itself knows the truth of these happenings, but I can tell you this: the island is doomed!
translate: 심연만이 진실을 알겠지만 이건 말해줄 수 있어. 이 섬은 끝장났어!

original: The sea itself will rise to claim us!
I need some information
Foolish superstition
I need proper information!
There are all manner of beasts in the deep oceans of our world, but never have I seen anything like this!
translate: 세상 깊은 바다엔 온갖 짐승이 다 있다지만 이런 건 본 적이 없어!

original: A horror from beyond the natural it was, that pulled down that ship!
translate: 그 배를 끌어내린 건 자연을 초월한 공포였어!

original: I saw it all from my tower I did
Though I wish I did not have to bear such a sight
translate: 그런 광경을 보지 않았으면 좋았을 텐데.

original: I can hardly belive that anyone could survive such a nightmare
translate: 그런 악몽 속에서 살아남은 사람이 있다는 게 믿기지 않아.

original: I did
It matters not
How then did the tides release you, when so many others were claimed?
translate: 그 많은 사람이 희생됐는데 어떻게 조류가 자네를 놓아줬을까?

original: The keeper leans in and fixes you with an unwavering gaze
translate: 등대지기가 몸을 기울여 흔들림 없는 눈빛으로 당신을 바라본다.

original: Are you blessed?
Or perhaps cursed is more like it?
Cursed?
Neither, I think
Now, what happened here?
Oh you have more important matters to deal with?
Well, I must keep watching...seeing
translate: 음, 난 계속 지켜봐야 해... 봐야 해.

original: The old man trails off, eyes unfocusing
translate: 노인은 눈의 초점을 잃으며 말끝을 흐린다.

original: Forgive me for not being of more help
We really need to go
You're a fool to go!
There is nothing beyond the light but despair!
And
The old man sighs
But, I'll be here waiting here for you
For when you return
As I must
Anything, ye may ask!
We're safe as can be here
The old man seems eager at the prospect of conversation
translate: 노인은 대화할 상대가 생겨 들뜬 것 같다.

original: Ask about the Santa Fury
How long have you been alone?
There are smugglers on Idra?
Tell me about Horryn
What did you need me to do again?
Remind me what you needed!
Actually, I should make ready to leave
This here beacon is all's keeping the horrors of this island from my throat!
translate: 이 불빛만이 이 섬의 공포로부터 내 목숨을 지켜주고 있어!

original: Thing is, oil is running low and I got nary a drop left in storage
translate: 문제는 기름이 떨어져 가는데 창고엔 한 방울도 안 남았다는 거야.

original: I need you to find me some oil afore darkness takes us!
translate: 어둠이 우릴 삼키기 전에 기름을 좀 구해다 줘!

original: Thing is, the oil was coming from the mainland on ships through Horryn
translate: 기름은 본토에서 배로 호린을 통해 들어왔거든.

original: Then things went dark and now there’s no way for me to get to it
translate: 그런데 어두워지고 나서부턴 구할 방법이 없어졌어.

original: If it’s still in Horryn, there’s a good chance it’ll be sitting in one of the warehouses in the harbor
translate: 아직 호린에 있다면 항구 창고 중 하나에 있을 가능성이 커.

original: I'll do my best
Show oil
That’s all I ask
I’ll be waiting here for you, tending the fire as best I can
I’m running out of oil!
I suspect the shipment is stuck in a warehouse in Horryn and I need you to search for it there
translate: 호린 창고에 물건이 묶여 있는 것 같으니 거기서 찾아봐 줘.

original: You’ll likely find it in one of the warehouses on the waterfront
translate: 부둣가 창고 중 하나에 있을 거야.

original: Give oil
Blessed Dead, I knew you could do it!
translate: 축복받은 망자시여, 자네가 해낼 줄 알았어!

original: If nothing else, seeing the light still burning bright is bound to give people hope!
translate: 적어도 불빛이 밝게 타오르는 걸 보면 사람들에게 희망을 줄 수 있을 거야!

original: Emperor’s Light and all!
Let's hope so!
All I have to offer in way of reward is my old sword
translate: 보상으로 줄 수 있는 건 내 낡은 검뿐이야.

original: It once served me well but it's getting too heavy for me now
translate: 한때는 잘 썼지만 이젠 내겐 너무 무거워.

original: Mathias produces an old, but well-crafted broadsword wrapped in cloth
translate: 마티아스는 천에 싸인 낡지만 잘 만들어진 브로드소드를 꺼낸다.

original: I'll be on my way now
Ye're back
I knew ye'd seek safe harbor once more, drawn to the light like lost moths
translate: 길 잃은 나방처럼 빛에 이끌려 다시 안전한 항구를 찾을 줄 알았지.

original: Well then; Sit, rest, make yourself at home
translate: 자, 그럼 앉아서 좀 쉬게. 내 집처럼 편하게.

original: There might still be some stew left
I found the black blade
I have oil for you!
I don't have time to linger!
I can't say I've ever heard about a ship by that name
translate: 그런 이름의 배는 들어본 적 없는데.

original: And let me tell you, I've worked this lighthouse for a man’s age and I’ll say this much
translate: 내가 평생 이 등대에서 일했지만 이건 확실히 말할 수 있어.

original: There’s no ship to be found around here as far as I know!
translate: 내가 아는 한 이 근처엔 배가 없어!

original: Idra's thick with them
Carrying wares to the mainland for the Freythen
translate: 프레이마크 놈들을 위해 본토로 물건을 나르는 놈들 말이야.

original: Island’s riddled with caves and they use them to store their contraband and whatnot
translate: 섬은 동굴투성이라 놈들이 밀수품 같은 걸 저장하는 데 쓰거든.

original: But they keep to themselves and I want no trouble so I let them be
translate: 하지만 자기들끼리만 지내고 나도 문제 만들고 싶지 않아서 그냥 내버려 둬.

original: #Chapter1LighthouseMisc
For all its alienness, you still recognize the arcane machinery
translate: 이질적이지만 신비한 기계장치임을 알아볼 수 있다.

original: An ancient Imperial reticular node
You suspect this lighthouse was once fueled by reticular energy and that this machine was part of its operation
translate: 이 등대는 한때 그물형 에너지를 동력으로 사용했고 이 기계가 그 작동의 일부였을 것으로 추정된다.

original: The stillness and layer of dust, however, tell you that it's long since fallen into disrepair and that the lighthouse is likely now fueled by common oil
translate: 하지만 고요함과 먼지 층은 오랫동안 방치되었음을 말해주며, 지금은 등대가 일반 기름으로 가동되고 있을 가능성이 크다.

original: As you stand there, beholding the strange machine, you become aware of the scraping of tiny claws in the darkness
translate: 기이한 기계를 바라보며 서 있는데 어둠 속에서 작은 발톱이 긁히는 소리가 들린다.

original: Then chittering
As you reach for your weapon the strange harmonics of the chittering converge and for the briefest of moments you could have sworn you heard words formed
translate: 무기에 손을 뻗자 기이한 화음의 찍찍 소리가 하나로 모이고 아주 잠깐 말이 만들어지는 듯한 소리를 들은 것 같다.

original: Half a dozen beasts launch at you from the dark corners of the room with fangs bared!
translate: 방구석 어둠 속에서 여섯 마리의 짐승이 송곳니를 드러내며 당신에게 달려든다!

original: Creeping through the moldy lighthouse cellar you round a corner and stop dead in your tracks
translate: 곰팡내 나는 등대 지하실을 살금살금 지나 모퉁이를 돌다 제자리에 멈춰 선다.

original: Rising up through the core of the tower, is a grotesque-looking metallic monstrosity
translate: 탑의 중심부를 뚫고 올라온 기괴한 금속 괴물이 있다.

original: The strangely organic shapes and odd geometries seem to writhe in the dim light and the burnished sylver coating casts a ghostly reflection on the walls
translate: 기묘하게 유기적인 형태와 기하학적 구조가 희미한 빛 속에서 꿈틀거리는 듯하고
column3: 윤이 나는 은색 코팅은 벽에 유령 같은 반사를 드리운다.

original: #Chapter1LighthouseQuest
There is nothing more you can do for me right now
translate: 지금으로선 날 위해 더 해줄 수 있는 게 없어.

original: What of it?
What can I do to help?
About that job
Remind me what you need
I have the oil!
Glad to help
Mathias stares absent mindedly into the fire
I was wondering about something else
It's time to leave
#Chapter1UWMaze
You utter an underwater scream of pain and terror but before you can act further, the creature has retreated back into one of the holes
translate: 당신은 물속에서 고통과 공포의 비명을 지르지만, 더 이상 어찌해 볼 틈도 없이 그 생물은 구멍 속으로 사라져 버린다.

original: Swim south
Quickly rummaging through the poor fellows belongings, you try not to think about your own dwindling air supply
translate: 줄어드는 공기를 생각하지 않으려 애쓰며 불쌍한 녀석의 소지품을 재빨리 뒤진다.

original: In a pouch on his belt you find a handful of coins and a key
translate: 허리띠 주머니에서 동전 한 줌과 열쇠를 발견한다.

original: Now, you’ve lingered too long already and you must move on
translate: 자, 이미 너무 오래 지체했다. 이동해야 한다.

original: Tunnels lead to the north and west
Swim north
Swim west
You break the surface and find yourself back in the cave system where you started
translate: 수면 위로 올라오자 처음 시작했던 동굴로 되돌아왔음을 알게 된다.

original: For all its bleakness, you nonetheless feel a sense of relief at returning to this area
translate: 황량함에도 불구하고 이곳으로 돌아오니 안도감이 든다.

original: You break the surface and emerge into an alien world
translate: 수면 위로 올라오자 낯선 세계가 펼쳐진다.

original: The air is stale and damp and the walls are so covered in algae and fungus that they almost appear to writhe
translate: 공기는 탁하고 축축하며 벽은 이끼와 곰팡이로 뒤덮여 꿈틀거리는 것 같다.

original: In the faint bioluminescence of the cave's bizarre underwater flora, you make out three passages
translate: 동굴의 기이한 수중 식물이 내뿜는 희미한 생체 발광 속에서 세 개의 통로를 확인한다.

original: North and east takes you further into the cave system whilst west leads back to the surface
translate: 북쪽과 동쪽은 동굴 깊은 곳으로 이어지고 서쪽은 수면으로 이어진다.

original: Swim east
A large domed chamber
Writing sea-weed covers the floor and reaches up towards you like groping tentacles
translate: 꿈틀거리는 해초가 바닥을 뒤덮고 촉수처럼 당신을 향해 뻗어온다.

original: You shudder as one of the slimy tendrils brush your skin
translate: 끈적한 덩굴손 하나가 피부를 스치자 당신은 몸서리친다.

original: Three tunnels lead out of this chamber
translate: 이 방에서 세 개의 터널이 나 있다.

original: East, west and south
The tunnel narrows somewhat here before opening up into a slightly larger chamber with two exits
translate: 터널이 다소 좁아지다가 두 개의 출구가 있는 약간 더 큰 방으로 이어진다.

original: West and south
The bioluminescence is so faint in this chamber that you almost fail to spot the tunnels leading north and east
translate: 이 방은 생체 발광이 너무 희미해서 북쪽과 동쪽으로 이어지는 터널을 놓칠 뻔한다.

original: Suspended in the middle of this chamber is the corpse of a young man
translate: 방 한가운데 젊은 남자의 시체가 떠 있다.

original: His features are softened by the sickly glow of the algae growing here but there is no mistaking the mask of terror that froze on his face as he drowned
translate: 이끼의 창백한 빛 때문에 얼굴 윤곽은 흐릿하지만 익사할 때의 공포가 서려 있는 표정만은 분명하다.

original: A bend where the tunnel leads east or south
Sharp limpet-like growths cover the wall and you take care not to cut yourself as you squeeze past
translate: 삿갓조개 같은 날카로운 돌기가 벽을 뒤덮고 있어 좁은 틈을 지나갈 때 베이지 않도록 조심해야 한다.

original: This chamber is flat with a low ceiling and three tunnels leading north, east and west
translate: 이 방은 천장이 낮고 평평하며 북쪽, 동쪽, 서쪽으로 세 개의 터널이 나 있다.

original: The walls of this bulbous chamber are pockmarked with a dozen smaller tube-like holes leading deeper into the bedrock
translate: 전구 모양의 이 방 벽에는 암반 깊숙이 이어지는 십여 개의 작은 관 같은 구멍이 뚫려 있다.

original: As you contemplate the folly of sticking your hand into one of them, an eel-like creature darts from one of the holes and bites into your flesh with tiny, razor sharp fangs
translate: 구멍에 손을 넣는 어리석은 짓을 할까 고민하던 중 뱀장어 같은 생물이 구멍에서 튀어나와 작고 날카로운 송곳니로 당신의 살을 문다.

original: This chamber is bathed in a greenish glow coming from the eastern tunnel that leads to the surface
translate: 이 방은 수면으로 이어지는 동쪽 터널에서 새어 나오는 녹색 빛으로 물들어 있다.

original: The western exit leads deeper into the cave system
translate: 서쪽 출구는 동굴 깊은 곳으로 이어진다.

original: Underwater Tunnel
You find yourself at the opening of a narrow underwater tunnel and wonder how long you can hold your breath
translate: 좁은 수중 터널 입구에 다다르자 얼마나 숨을 참을 수 있을지 걱정된다.

original: Do you dive in?
Dive into the tunnel
This narrow underwater tunnel serves as the only exit from this cave
translate: 이 좁은 수중 터널만이 이 동굴의 유일한 출구다.

original: You hope you remember the way back
#SantaFury
Carylla
A sinewy, armored woman with a shield slung on her back and a broadsword at her side stands by a small campfire
translate: 등에 방패를 메고 옆구리에 브로드소드를 찬 근육질의 무장한 여성이 작은 모닥불 옆에 서 있다.

original: She’s grunting and cursing under her breath as she clumsily tries to bind a wound on her arm
translate: 그녀는 팔의 상처를 어설프게 묶으며 신음하고 나지막이 욕을 내뱉는다.

original: Dried blood and mud cakes her face and armor and she looks haggard
translate: 얼굴과 갑옷은 말라붙은 피와 진흙으로 엉망이고 몹시 초췌해 보인다.

original: She freezes as she sees you emerge from the fog
translate: 안개 속에서 당신이 나타나자 그녀는 얼어붙는다.

original: A suspicious frown falls over her face
translate: 그녀의 얼굴에 의심 어린 표정이 스친다.

original: Let me help you!
she growls as she finishes the tourniquet using her good arm and teeth
translate: 그녀는 성한 팔과 이빨로 지혈대를 묶으며 으르렁거린다.

original: Bless you for offering but I can manage
translate: 마음은 고맙지만 혼자 할 수 있어.

original: I would kill for some water though!
translate: 물 한 모금 마실 수 있다면 소원이 없겠군!

original: Offer her a drink from your waterskin
Name’s Carylla
Used to call myself captain of our little mercenary company
Some rich trader from Adler’s paid us well to come here and look for the Fury
translate: 아들러의 어떤 부자 상인이 퓨리 호를 찾아달라고 거금을 줬거든.

original: Things went to shit quickly
I’ve been losing my crew one by one
Nillas and Pieter ‘got their coins’ yesterday
Torn to pieces by those fucking hounds
translate: 그 빌어먹을 사냥개들에게 갈기갈기 찢겨서 말이야.

original: It’s just me now
What’s the Fury?
Carylla packs up her gear and begins to carefully make her way through the mist until she’s gone
translate: 카릴라는 짐을 챙겨 안개 속으로 조심스럽게 사라진다.

original: I would hate to see you spill your guts on this bloody island looking for some ghost-ship
translate: 유령선을 찾는답시고 이 피 비린내 나는 섬에서 네 내장이 쏟아지는 꼴은 보고 싶지 않군.

original: Then again, you might have better luck then me and my
translate: 하긴, 나나 내 부하들보단 운이 좋을 수도 있겠지.

original: Carylla stops briefly and her eyes water up
translate: 카릴라는 잠시 말을 멈추고 눈시울을 붉힌다.

original: Just be careful
Idra’s not peaceful any more and I suspect there are things out in the mist far worse than the hounds
translate: 이드라는 더 이상 평화롭지 않아. 안개 속엔 사냥개보다 훨씬 끔찍한 것들이 있을지도 몰라.

original: Honestly I don’t know where to start
There were lights in the sky
Flashes and orbs
Some over Horryn and others over the island’s interior
Minor quakes even
And then things went real bad
translate: 그러고 나서 상황이 정말 안 좋아졌어.

original: People lost their minds and animals started changing
What terrifies me is I can’t even tell you how long that was ago!
translate: 무서운 건 그게 얼마나 전 일인지조차 모르겠다는 거야!

original: Her voice rises in an anxious tone
I just need to get away from here!
Off this fucking rock!
What will you do now?
I’ll try to make my way east, around the bay
Maybe there are larger groups of survivors there and perhaps even someone with a way of getting away from here
translate: 거기엔 더 큰 생존자 무리가 있을지도 모르고
column3: 어쩌면 여기서 탈출할 방법을 가진 사람이 있을지도 모르니까.

original: And if you ever find that bloody treasure, buy me a drink next time we run into each other
translate: 그리고 그 피 묻은 보물을 찾게 되면, 다음에 만날 때 술이나 한 잔 사.

original: A Painting
Hanging on the wall, you see a dramatic but not particularly artful painting of a ship with torn sails caught in a terrible storm
translate: 벽에는 찢어진 돛을 달고 끔찍한 폭풍에 휘말린 배를 그린, 극적이지만 딱히 예술적이지는 않은 그림이 걸려 있다.

original: Your mind wanders to the Zephyr and its grizzly fate and you shudder
translate: 제피르 호와 그 끔찍한 최후가 떠올라 몸서리쳐진다.

original: Look closer
Leaning in you notice that there is a name painted on the side of the ship
translate: 가까이 다가가니 배 옆면에 이름이 적혀 있는 것이 보인다.

original: The Santa Fury
Could this be it?
Is this what the rumor that the Santa Fury could be found near the lighthouse on Idra meant?
translate: 산타 퓨리 호를 이드라 등대 근처에서 찾을 수 있다는 소문이 이걸 말하는 거였나?

original: Examine the painting even closer
Examining the painting more carefully reveals nothing
translate: 그림을 더 자세히 살펴봐도 별다른 것은 없다.

original: Not until you turn it over!
Written in faint lettering in the lower left corner of the painting's backside you can clearly make out a poem of sorts
translate: 그림 뒷면 왼쪽 하단 구석에 희미한 글씨로 쓰인 시 같은 것을 발견한다.

original: The Poem
From the center of the three, The Santy Fury made her flight
Setting out to hide her booty, All within the lighthouse's sight
translate: 약탈품을 숨기려 떠났지, 등대가 보이는 곳으로.

original: leagues south began her trip, "5 east" the Captain cried. 4 more north, our valiant ship, Our plunder we shall hide!
translate: 남쪽으로 수 리를 항해하다, "동쪽으로 5" 선장이 외쳤네. 북쪽으로 4 더, 용감한 우리 배, 전리품을 숨기리라!

original: Land ahoy!
went up the roar
We'll lay our treasure there!
Into the rising sun: 3 more, Then dig and have no fear!
translate: 떠오르는 태양을 향해: 3 더, 그리고 파라, 두려워 말고!

original: You hastily take down the poem in your journal
Excitement washes over you as you realize that you may in fact be on the trail of something more than an old sailor’s tale!
translate: 단순한 뱃사람들의 옛날이야기 그 이상의 무언가를 추적하고 있을지 모른다는 생각에 흥분이 밀려온다!

original: If you can make sense of the poem that is
translate: 시의 의미를 파악할 수 있다면 말이다.

original: A wise call
You may go far yet
But a friendly piece of advice between colleagues
Don’t search for us
Forget this ever happened and move on
translate: 이 일은 잊고 갈 길 가라고.

original: She offers a short bow before the group dissolves back into the fog with the idol in hand
translate: 그녀는 짧게 목례하고 우상을 든 채 일행과 함께 안개 속으로 사라진다.

original: Silence descends around you as you pick up the jewelry left behind
translate: 남겨진 보석을 줍는 동안 주위엔 정적이 흐른다.

original: It will certainly fetch a nice purse
translate: 분명 꽤 비싼 값에 팔릴 것이다.

original: Yet you cannot shake the image of that grotesque idol from your mind
translate: 하지만 그 기괴한 우상의 이미지가 머릿속에서 떠나지 않는다.

original: Part of you prays you never see it again whilst another knows with absolute certainty you will
column3: 한편으로는 반드시 다시 보게 될 것임을 확신한다.

original: What!
Never heard of the Santa Fury?
translate: 산타 퓨리 호에 대해 못 들어봤어?

original: She was an Ombarian treasure-ship, they say
Disappeared around 40 cycles ago and it’s said she was laden heavy when she went
translate: 40주기쯤 전에 사라졌는데 엄청난 보물을 싣고 있었다고 해.

original: People been looking for her ever since
Me, I never put any stock in the legend
translate: 난 그런 전설 따위 믿지 않았어.

original: Sailor’s tale
But then this rich fop from Adler’s up and offered to pay me and my company to go here and look for it
translate: 그런데 아들러의 돈 많은 멍청이가 여기 와서 찾아달라고 돈을 주겠다는 거야.

original: Well, 'easy money' we thought
Idra’s not huge and according to the trader, rumor had it she lay on dry land near the lighthouse
translate: 이드라는 크지도 않고 상인 말로는 등대 근처 육지에 있다는 소문이 있다니까.

original: And there’s only one lighthouse on Idra see, so sounded easy enough
translate: 그리고 이드라에 등대는 하나뿐이니 쉬울 것 같았지.

original: No reason to expect any bloodshed either
translate: 피 볼 일도 없을 것 같았고.

original: Idra used to be nice and peaceful
Our steel was mostly in case we did find it and needed to guard any treasure
translate: 우리가 칼을 찬 건 보물을 찾았을 때 지키기 위해서였지.

original: Needless to say, that’s not how it went
You didn’t find anything?
Not a scrap
We've searched every inch of this island and let me tell you
translate: 이 섬 구석구석 다 뒤져봤는데 말해두지만

original: The Santa Fury’s not here!
It bloody can’t be!
A fucking ship on dry land?
And near the lighthouse nonetheless?
It does not exist!
Mind if I give it a go?
Buried Treasure
Digging through the rocky soil, you’re almost ready to give up then your shovel suddenly strikes something metallic
translate: 바위투성이 땅을 파다가 거의 포기하려던 찰나, 삽 끝에 금속이 닿는 느낌이 든다.

original: A small but sturdy strong-box
Though it appears to have something inside, this is far from the fabled mountains of gold that Ombarian treasure-ships were said to carry
translate: 안에 뭔가 들어있는 것 같지만, 옴바리아 보물선이 싣고 다닌다는 전설 속 황금 산과는 거리가 멀다.

original: Open the box
The box swings open without difficulty
Inside lies a small pile of strange and exotic looking jewelry
translate: 안에는 기이하고 이국적인 보석이 조금 들어 있다.

original: And underneath it: an artifact wrapped in rough linen
translate: 그리고 그 아래 거친 린넨으로 싸인 유물이 있다.

original: As you reach for it, a ringing rises in your ears and you go light headed
translate: 손을 뻗자 귀에서 이명이 들리고 현기증이 난다.

original: Excitement?
Something else
The bundle tumbles from your hands and as it does, it becomes unwrapped
Laying on the ground in front of you is a hideous idol carved from some unknown greenish-black rock
translate: 눈앞 땅바닥에는 알 수 없는 녹흑색 암석을 깎아 만든 흉측한 우상이 놓여 있다.

original: An amorphous shape of eyes, mouths and tentacles that manages to convey a sense of immensity in spite of the effigy’s small size
translate: 눈, 입, 촉수가 뒤엉킨 부정형의 형상은 작은 크기에도 불구하고 거대한 느낌을 준다.

original: Hand over the idol
The voice cuts through the mist like a dagger
You turn around to see Carylla and a handful of other shapes approaching threateningly with weapons drawn
translate: 돌아보니 카릴라와 몇몇 인영이 무기를 들고 위협적으로 다가오고 있다.

original: I can’t bloody believe it!
It worked!
I told you all it would
one of the men flanking Carylla rants excitedly before she cuts him off with a poisonous glance
translate: 카릴라 옆에 있던 남자가 흥분해서 떠들자 그녀가 독기 어린 눈빛으로 말을 끊는다.

original: Shut your bloody trap Pieter!
You!
she points her sword towards you
Hand over the idol!
Kick it over
Not going to happen!
The men I work for
They will go so much further than just spilling your blood to get what they seek
translate: 원하는 걸 얻기 위해서라면 피 보는 것쯤은 아무것도 아니야.

original: A smile, strangely sympathetic, flashes over her face
translate: 그녀의 얼굴에 묘하게 동정적인 미소가 스친다.

original: Then she clicks her tongue and the men flanking her charge!
translate: 그녀가 혀를 차자 옆에 있던 남자들이 달려든다!

original: # Chapter_1_RefugeeCamp
#Chapter1Chamberlain
From what I hear, these men were bands of local fishermen and sailors!
translate: 듣자 하니 이놈들은 현지 어부와 선원 무리라더군요!

original: But why would they do something like this?
translate: 근데 그들이 왜 이런 짓을 하죠?

original: Horryn was their home and for all his shortcomings, there were few Imperial officials as lenient as the governor!
translate: 호린은 그들의 고향이고, 총독이 부족하긴 해도 그만큼 관대한 제국 관리는 드물었는데 말입니다!

original: Where is the governor now?
I didn't see him as we fle
I mean 'made our strategic retreat'
I can only assume he died in the chaos
translate: 혼란 속에서 죽었다고 추측할 수밖에 없소.

original: And the cruelest joke of all
That leaves me the ranking Imperial Official on the island
translate: 내가 이 섬에서 가장 높은 제국 관리가 됐다는 거지.

original: Farewell for now
Driina scowls at you
Markus shakes his head dejectedly
I’m certainly not going to beg you for aid
But I’ll say, if there exists a way to retake the city, I believe it is contingent on the survival of this camp
translate: 하지만 도시를 탈환할 방법이 있다면, 그건 이 캠프의 생존에 달려 있다고 믿소.

original: Beyond that, I bid you go to whatever fate awaits you
translate: 그 외에는, 어떤 운명이 기다리든 잘 가시오.

original: What can I do to help then?
Philip seems to have regained some of the colour in his face
translate: 필립은 혈색을 조금 되찾은 것 같다.

original: But… but Driina are you leaving as well?
I need you here in camp
We've already discussed this!
I cannot do this without you!
I'm not a leader - I'm a glorified scribe!
translate: 난 지도자가 아니라고요. 그냥 서기일 뿐이에요!

original: Who will keep their spirits up?
And what am I going to do when people start dying from the outbreak?
translate: 전염병으로 사람들이 죽기 시작하면 난 어쩌라고요?

original: All the blood and shit and
You will find your strength, my old friend
translate: 자네는 힘을 낼 거야, 오랜 친구여.

original: The Golden Dead will guide you
Besides, we both know that nothing will be solved by me waiting here in camp
translate: 그리고 내가 여기서 기다린다고 해결될 일이 아니라는 건 우리 둘 다 알잖아.

original: We must try to seize the initiative in whatever way we can
Driina puts her hand on his shoulder
Markus lets out a deep sigh before looking up
translate: 마커스는 깊은 한숨을 내쉬고 고개를 든다.

original: You are right, Driina
As always
Clear your throat
Driina, perhaps you should stay here after all
translate: 드리나, 아무래도 당신은 여기 남는 게 좋겠어요.

original: Driina motions towards you,
Gallian himself may have provided for us
translate: 갈리안께서 우릴 위해 마련해 주셨을지도 몰라.

original: Markus looks up at you, seemingly having forgotten you were in the tent
translate: 마커스는 당신이 텐트에 있었다는 걸 잊은 듯 올려다본다.

original: I'm looking for a way into Horryn
Driina's gaze could shatter stone
The decision is mine to make And I have made it
Now, we have tarried for too long
Markus, tell our friend here of Horryn’s fate
translate: 마커스, 우리 친구에게 호린의 운명에 대해 말해주게.

original: I fear out path leads there eventually
translate: 결국 우리의 길은 그곳으로 이어질 것 같군.

original: Go there if you will but entering Horryn may indeed prove a tall order
translate: 가고 싶다면 가시오. 하지만 호린에 들어가는 건 정말 힘든 일이 될 거요.

original: Township’s been overrun by madmen!
Hundreds lie dead in the street and those who remain cling to life on this barren plot of farmland!
translate: 수백 명이 거리에 죽어 있고 살아남은 자들은 이 척박한 농지에서 근근이 목숨을 이어가고 있소!

original: As for the city gates, they have been sealed and our attackers have left us with no way back into the city
translate: 성문은 봉쇄되었고 놈들은 우리가 다시 들어갈 길을 막아버렸소.

original: But what happened?
It started some days ago
I was awoken in the middle of the night by the governor's guards
They told me we were under attack and that packs of crazed brigands were already roaming the streets, spilling blood by the river-full!
translate: 공격을 받고 있고 미친 산적 떼가 이미 거리를 배회하며 피를 강물처럼 흘리게 하고 있다고 하더군!

original: I never saw such chaos before
The dead lay strewn in the streets and we had to sneak from corner to corner just to get away with our lives!
translate: 시체가 거리에 널려 있었고 우린 목숨을 건지기 위해 구석구석 숨어다녀야 했지!

original: By some stroke of luck, we came upon Driina and a handful of other guards and managed to make our way to the gate with what survivors we could find!
translate: 운 좋게 드리나와 몇몇 경비병을 만났고 생존자들을 모아 간신히 성문까지 갈 수 있었소!

original: We set up this camp whilst we
Well frankly I don't know
All I can do is try to keep us alive till tomorrow
translate: 내가 할 수 있는 건 내일까지 살아남으려고 애쓰는 것뿐이오.

original: It sounds like you're about to plead for help?
I'd say no
Iben the ranger is keeping the city under watch and he reports that the Reavers have sealed its gates
translate: 순찰자 이벤이 도시를 감시하고 있는데 약탈자들이 성문을 봉쇄했다고 보고했소.

original: We’ve found no other way of entering it
Though what you expect to find in there save a gruesome death is beyond me
translate: 거기서 끔찍한 죽음 말고 뭘 기대하는지는 모르겠지만.

original: But what do you intend to do then?
Sit here and wait for death?
Certainly not!
But with the state this camp is in, it’s all we can do to keep death from our throats
translate: 하지만 캠프 상황이 이래서야 죽음을 면하는 것만으로도 벅차오.

original: If we are ever to hold out until reinforcements arrive, much less retake the town, then we must do what we can to gather our strength!
translate: 마을을 되찾기는커녕 지원군이 올 때까지 버티려면 힘을 모아야 하오!

original: For now that means food and medicine
Regarding that
I best be on my way then
The Chamberlain
The man before you has the look of a high-ranking Imperial bureaucrat
translate: 눈앞의 남자는 고위 제국 관료처럼 보인다.

original: However, there is little pomp left in him now
His robes are ragged; his cheeks hollowed; his spectacles cracked
translate: 옷은 해졌고 뺨은 홀쭉하며 안경은 금이 갔다.

original: He mumbles to himself as he despondently pores over stacks of papers and maps
translate: 그는 낙담한 채 서류 더미와 지도를 들여다보며 중얼거린다.

original: He looks up at you with a start
What's this, then?
More mouths to feed?
Or, by some miracle, do you come laden with supplies, medicine and men-at-arms?
translate: 아니면 기적처럼 보급품과 약, 병사들을 데리고 왔나?

original: Driina gives the man a strict look
Markus, we’re in no position to turn allies away
translate: 마커스, 우린 동료를 내칠 처지가 아니에요.

original: Common courtesy will go a long way
Careful, little man
The man sighs and sinks further back in his seat
translate: 남자는 한숨을 쉬며 의자에 깊숙이 기댄다.

original: Forgive me
I'm not myself
The world seems to be coming undone and I am left holding the pieces
translate: 세상이 무너져 내리는 것 같은데 나만 남아서 수습하고 있군.

original: He wipes his balding head with a piece of cloth
Markus Stonehold at your service
Chamberlain to the most glorious office of the Governor of Idra
translate: 가장 영광스러운 이드라 총독부를 모시는 시종장이지.

original: He makes a sharp little bow, his words dripping sarcasm
How may I be of assistance?
I'm trying to get to Horryn
I've come to offer my assistance!
We are in need of aid
Me?
Aid you?
The man scoffs incredulously
translate: 남자가 믿을 수 없다는 듯 비웃는다.

original: At present, we'll be blessed by the Dead if we survive another night or two!
translate: 지금으로선 하룻밤 더 버티면 다행인 처지요!

original: But I need to get to Horryn!
Markus blinks bewildered
He gestures to his papers
With the governor missing and the camp overflowing, things are chaotic, to say the least
translate: 총독은 실종되고 캠프는 넘쳐나서 상황이 아주 엉망진창이오.

original: Any assistance you can offer will surely help me avoid an early grave
translate: 당신이 도와준다면 내가 일찍 죽는 건 면할 수 있겠군.

original: Driina offers a sympathetic smile
If I... we can help - we will
translate: 제가... 우리가 도울 수 있다면 돕겠습니다.

original: Nonetheless, I do not know you and though your motives may be pure, I’ve learned a long time ago to be wary of sellswords
translate: 하지만 난 당신을 모르고, 동기가 순수할지 몰라도 용병은 조심해야 한다고 오래전에 배웠소.

original: Tell me, why are you here in the first place?
translate: 말해 보시오, 애초에 왜 여기 온 거요?

original: The people are starving around us
Already the very young and the very old have begun to pass and soon none of us will have the strength to fight should the reavers come for us
translate: 이미 노약자들이 죽어가기 시작했고 곧 우리 중 누구도 약탈자들이 쳐들어오면 싸울 힘이 없을 거요.

original: In other words, we need food and we need it fast
translate: 다시 말해 식량이 필요하고, 그것도 빨리 필요하다는 말이오.

original: Talk to Frantzo
He’s serving as our cook and quartermaster and he might know where to start
translate: 그가 요리사와 보급관 역할을 하고 있으니 어디서부터 시작해야 할지 알 거요.

original: You’ll find him just outside this barn
translate: 이 헛간 바로 밖에서 찾을 수 있을 거요.

original: And you mentioned a disease outbreak?
Indeed
Disease is spreading in camp
Hierophant Drahl has set up a makeshift infirmary in the main house, but so far he’s had little luck in combating the infection
translate: 대사제 드랄이 본채에 임시 진료소를 차렸지만 아직 감염을 막는 데 별 성과가 없소.

original: Help him and you will have helped us all
translate: 그를 도우면 우리 모두를 돕는 거요.

original: Talk to Frantzo regarding the dwindling food supplies and Drahl regarding the disease outbreak
And do hurry
People are dying as we speak
translate: 지금 이 순간에도 사람들이 죽어가고 있으니.

original: Markus sits where you left him
translate: 마커스는 당신이 떠났을 때 그 자리에 앉아 있다.

original: Grimly pouring over lists, manifests and maps
translate: 암울하게 목록, 명부, 지도를 들여다보고 있다.

original: Pushing his broken spectacles up his nose, he peers up at you
translate: 그는 부러진 안경을 코 위로 밀어 올리며 당신을 올려다본다.

original: You're back
I hope for good news!
Markus sighs deeply
If there is nothing else, my migraine needs tending to...amongst other things
translate: 다른 용건이 없다면 편두통부터 좀 다스려야겠소... 할 일이 태산이라.

original: The Chamberlain gestures to the piles of papers surrounding him
translate: 시종장이 자신을 둘러싼 서류 더미를 가리킨다.

original: What do you want to know?
Is there no way of getting into Horryn?
Any idea who the mad-men who attacked Horryn are?
translate: 호린을 공격한 광인들이 누군지 짐작 가는 데가 있나요?

original: Regarding work
Nothing for now
He lets out a sigh
Oh, where to start?
This camp is a disaster!
There is no medicine for the sick and wounded while mad-men and beasts bay for our blood at the gates!
translate: 아픈 사람과 부상자를 위한 약은 없고 광인들과 짐승들이 문앞에서 우리 피를 노리고 짖어대고 있소!

original: The haggard man wipes his brow
Anything I can do to help?
What did you need again?
#Chapter1Cook
Frantzo listens to your description of Embla and strokes his beard
translate: 프란조는 엠블라에 대한 설명을 듣고 수염을 쓰다듬는다.

original: I might have seen her, but this hunger is making me hazy
translate: 본 것 같기도 한데, 배가 고파서 정신이 오락가락하네.

original: Help us find something to eat and chances are it'll clear my memory too
translate: 먹을 것 좀 찾아주면 기억이 돌아올지도 모르겠는데.

original: Fair enough
The name rings a bell
Hmm, yes, I remember the girl!
She arrived at my inn a few weeks ago, booked a room for two weeks and payed up front
translate: 몇 주 전에 내 여관에 와서 2주 치 방을 잡고 선불로 냈어.

original: She was polite, kept to herself mostly
Far as I could tell, she was making trips towards the northern coastline
translate: 내가 알기론 북쪽 해안으로 자주 나갔어.

original: She never gave up any hints as to why, though
translate: 이유는 한 번도 말 안 했지만.

original: The room was still in her name when the doom came - but I remember thinking I hadn't seen her for days beforehand
translate: 재앙이 닥쳤을 때 방은 여전히 그녀 이름으로 되어 있었는데
column3: 며칠 동안 못 본 것 같다는 생각을 했던 게 기억나.

original: I wager she was either already dead, or safely on one of her excursions the night everything ended
translate: 모든 게 끝장난 그날 밤에 이미 죽었거나 안전하게 여행 중이었겠지.

original: If you're looking for her and have a death wish, she was staying in the 'Sunset Suite', on the second floor
translate: 죽고 싶어서 그녀를 찾는 거라면, 2층 '선셋 스위트'에 묵고 있었어.

original: My inn, 'The Haven' is...was just off the main square
translate: 내 여관 '안식처'는 중앙 광장 바로 옆에 있...었지.

original: Where are they?
They are waiting in the enclosure behind you!
They are being kept in a glen up in the foothills!
Frantzo is thoughtfully peeling onions as he hums a tune in some foreign language
translate: 프란조는 생각에 잠겨 양파를 까며 외국어로 된 노래를 흥얼거린다.

original: Good to see you!
You approach a haggard looking man wearing a threadbare cook's apron
translate: 낡은 요리사 앞치마를 두른 수척한 남자에게 다가간다.

original: I don't know what you heard, but there's no food here for you, or anyone
translate: 뭘 들었는지 모르겠지만, 당신이나 다른 누구에게 줄 음식은 없어.

original: he growls
Complain to the chamberlain if you want, just leave me alone
translate: 불만 있으면 시종장한테 가고, 난 좀 내버려 둬.

original: The chamberlain said you needed help
Likewise
The cook's eyes meet yours for the first time
Honestly, the situation is beyond dire
People are starving by the day and we have no supplies
The old, the sick the young; they'll all be dying off at this rate
translate: 노인, 병자, 아이들... 이대로면 다 죽어 나갈 거야.

original: Got any ideas?
Well, none of us have the strength or courage left to venture out of sight of the camp to hunt and forage
translate: 글쎄, 캠프 밖으로 나가서 사냥하거나 먹을 걸 찾을 힘이나 용기가 남은 사람이 없어.

original: The cook looks you up and down
But you look capable enough
You could go beyond the walls and look for something more substantial?
translate: 성벽 너머로 가서 좀 더 든든한 걸 찾아와 줄 수 있겠어?

original: These people can’t live on vegetable broth alone
translate: 사람들이 야채 국물만 먹고 살 순 없잖아.

original: They need meat and fat
Especially if there’s fighting to be had
Any idea where I should look?
I do indeed
Frantzo leans in
Old Jakub owns this farm
It might not seem like much to a mainlander but here on Idra, this farm here is large enough
translate: 본토 사람 눈엔 별거 아닐지 몰라도 이드라에선 꽤 큰 농장이지.

original: You see, Jakub and his family had a large flock of goats when the calamities started
translate: 재앙이 시작됐을 때 야콥 가족은 염소를 많이 키우고 있었어.

original: Right over there in the enclosure behind us
Now, the old man told the chamberlain that the beasts bolted when the calamities started
translate: 근데 그 영감이 시종장한테 재앙이 시작되자마자 짐승들이 도망갔다고 했대.

original: That it drove them all insane and that they scattered into the hills
Well, that may be rightly so but I have my suspicions
translate: 뭐, 그럴 수도 있겠지만 난 의심스러워.

original: You're saying he hid the animals away?
Look, I can’t say I blame the man
translate: 봐, 그 사람 탓할 순 없어.

original: Us refugees have made a mess of his farm
And if we find hands on those animals we’ll surely fall upon them like locusts
translate: 우리가 그 동물들을 찾으면 메뚜기 떼처럼 달려들 게 뻔해.

original: It would ruin him and truly it would be a shame if the man lost his livelihood
translate: 그는 망할 거고 생계 수단을 잃는 건 정말 안타까운 일이지.

original: But better that than having to see children starve
translate: 하지만 아이들이 굶어 죽는 꼴을 보는 것보단 낫잖아.

original: Now you best get going
I see people have started eying the rats
If what you say is true, you have a chance to save a lot of people here
translate: 네 말이 사실이라면 많은 사람을 구할 기회가 생긴 거야.

original: All you have to do is to herd them back to camp
translate: 그것들을 캠프로 몰고 오기만 하면 돼.

original: If you don’t tread carefully though there might be trouble with Jakub and his lad but better that than having to see children starve
translate: 조심하지 않으면 야콥이랑 그 아들이랑 문제가 생길 수도 있겠지만

original: I knew it!
I bloody knew it!
And you led them right to us I see!
By the Maidens this will do these poor people good
column3: 이 불쌍한 사람들에게 정말 큰 도움이 될 거야.

original: Though I fear for old Jakub if people find out he was hoarding his livestock whilst others were dying
translate: 사람들이 죽어가는 와중에 늙은 야콥이 가축을 숨겼다는 걸 알게 되면 어떨지 걱정되긴 하지만.

original: In any case, we have food now to last us a while and it is all thanks to you
translate: 어쨌든 당분간 먹을 식량이 생겼고 다 네 덕분이야.

original: I had some questions first
Bye
With impeccable timing, the work party of sailors arrives carrying the crates of supplies
translate: 기가 막힌 타이밍에 선원 작업반이 보급품 상자를 들고 도착한다.

original: Frantzo slaps his meaty palms together
I knew you could do it {PLAYER}!
You’ve saved a lot of lives today
Not to mention what people would have done to Jakub if it turned out he had been hiding livestock from them
translate: 야콥이 가축을 숨기고 있었다는 게 밝혀졌다면 사람들이 그에게 무슨 짓을 했을지는 말할 것도 없고.

original: I'll see you around
Well
What's eating you?
The cook chuckles darkly
What's your story?
Ask about Embla
Goodbye
The cook's eyes widen in hope
So, what news, did you find anything I can put in folk's bellies?
translate: 그래서, 소식은? 사람들 배를 채울 만한 걸 찾았어?

original: I found supplies!
Good to see you again {PLAYER}!
My story is similar to most folk around here; sudden ruin
translate: 내 이야기도 여기 사람들과 비슷해. 갑작스러운 파멸이지.

original: I had an inn, respectable place, right on the main square it was
translate: 꽤 괜찮은 여관을 가지고 있었어. 중앙 광장 바로 옆이었지.

original: So even if I survive this place - seems like I have nothing to go back to
translate: 그래서 여기서 살아남는다 해도 돌아갈 곳이 없는 것 같아.

original: I'm sorry to hear that
By the maidens tell me it is so!
Don’t wave food in front of the starving!
translate: 굶주린 사람 앞에서 음식 가지고 장난치지 마!

original: Where did you find it?
We found Jakub's goats!
I purchased supplies from smugglers!
#Chapter1DriinaIntro
Whatever lies ahead must be at the centre of the rot that permeates this pit
translate: 앞에 무엇이 있든 이 구덩이에 스며든 부패의 중심에 있을 것이다.

original: She carries an unmistakable air of authority and the insignia on her armour marks her as a cleric of the Order of Sepulchites
translate: 그녀는 범접할 수 없는 권위를 풍기고 갑옷의 휘장은 그녀가 무덤 기사단 성직자임을 나타낸다.

original: The tattered band of refugees surrounding her are agitated and shouting over one another
translate: 그녀를 둘러싼 누더기 차림의 피난민 무리는 동요하며 서로 소리를 지르고 있다.

original: But there are so few of us!
Horryn was home to two hundred and we're but a few score left!
translate: 호린에는 이백 명이 살았는데 우린 고작 수십 명뿐이라고요!

original: cries a ragged man with tears in his eyes
translate: 누더기를 걸친 남자가 눈물을 글썽이며 외친다.

original: By the Golden Corpses, there must be survivors!
translate: 황금의 시체시여, 생존자가 분명 있을 겁니다!

original: beseeches another
And who are we to send?
Half of us won't live through next Marketday and the other half ain't fit to hold 's much as a stick!
translate: 우리 절반은 다음 장날까지 살지도 못할 거고 나머지 절반은 지팡이 하나 들 힘도 없다고!

original: an old crone interjects, panic quivering in her voice
translate: 노파가 끼어들며 공포에 떨리는 목소리로 말한다.

original: The crowd erupts in a cacophony of desperate appeals
translate: 군중 속에서 절박한 호소가 불협화음처럼 터져 나온다.

original: The cleric raises her arms and the crowd falls silent
translate: 성직자가 팔을 들어 올리자 군중이 조용해진다.

original: Her sonorous voice rings out
We may indeed be cursed
But Aldon is right - there may yet be survivors in Horryn, and it's my duty to go to their aid
translate: 하지만 알돈 말이 맞아요. 호린에 생존자가 있을지 모르고 그들을 돕는 게 제 의무입니다.

original: Or, at least, to learn what fate befell them
translate: 적어도 그들에게 무슨 일이 일어났는지는 알아봐야죠.

original: The assembly errupts again - some blessing the cleric in tears of hope, others clinging to her robes while pleading for her to not risk her life
translate: 군중이 다시 술렁거린다. 어떤 이들은 희망의 눈물을 흘리며 성직자를 축복하고, 어떤 이들은 그녀의 옷자락을 붙잡고 목숨을 걸지 말라고 애원한다.

original: Through the crowd, the woman catches sight of you, and nods curtly
translate: 군중 사이로 여자가 당신을 발견하고 짧게 고개를 끄덕인다.

original: She turns away and begins to load up on supplies, no doubt intent on making good on her promise to the panicked refugees
translate: 그녀는 돌아서서 보급품을 챙기기 시작한다. 공포에 질린 피난민들과의 약속을 지키려는 게 분명하다.

original: Entering the ragged camp, you notice a small crowd nearby, arranged in an inward looking ring
translate: 허름한 캠프에 들어서자 안쪽을 향해 둥글게 모여 있는 작은 군중이 눈에 띈다.

original: #Chapter1DriinaMain
The reavers came from inside the town
I recognized some of them as sailors, fishermen and whalers
Locals, mostly from old Idran families
translate: 대부분 이드라의 오래된 가문 출신 현지인들이었어.

original: Perhaps they belonged to one of the lodges
translate: 아마 오두막 중 하나에 속해 있었을 거야.

original: Driina
The imposing cleric holds up a palm in greeting
translate: 위엄 있는 성직자가 손바닥을 들어 인사한다.

original: Welcome to our new home, stranger
translate: 우리 새집에 온 걸 환영해요, 이방인.

original: The people of this island know me as Driina
I serve the Golden Dead and this camp - these people - are under my protection
translate: 난 황금의 망자를 모시고 이 캠프와 사람들은 내 보호 아래 있어요.

original: What brings you here?
I was heading to Horryn
I'm searching for someone
A terror from the deep claimed our ship
Driina nods and smiles to a passing refugee, before leaning in close to you, and asking in a low voice, "and what business did you have in Horryn?
translate: 드리나는 지나가는 피난민에게 고개를 끄덕이며 미소 짓더니, 당신에게 가까이 다가와 낮은 목소리로 묻는다. "호린엔 무슨 볼일이 있었죠?

original: We lost our supplies
I'd hoped to re-stock
I had hoped to recruit new sword arms
I was looking for someone
She leans back, her eyes still flinty
translate: 그녀는 뒤로 물러서지만 눈빛은 여전히 날카롭다.

original: Are you not aware of the situation here?
These people say the island is surely doomed
Her eyes bore into you - gauging your reaction
translate: 그녀의 눈이 당신을 꿰뚫어 보며 반응을 살핀다.

original: And what say you?
I couldn't care less for your troubles
Here on Idra?
That may prove to be a difficult task, given the tempest that's engulfed this island
translate: 이 섬을 집어삼킨 폭풍을 생각하면 쉽지 않은 일이겠군요.

original: Driina fidgets with a heavy looking ring on her finger while she listens to your description of Embla
translate: 드리나는 엠블라에 대한 설명을 들으며 손가락에 낀 묵직해 보이는 반지를 만지작거린다.

original: She's certainly not in the camp and I can't say I remember seeing her in Horryn
translate: 확실히 캠프에는 없어요. 호린에서 본 기억도 없고요.

original: But perhaps that bodes well for your quest
translate: 하지만 그게 오히려 다행일 수도 있겠네요.

original: One of the primary tasks of my order is to care for the dead
translate: 우리 기사단의 주 임무 중 하나가 시신을 돌보는 거거든요.

original: And I can say with certainy that I didn't lay to rest anyone matching her description before the fall of Horryn
translate: 호린이 함락되기 전에 그 인상착의와 비슷한 사람을 매장한 적은 없다고 확신해요.

original: Do you have any suggestions where to look?
Beyond travelling to Horryn, you may want to ask around here in camp
translate: 호린에 가보기 전에 캠프 주변을 수소문해 보는 게 좋겠어요.

original: A few of the merchants survived - perhaps she visited one during her stay
translate: 살아남은 상인들이 몇 명 있으니 머무는 동안 그들을 방문했을지도 모르죠.

original: We need answers!
Driina gestures at the refugees languishing in the camp before continuing
translate: 드리나는 캠프에서 시들어가고 있는 피난민들을 가리키며 말을 잇는다.

original: And it's my duty to seek them out, if they exist
translate: 그들이 존재한다면 찾아내는 게 내 의무죠.

original: I must venture to find a way back into Horryn
translate: 호린으로 다시 들어갈 방법을 찾아야 해.

original: And thence somewhere darker, I fear
translate: 그리고 아마 더 어두운 곳으로 가게 되겠지.

original: Failing that, the situation here in camp is getting untenable
translate: 그게 안 되면 캠프 상황은 감당할 수 없게 될 거야.

original: Anything that can be done to improve it will be a small victory
translate: 상황을 개선할 수 있다면 뭐든 작은 승리가 되겠지.

original: Are you planning to go alone?
Why not wait for reinforcements?
I care not for this fools errand!
If I must
Doomed or not, it's all dust in the end and I intend to die in armor
translate: 운명이 다했든 아니든 결국 다 흙으로 돌아갈 테니, 난 갑옷을 입고 죽겠어.

original: But, from what I can tell, we must both tread the same terrible path?
translate: 하지만 보아하니 우리 둘 다 같은 험한 길을 가야 할 것 같은데요?

original: Though our reasons may differ, surely there is safety to be had in numbers?
translate: 이유는 다르더라도 뭉치면 더 안전하지 않겠어요?

original: Let's join forces
There is no room for you in my company, but I'll help nontheless
translate: 우리 일행에 당신 자리는 없지만, 그래도 돕겠습니다.

original: I care not for helping
One way or another, Horryn must be investigated, but I cannot be in two places at once and perhaps I can do more good here in camp after all
translate: 어쨌든 호린을 조사해야 하는데 몸이 두 개일 순 없고, 결국 내가 캠프에 있는 게 더 도움이 될지도 모르겠네요.

original: If you go there - please, bring word of what you find
translate: 거기 가면... 제발 뭘 찾았는지 알려주세요.

original: However grim those tidings may be
I can do that
I'm not promising anything
Some people only care for their own skin
But look around you - if some measure of compassion for these people touches your heart, I will be here for a short while yet
translate: 하지만 주위를 둘러봐요. 이 사람들에 대한 연민이 조금이라도 있다면, 난 잠시 더 여기 있을 겁니다.

original: On second thought, you should join me
translate: 다시 생각해 보니, 같이 가는 게 좋겠습니다.

original: I'll consider helping, but I don't want you to join me
translate: 돕는 건 고려해보겠지만, 같이 가는 건 원치 않습니다.

original: Our graveyards have been overflowing as of late with stranger killing stranger for no good reason
translate: 최근 묘지는 이유 없이 서로 죽이는 이방인들로 넘쳐났어요.

original: And worse, I think, brother and brother, husband and wife
translate: 더 끔찍한 건 형제끼리, 부부끼리 죽였다는 거죠.

original: It's become a tide of ruin
I implored the Governor to intervene and investigate, but as usual he did nothing but cower in his villa and peer over his walls
translate: 총독에게 개입해서 조사해 달라고 애원했지만, 늘 그렇듯 그는 저택에 틀어박혀 담장 너머만 훔쳐볼 뿐 아무것도 하지 않았죠.

original: The Governor?
There is always hope - in this life or beyond it
However, I have seen things these last days that I cannot readily explain or reconcile with my faith
translate: 하지만 지난 며칠간 설명할 수도, 내 신앙과 조화시킬 수도 없는 일들을 목격했어요.

original: Then, a few nights ago, pandemonium erupted
translate: 그러다 며칠 전 밤, 아비규환이 벌어졌죠.

original: Bands of armed men and women roamed the town, hacking down anyone they came across
translate: 무장한 남녀 무리가 마을을 돌아다니며 마주치는 사람들을 닥치는 대로 베어 넘겼어요.

original: Some folks claim those that did not die on the spot were dragged away, to suffer some unknown fate
translate: 즉사하지 않은 사람들은 끌려가서 알 수 없는 고통을 겪고 있다는 말도 있어요.

original: My order and I joined what sane guardsmen remained in the chaos and tried to stem the tide - but we were driven from the city in the panicked exodus that followed
translate: 나와 우리 기사단은 혼란 속에 제정신인 경비병들과 합세해 막아보려 했지만
column3: 이어진 공포에 질린 탈출 행렬에 밀려 도시에서 쫓겨났죠.

original: We considered retaking the town, but we had scores of wounded
translate: 마을을 되찾을까도 생각했지만 부상자가 너무 많았어요.

original: So we retreated, better to save the lives not yet lost
translate: 그래서 후퇴했죠. 아직 잃지 않은 목숨이라도 구하는 게 나으니까요.

original: We set up this camp to regroup and to care for the wounded, but a shadow hangs over us
translate: 재정비하고 부상자를 돌보려고 이 캠프를 세웠지만, 그림자가 드리워져 있어요.

original: The wounded do not recover, and those still on their feet slowly lose their mind, or hearts
translate: 부상자들은 회복되지 않고, 서 있는 사람들조차 서서히 마음이나 정신을 잃어가고 있죠.

original: What do you intend to do now?
Driina's face lights for an instant
These people - my people - I feel their pain
translate: 이 사람들... 내 사람들... 그들의 고통이 느껴져요.

original: And we will mourn together, later
For now, they deserve answers
And by the Emperors' bones, I will get them some
translate: 황제의 뼈에 맹세코, 내가 답을 찾아다 줄 거예요.

original: Then that is the course laid out for us
translate: 그럼 그게 우리가 가야 할 길이군요.

original: I pray your resolve may help you through the darkness that lies ahead
translate: 당신의 결의가 앞을 가로막는 어둠을 헤쳐 나가는 데 도움이 되기를 빕니다.

original: I will not barter for what should be an act of compassion, given freely, if that is what you're implying
translate: 당신이 그걸 암시하는 거라면, 마땅히 베풀어야 할 자비심을 가지고 거래하진 않겠어요.

original: Either way, I wish you luck
I both look forward to and dread seeing you again
I have questions
A drunken buffoon in my estimation
translate: 내 생각엔 술에 찌든 광대 같더군요.

original: He did not deserve to die however, and I don't think he made it out of Horryn
translate: 죽을 만한 사람은 아니었지만, 호린을 빠져나오진 못한 것 같아요.

original: Markus, his chamberlain did however
I suppose he's the closest we're to a leader at the moment - though he may wish it were not so
translate: 그가 원치 않을지 몰라도 지금으로선 우리의 지도자에 가장 가까운 사람인 것 같군요.

original: What happened next?
Let's be off!
The Golden Dead watch over you
Then we have nothing to dicuss!
Begone!
The cleric turns her back on you and continues her preparations
translate: 성직자는 등을 돌리고 하던 준비를 계속한다.

original: There are long traditions on Idra for the fishermen and sailors to band together in fellowships known as lodges
translate: 이드라에는 어부와 선원들이 오두막이라는 조합으로 뭉치는 오랜 전통이 있어요.

original: From what I understand, they serve mainly as combines for fair distribution of the day's catch
translate: 알기로는 주로 그날 잡은 고기를 공평하게 분배하는 역할을 한다더군요.

original: But there are persistent rumors of them serving other purposes too
translate: 하지만 다른 목적도 있다는 소문이 끊이지 않아요.

original: But there are persistent rumours of them serving other purposes too
translate: 하지만 다른 목적도 있다는 소문이 끊이지 않아요.

original: Our Order is an Imperial one - the locals would be loath to discuss such things with us - but I've always suspected they practiced pre-Imperial customs of ocean-worship, including offerings to ensure safe travel and bountiful catches
translate: 우리 기사단은 제국 소속이라 현지인들이 우리와 그런 얘기를 하길 꺼리지만, 난 항상 그들이 안전한 항해와 풍어를 기원하며 제물을 바치는 등 제국 이전의 해양 숭배 풍습을 따르고 있다고 의심해 왔어요.

original: Driina looks expectantly at you, one brow arched
translate: 드리나는 한쪽 눈썹을 치켜세우고 기대에 찬 눈빛으로 당신을 바라본다.

original: Ask Driina about Embla
Who do you think attacked Horryn?
It's time to go
Before we leave we should seek out Markus - our leader of sorts
translate: 떠나기 전에 사실상의 지도자인 마커스를 찾아봐야 해요.

original: He's holed up in the stable trying to organize this mess of a camp
translate: 그는 마구간에 머물며 엉망진창인 캠프를 수습하려 애쓰고 있어요.

original: Holy Ashes, no one tries harder than him, but the task at hand is monumental and he needs help
translate: 성스러운 재여, 그 사람만큼 노력하는 사람도 없지만 일이 워낙 방대해서 도움이 필요해요.

original: If you feel the calling, you should seek out Markus - our leader of sorts
translate: 소명을 느낀다면 마커스를 찾아가 보세요. 우리 지도자 같은 분이죠.

original: Reinforcements?
From whence?
Even if the Imperial Augers are aware of our plight, relief will still be weeks away if it arrives at all
translate: 제국 예언가들이 우리 처지를 안다 해도 구호품이 도착하려면 몇 주는 걸릴 테고, 온다는 보장도 없어요.

original: No, our fate is in our own hands and I fear I must bear the brunt of the hardships ahead
translate: 아니요, 우리 운명은 우리 손에 달려 있고 닥쳐올 고난의 무게는 내가 짊어져야 할 것 같군요.

original: And you would venture out alone?
Driina looks up at you with steely eyes and offers a curt greeting
translate: 드리나는 강인한 눈빛으로 당신을 올려다보며 짧게 인사한다.

original: Golden Dead watch over you
I have some questions for you
I want you to join me!
You speak of the leviathan
The fishermen first saw it about a week before the fall of Horryn
translate: 어부들이 호린이 함락되기 일주일 전쯤 처음 목격했죠.

original: I do not know what black depths spawned it, but the natural order of things is fast becoming undone
translate: 어떤 검은 심연에서 태어났는지는 모르겠지만, 자연의 섭리가 빠르게 무너지고 있어요.

original: Tell me, why did you come to this accursed island?
translate: 말해줘요, 왜 이 저주받은 섬에 온 거죠?

original: I'm lookong for someone
I was bound for Horryn
#Chapter1Farmer
What of them?
I found them up in the glen
What happened to them?
The man mutters something under his breath and spits as a group of refugees pass
translate: 남자는 피난민들이 지나가자 나지막이 중얼거리며 침을 뱉는다.

original: As he notices you lingering he fixes you with a bitter frown
translate: 당신이 서성이는 걸 보자 그는 씁쓸한 표정으로 노려본다.

original: More leeches come to bleed me?
translate: 피 빨아먹으러 온 거머리가 또 왔나?

original: Is this your farm?
He scoffs
If you can still call it that!
translate: 아직도 농장이라고 부를 수 있다면 말이지!

original: It's ruined
All my crops are trampled and my goats are gone!
We're going to starve next year thanks to this catastrophe!
translate: 이 재앙 덕분에 내년엔 굶어 죽게 생겼어!

original: Still seems you're better off than the people living in the camp
Spare me the sob-story
A balding man with a hard, wrinkled face the texture of old leather, stands leaning against the wall of the farmhouse
translate: 낡은 가죽처럼 쭈글쭈글하고 굳은 얼굴의 대머리 남자가 농가 벽에 기대어 서 있다.

original: He’s thoughtfully chewing a straw as he dejectedly surveys the muddy chaos that was once his well-kept farm
translate: 그는 한때 잘 관리되던 농장이 진흙탕 난장판이 된 것을 낙담한 듯 바라보며 짚을 씹고 있다.

original: Approach
He scoffs and turns his back to you
Wait, I have some questions
The man's eyes narrow
He begins to whittle away at a stick and won't look directly at you
translate: 그는 나뭇가지를 깎기 시작하며 당신을 똑바로 쳐다보지 않는다.

original: It's clear he knows what you're talking about
translate: 당신이 무슨 말을 하는지 알고 있는 게 분명하다.

original: You can't keep hiding such a large herd while the camp starves
translate: 캠프 사람들이 굶주리는데 그렇게 큰 무리를 계속 숨길 순 없어요.

original: Your boy is begging to come home
translate: 당신 아들이 집에 오고 싶어 애원하고 있습니다.

original: I'll keep your herd a secret for a price
translate: 대가만 주면 당신 가축 떼는 비밀로 해주지.

original: Begging?
The boy's soft
If he wants to come home he needs to prove himself!
I'm doing this for his own good
Is it gold you're after then?!
The man’s face goes red as he takes a step towards you
translate: 남자의 얼굴이 붉어지며 당신에게 한 발짝 다가선다.

original: He stands there for a moment trembling with rage before looking around and becoming aware that the other people of the camp are watching
translate: 그는 분노로 몸을 떨며 서 있다가 주위를 둘러보고 캠프의 다른 사람들이 지켜보고 있다는 것을 깨닫는다.

original: You’re cruel indeed to fleece an old man so close to his skin
But I can’t lose my animals
translate: 하지만 내 동물들을 잃을 순 없어.

original: Take this, and may your bones be ground to dust
translate: 이거 받고, 네 뼈가 가루가 되길 빌어주지.

original: He presses a small pouch of 50 gold into your hand
translate: 그는 50골드가 든 작은 주머니를 당신 손에 쥐여준다.

original: Get out of here before I let my axe do the talking!
translate: 내 도끼가 말하기 전에 여기서 꺼져!

original: I'm bringing the animals to the camp one way or another
I want no part in this
The man's face reddens
I can and I will!
It's their fault we're in this mess!
translate: 우리가 이 꼴이 된 건 다 그놈들 탓이야!

original: Dead
They must be
Ran off into the forest when the sky fell, and nothing survives in that emperor's-foresaken place for long
translate: 하늘이 무너질 때 숲으로 도망쳤는데, 그 저주받은 곳에선 아무것도 오래 못 살아남아.

original: Are you lying to me?
Tell me the truth or I'll be forced to make you
translate: 사실대로 말하지 않으면 강제로 말하게 할 수밖에 없습니다.

original: The old man shifts uncomfortably
He looks down at his feet and sighs
I know it ain't right, but we borrowed hard from the Free-Lenders Guild to build this farm, and my goats...they're all I have left
translate: 옳지 않다는 건 알지만, 이 농장 지으려고 사채업자 길드에서 빚을 많이 졌어. 내 염소들은... 남은 전부라고.

original: If I lose them too, I'm done for
Me, my wife and son, indenturement for the lot of us!
translate: 나, 아내, 아들, 우리 모두 노예 신세가 될 거라고!

original: Where are the animals now?
The old man looks at you unflinchingly
I am telling you the truth
The farmer hesitates for a moment and then his face hardens
Fuck you and fuck this rotten pack of beggars and thieves
translate: 엿이나 먹어. 그리고 이 거지랑 도둑놈들도 다 꺼지라고 해.

original: I’ll die before I tell you
That can be arranged
The man's eyes narrow and you can see his jaw-muscles tensing
translate: 남자의 눈이 가늘어지고 턱 근육이 긴장하는 것이 보인다.

original: How do you feel about the camp?
About your animals
Bloody wretches
They could have gone anywhere!
But my farms were closest and now they've picked me clean and trampled my fields
translate: 근데 내 농장이 제일 가깝다고 다 털어먹고 밭을 짓밟았어.

original: We're ruined!
The farmers eyes flare with rage and defiance
The people of this camp need the food
Perhaps you can get a fair price from the chamberlain?
translate: 시종장에게 제값을 받을 수 있지 않을까요?

original: The animals will die in those mountains
It's better to slaughter them now and put the meat to good use
translate: 지금 도축해서 고기를 유용하게 쓰는 게 나아요.

original: This herd is coming back one way or another!
translate: 이 무리는 어떻게든 돌아오게 될 겁니다!

original: I need to think about this
The man’s grim mask gives way to deep sadness
translate: 남자의 굳은 표정이 깊은 슬픔으로 바뀐다.

original: You win
We’re done for
Could you at least go help my boy and make sure they make it to camp safely?
translate: 적어도 내 아들을 도와서 무사히 캠프로 오게 해줄 수 있나?

original: I wanted to ask you some questions
The old man’s eyes seem to go black with rage
translate: 노인의 눈이 분노로 검게 변하는 것 같다.

original: You think you can threaten me?!
Get out of my sight before I plant my ax in your skull!
translate: 내 도끼를 네 머리통에 박아버리기 전에 당장 내 눈앞에서 꺼져!

original: You have no doubt he means it
translate: 그가 진심이라는 데 의심의 여지가 없다.

original: #Chapter1FarmersWife
The woman looks at you apprehensively for a bit
translate: 여자는 잠시 불안한 듯 당신을 바라본다.

original: Not as long as these people are on our land
translate: 이 사람들이 우리 땅에 있는 한은 안 돼요.

original: Aiden has to keep the goats safe
Up in the hidden glen
I could go check on him?
She wipes a tear of relief
Thank you so much
Go to the old goat enclosure east of our house and find the hole in the fence to the north
