translate: 우리 집 동쪽 낡은 염소 우리로 가서 북쪽 울타리 구멍을 찾으세요.

original: If you look careful you’ll find some tracks
Follow them and they should take you right to the glen
translate: 그걸 따라가면 골짜기로 바로 갈 수 있을 거예요.

original: And please don’t tell Jakub I’ve talked to you
translate: 그리고 제발 야콥에겐 저랑 얘기했다고 하지 마세요.

original: He only cares for the animals and he has a horrible temper
translate: 그 사람은 동물밖에 모르고 성질이 고약하거든요.

original: The Farmer's Wife
The woman looks tired and sad as she wanders around the farmhouse aimlessly
translate: 여자는 지치고 슬픈 표정으로 농가 주위를 정처 없이 배회한다.

original: My poor boy
she mutters under her breath
What's wrong with your boy?
Poor Aiden’s stuck outside in the rain and fog
translate: 불쌍한 에이든이 비와 안개 속에 갇혀 있어요.

original: Jakub won’t let him come home
Not as long as
As long as?
#Chapter1GenericRefugee
A soldier dressed in the ragged remains of what you assume is the livery of Horryn
translate: 호린 제복으로 추정되는 너덜너덜한 옷을 입은 병사다.

original: He looks hungry, shaken and on edge
Talk to the chamberlain over in the barn if you want something - Just leave me alone!
translate: 원하는 게 있으면 저기 헛간에 있는 시종장한테 말해. 난 좀 내버려 두고!

original: #Chapter1GoatTracks
Trekking a few hours into the mountainous highlands of Idra’s north-western region, you find yourself standing at the mouth of a narrow valley nestled between tall mountains
translate: 이드라 북서쪽 산악 고지대를 몇 시간 트레킹한 끝에 높은 산들 사이에 자리 잡은 좁은 계곡 입구에 서게 된다.

original: The tracks do not lie
There are goats nearby
You fail to make out any additional details about the prints
translate: 발자국에 대한 추가적인 단서는 알아내지 못한다.

original: Looking closer, you can clearly make out a set of human footprints as well
translate: 자세히 보니 사람 발자국도 선명하게 보인다.

original: It seems clear that these animals were herded out of the enclosure
translate: 동물들이 우리 밖으로 몰려나온 것이 분명해 보인다.

original: Dozens of cloven hooves have churned a path trought the mud heading north into the foothills behind the camp
translate: 수십 개의 갈라진 발굽이 진흙을 휘젓고 캠프 뒤 언덕 북쪽으로 향했다.

original: Follow directions to the hidden glen
Try to follow the tracks
Examine the tracks more closely
Trecking throught the rugged foothills, you follow the tracks until they pass over a portion of bare rock
translate: 험준한 언덕을 트레킹하며 발자국을 따라가다가 맨바위 구간을 지난다.

original: You lose the trail and after a brief period of searching you decide to give up and return to camp
translate: 흔적을 잃고 잠시 수색하다가 포기하고 캠프로 돌아가기로 한다.

original: You must discover the destination of these tracks some other way
translate: 이 발자국들의 목적지를 다른 방법으로 찾아야 한다.

original: The flock seems to have been driven out of camp, towards the north-west
translate: 무리들이 캠프 밖 북서쪽으로 몰려간 것 같다.

original: Across rocky grounds and soggy marshes, you manage to stay on the trail
translate: 바위투성이 땅과 질척한 늪지대를 가로질러 간신히 흔적을 유지한다.

original: #Chapter1GraveDigger
With trembling hands you cut into the pallid flesh and expose the entrails of the corpse
translate: 떨리는 손으로 창백한 살을 가르고 시체의 내장을 드러낸다.

original: Driina leans in over your shoulder
Those entrails don't look
Her words are cut short as the 'entrails' whip out of the wound in a mass of squirming, eyeless worms!
translate: '내장'이 꿈틀거리는 눈 없는 벌레 떼가 되어 상처 밖으로 튀어 나오자 그녀의 말이 끊긴다!

original: Panicked, you frantically scuttle away from the tiny snapping orifices when Roland charges past you with the shovel raised
translate: 당신이 공포에 질려 입을 딱딱거리는 작은 구멍들로부터 허둥지둥 물러날 때 롤랜드가 삽을 들고 당신 옆을 지나 돌진한다.

original: Panicked, you frantically scuttle away from the tiny snapping orifices till your hand instinctivly finds the shaft of the shovel!
translate: 당신이 공포에 질려 입을 딱딱거리는 작은 구멍들로부터 허둥지둥 물러나다 본능적으로 삽자루를 잡는다!

original: Just as you are about to abandon your grizzley task, when the 'entrails' whip out of the wound in a mass of squirming, eyeless worms!
translate: 끔찍한 작업을 포기하려던 찰나, '내장'이 꿈틀거리는 눈 없는 벌레 떼가 되어 상처 밖으로 튀어 나온다!

original: The shovel makes short work of the tiny terrors, until both corpse and monster is reduced to a pulpy mass
translate: 삽으로 작은 공포의 존재들을 순식간에 처치하고, 시체와 괴물 모두 곤죽이 될 때까지 내려친다.

original: Ashen-faced from horror, you push the broken corpses into their graves and quickly begin piling dirt onto them
translate: 공포로 얼굴이 창백해진 채 부서진 시체들을 무덤에 밀어 넣고 재빨리 흙을 덮기 시작한다.

original: As you work, Driina begins chanting
translate: 작업을 하는 동안 드리나가 주문을 외우기 시작한다.

original: Finish the work
I'd rather have you lend a hand Driina
Your words offer comfort
There are two corpses wrapped in linen before you
translate: 앞에 린넨에 싸인 시체 두 구가 있다.

original: Their graves have been dug but they still need to be filled in
Examine corpses
The corpses are a man and a woman
Perhaps they were once man and wife
They look well fed and there is no apparent cause of death
translate: 잘 먹은 것 같고 뚜렷한 사인은 없다.

original: Driina looks stoically at the pair
They are with the Emperors now
Though I wonder what killed them
Investigate corpses more closely
Bury the corpses
Place the corpses in their graves
They look well fed and there is no apperant cause of death
translate: 잘 먹은 것 같고 뚜렷한 사인은 없다.

original: Harvest meat from the corpses
As you look the corpses over, you notice that their abdomens seem distended beyond that of simple corpse gas
translate: 시체를 살펴보니 복부가 단순히 가스가 찬 것 이상으로 부풀어 있는 것을 발견한다.

original: You apprehensively poke at the swelling and to your horror, the mass begins to squirm and shift!
translate: 조심스럽게 부푼 곳을 찌르자 끔찍하게도 그 덩어리가 꿈틀거리고 움직이기 시작한다!

original: Hastily bury the corpses
Cut open the corpses
You examine the pair more closely but don't learn anything of interest
translate: 두 사람을 더 자세히 살펴보지만 흥미로운 점은 발견하지 못한다.

original: You carve several large slabs of flesh from the well-fed corpses
translate: 잘 먹은 시체에서 큼직한 살코기 몇 점을 도려낸다.

original: You cannot help but think about how hungry you are
translate: 얼마나 배가 고픈지 생각하지 않을 수 없다.

original: Bury corpses and leave
Driina looks at the man with a sad smile
The dead must be put in the ground lest disease run rampant
translate: 전염병이 창궐하지 않으려면 죽은 자를 땅에 묻어야 합니다.

original: But take comfort: tending to the dead is holy work
translate: 하지만 위로받으세요. 죽은 자를 돌보는 건 성스러운 일이니까요.

original: You'll have earned the grace of the Golden Tomb
translate: 황금 묘지의 은총을 얻게 될 겁니다.

original: The man looks down in shame
It's just that it doesn't feel like it is all
Driina says we need to bury the dead lest disease runs rampant and how it's holy work
translate: 드리나는 전염병이 창궐하지 않도록 죽은 자를 묻어야 하며 그것이 얼마나 성스러운 일인지 말한다.

original: You mentioned hounds?
Have you lost your mind?
I'd die before I'll let you deface these corpses!
translate: 이 시체들을 훼손하게 두느니 차라리 죽겠다!

original: The camp needs food and these are more well fed than most!
translate: 캠프에는 식량이 필요하고 이 시체들은 다른 것들보다 살이 올랐어!

original: Waht are you talking about?
I'm sorry I don't know what came over me
The flesh of the dead is sacred!
I'm oath-sworn to protect and care for it and necrophagia is among the foulest of sins!
translate: 난 그걸 보호하고 돌보겠다고 맹세했고 시체를 먹는 건 가장 더러운 죄악 중 하나라고!

original: We will feast on flesh!
You reget is genunine
I forgive your transgression
It is this island - it turns our thoughs unsound
translate: 이 섬 때문이야. 우리 생각을 병들게 해.

original: Let's just bury these wretches and be done with it
translate: 그냥 이 불쌍한 사람들을 묻고 끝내자.

original: Bury corpses
You have lost your mind!
It is just as well we meet our end here
translate: 여기서 끝을 보는 것도 나쁘지 않겠군.

original: Driina charges at you!
You wipe the grime from your face as you finish the grim task
translate: 끔찍한 작업을 마치고 얼굴에 묻은 때를 닦아낸다.

original: Sadly, you suspect these are far from the last graves that will be made for the poor refugees of Horryn before this is over
translate: 슬프게도 이 일이 끝나기 전에 호린의 불쌍한 피난민들을 위해 만들어질 마지막 무덤이 아닐 거라는 예감이 든다.

original: You place the corpses in their graves and quickly fill them in
translate: 시체들을 무덤에 넣고 재빨리 흙을 채운다.

original: It is hard work and the rugged widlerness around you looms threathningly
translate: 힘든 작업이고 주변의 거친 황야가 위협적으로 다가온다.

original: As you work, Driina stands above you, chanting
translate: 일하는 동안 드리나가 위에서 주문을 외운다.

original: Your words offer comfort to living and dead both
translate: 당신의 말은 산 자와 죽은 자 모두에게 위로가 됩니다.

original: So many have died the last days without proper burial or recieving their Rites of Sepulcation
translate: 지난 며칠 동안 제대로 된 매장이나 장례 의식도 치르지 못하고 죽은 사람이 너무 많아.

original: I need to do this
You finish the work in silence
Driina smiles slightly
This offers me some small peace of mind
The darkness of night is pressing in around you and as you prepare to leave you notice movement just past the edge of the darkness
translate: 밤의 어둠이 밀려오고 떠날 채비를 하는데 어둠의 끝자락에서 움직임이 포착된다.

original: Before you manage to call out, slavering horrors charge at you!
translate: 소리를 지르기도 전에 침을 흘리는 공포의 존재들이 당신에게 달려든다!

original: Haven't you seen 'em?
Bloody monsters roam the hills in packs!
translate: 피에 굶주린 괴물들이 떼 지어 언덕을 배회하고 있다고!

original: I ain't never seen hounds like these before
translate: 난 그런 사냥개는 본 적도 없어.

original: Hulking and diseased-looking
Come at night they do
Dig up the graves I dig and eat the dead right out of their very graves!
translate: 내가 판 무덤을 파헤쳐서 죽은 사람들을 꺼내 먹는단 말이야!

original: Driina whispers a few words under her breath
The dead?
In the distance a howl sounds and the man straightens up like some prey animal sensing a predator
translate: 멀리서 울음소리가 들리자 남자는 포식자를 감지한 먹잇감처럼 몸을 곧게 편다.

original: He briefly squints into the perpetual twilight that covers the island before grabbing his shovel and redoubling his efforts towards finishing his work
translate: 그는 섬을 뒤덮은 영원한 황혼 속을 잠시 곁눈질하더니 삽을 잡고 작업을 마무리하기 위해 더욱 힘을 쏟는다.

original: Run back to camp - I'll finish the job
Well you better hurry up then
You approach a man sweating profusely and caked in dirt
translate: 땀을 비 오듯 흘리고 흙투성이가 된 남자에게 다가간다.

original: He's hunched over and panting, seemingly winded from the hard work of digging graves
translate: 그는 무덤을 파느라 지친 듯 몸을 구부리고 헐떡거리고 있다.

original: Who goes there!
The man jolts to hefting his shovel as a weapon
translate: 남자가 삽을 무기처럼 들어 올리며 깜짝 놀란다.

original: I'm not looking for trouble
Why so jumpy?
Why so jumpy he asks!
Well since you ask, I drew the short straw and it's fallen upon my wretched shoulders to bury the dead
translate: 물어보니 말해주지. 제비뽑기에서 져서 이 망할 어깨로 시체를 묻게 됐거든.

original: He shoots Driina a sulking glance
And if I don't get back to it, I'll be food for the fell-hounds afore you know it!
translate: 빨리 안 하면 눈 깜짝할 사이에 내가 지옥견 밥이 될 거라고!

original: He looks around nervously
Why so jumpy she asks!
Fell-hounds?
The man looks at you with slight confusion then pushes his shovel into your hands
translate: 남자는 약간 혼란스러운 표정으로 당신을 보더니 삽을 당신 손에 쥐여준다.

original: He thanks you profusely and runs back to camp
translate: 그는 연신 고맙다고 말하며 캠프로 뛰어간다.

original: Driina nods in approval
That was a good deed
Get to work
The grave-digger looks up with a nervous look on his eyes
translate: 무덤 파는 남자가 불안한 눈빛으로 올려다본다.

original: Let me help you
The poor gravedigger looks at you with a grateful smile
translate: 불쌍한 무덤 파는 남자가 고마운 미소로 당신을 바라본다.

original: He seems to have made no attempt at removing some of the grime that covers him
translate: 그는 몸에 묻은 흙먼지를 털어낼 생각조차 하지 않는 것 같다.

original: No doubt he realizes he'll be back to work before long
translate: 곧 다시 일해야 한다는 걸 알고 있어서겠지.

original: #Chapter1IagoMessenger
A man with leather-like skin covered in sailor’s tattoos approaches you
translate: 가죽 같은 피부에 선원 문신을 한 남자가 당신에게 다가온다.

original: Greetings m’lord
Greetings m’lady
Name’s Donovan, ‘Dono’ for short and I’m here looking for someone a lot like you!
translate: 제 이름은 도노반, 줄여서 '도노'라고 합니다. 당신 같은 분을 찾고 있었죠!

original: Well, begging your pardon but you look less covered in shit than the rest of this lot and able to carry a blade m’lord
translate: 실례지만, 다른 놈들보다 덜 더러워 보이고 칼도 쓸 줄 아시는 것 같아서요, 나리.

original: Well, begging your pardon but you look less covered in shit than the rest of this lot and able to carry a blade m’lady
translate: 실례지만, 다른 놈들보다 덜 더러워 보이고 칼도 쓸 줄 아시는 것 같아서요, 아가씨.

original: I serve on the vessel ‘Weathermaiden’ and I’m here on the orders of my first-mate Zhara
I've already talked to Zhara!
Dono offers a clumsy bow before making his way out of camp, heading north-west
translate: 도노는 어설프게 인사를 하고 캠프를 빠져나와 북서쪽으로 향한다.

original: The man blinks in relief
Well in that case it seems I’ve done my job exceptionally well!
translate: 그렇다면 제 일을 아주 훌륭하게 해낸 것 같군요!

original: May the Mother of Maelstroms guide you in finding Captain Iago!
translate: 소용돌이 대모께서 이야고 선장님을 찾을 수 있도록 인도해 주시길!

original: Better you talk to her yourself!
We’re holed up in a large sea-cave west of here while the ‘maiden’ is undergoing repairs
translate: '메이든' 호를 수리하는 동안 서쪽의 큰 해식 동굴에 숨어 있습니다.

original: Zhara will be waiting for you there
translate: 자라 님께서 거기서 기다리고 계실 겁니다.

original: Here, I’ll show you on your map
Dono indicates the position 66 by 91 on your map of the Outer Isles
I must ask you do not delay
#Chapter1Iben
The Reavers are fierce, but they are a poorly organized lot
With a small troupe of hungry and fearful guardsmen I was able to fight my way to the square and slay many of their numbers
translate: 굶주리고 겁에 질린 소수의 경비병만으로도 광장까지 뚫고 들어가 놈들을 꽤 많이 죽였소.

original: If this is a trap, I believe it to be a poorly laid one
translate: 이게 함정이라 해도, 아주 허술한 함정일 거요.

original: And what did you have in mind?
The situation inside the city is still unclear but what we do know is that the Reavers have formed factions
Though some are doubtlessly still rabid, others may be open to parlaying
translate: 여전히 미쳐 날뛰는 놈들도 있겠지만, 말이 통하는 놈들도 있을 거요.

original: If this is so, we might be able to use that to our advantage
translate: 그렇다면 우린 그걸 이용할 수 있을지 모르오.

original: In other words, we fight when we must but if we can use cunning instead I’m certain the Dead will favour us!
translate: 다시 말해, 필요할 땐 싸우겠지만 꾀를 쓸 수 있다면 망자들께서 우리 편을 들어주실 거란 말이오!

original: Venture forth!
Now pay close attention!
Iben leans in intently
You’ll enter Horryn by the Fishermen’s Gate to the south east
translate: 당신은 남동쪽 어부의 문으로 호린에 진입하시오.

original: Once inside you must seek out each of the three Reaver chieftains and put an end to them one way or another
translate: 일단 들어가면 세 명의 약탈자 우두머리를 각각 찾아내어 어떻게든 끝장내시오.

original: We must be careful with a frontal assault
But I suspect there is little cohesion and much infighting among the Reavers
translate: 하지만 약탈자들 사이에 단결력은 없고 내분이 심할 것으로 짐작되오.

original: Perhaps that can be used to our advantage?
As long as the Reavers hold the city and port, they will eventually starve us out
translate: 약탈자들이 도시와 항구를 장악하고 있는 한, 우린 결국 굶어 죽게 될 거요.

original: They were able to take it because they had surprise on their side!
translate: 놈들이 도시를 점령할 수 있었던 건 기습 덕분이었소!

original: And now: they rule by terror!
So long as we sit here, fearful and hungry, they will eventually fall upon us!
translate: 우리가 여기 앉아 두려움과 배고픔에 떨고 있는 한, 놈들은 결국 우릴 덮칠 거요!

original: I say we shit on that!
I have a way into Horryn!
Let us venture forth and attempt to free her from these savages!
We have men and women here, willing and able to bear arms if called upon
translate: 여기엔 부름을 받으면 무기를 들 의지와 능력이 있는 남녀들이 있소.

original: A small band of strong swords could slip in using the Fishermen’s Gate, sow chaos among the ranks of the Reavers and open the main gate from inside!
translate: 소수의 정예 부대가 어부의 문으로 잠입해 약탈자들 사이에 혼란을 일으키고 안에서 정문을 열 수 있다면!

original: If this was done, I am certain we stand a chance at retaking the city!
translate: 그렇게만 된다면, 도시를 탈환할 승산이 충분하다고 확신하오!

original: How would we sow chaos?
From what we learned, the Reavers in the city have formed splinter groups around three chieftains
translate: 우리가 알아낸 바로는, 도시 안의 약탈자들은 세 명의 우두머리를 중심으로 분파를 형성했소.

original: Red Kala rules the docks, Oleg the Gray is holed up in the old Fisherman’s Lodge and someone they call ‘the Butcher’ holds his court on the steps of the temple
translate: 붉은 칼라는 부두를 지배하고, 회색 올렉은 낡은 어부의 오두막에 숨어 있으며, '도살자'라 불리는 자는 사원 계단에서 자신의 법정을 열고 있지.

original: While those three mad-men still draw breath, the Reavers are still a danger
translate: 그 세 명의 광인이 살아있는 한, 약탈자들은 여전히 위험하오.

original: We must put an end to them
Either by force of arms or subterfuge
I am certain a way may be found to pit the fools against each other
translate: 그 멍청이들을 서로 싸우게 할 방법이 분명 있을 거요.

original: Iben’s eyes glimmer with lust for adventure
Or is it bloodthirst?
So what say ye?
Shall we make a tale worthy of the skalds?
translate: 음유시인들이 노래할 만한 이야기를 만들어 보겠소?

original: Let's do it!
I'll do it but we don't need company
That the situation is dire but not hopeless
translate: 상황은 절망적이지만 희망이 없는 건 아니오.

original: By chance or design, the Fishermen’s Gate to the south-east has been opened
translate: 우연이든 의도적이든, 남동쪽 어부의 문이 열려 있소.

original: My party and I were able to make it all the way to the square before we encountered reavers
translate: 나와 내 일행은 약탈자들을 만나기 전까지 광장까지 갈 수 있었소.

original: I lost men, but we cut their band down before we retreated
translate: 부하들을 잃었지만, 후퇴하기 전에 놈들을 베어버렸지.

original: If we move fast, we may yet be able to take advantage of the gate!
translate: 빨리 움직인다면, 아직 그 문을 이용할 수 있을지도 모르오!

original: That sounds like a trap!
For the first time you notice the green-clad man lingering there
translate: 녹색 옷을 입은 남자가 거기 서성이고 있었다는 걸 처음으로 알아차린다.

original: He steps into the light as he takes a long drag from his pipe
translate: 그는 파이프를 길게 빨아들이며 빛 속으로 걸어 나온다.

original: Get some food Markus
You're no good to any of us if you starve yourself to death
translate: 굶어 죽으면 우리한테 아무 도움도 안 돼.

original: Soon enough old friend!
{PLAYER}, this is Iben
He is a most useful individual and served the governor well before the calamities befell us
translate: 아주 유능한 인물로 재앙이 닥치기 전에는 총독을 잘 모셨지.

original: Iben’s eyes sparkle and as he puffs a ring of smoke a smile plays across his face
translate: 이벤의 눈이 반짝이고 담배 연기를 내뿜으며 얼굴에 미소가 번진다.

original: It is good to see I’m not the only useful individual to be found in these times
translate: 이런 시기에 쓸만한 사람이 나뿐만이 아니라니 반갑군.

original: Iben takes another pull on his pipe as he studies you
translate: 이벤은 당신을 관찰하며 파이프를 한 번 더 빤다.

original: The man’s skin is the texture of well-worn leather and his dark eyes have the keen-ness of a predator
translate: 남자의 피부는 닳고 닳은 가죽 같고 어두운 눈은 포식자처럼 날카롭다.

original: More than anything, this man reminds you of some well-made tool
translate: 무엇보다도, 이 남자는 잘 만든 도구를 연상시킨다.

original: Or perhaps a weapon?
So, what did you learn in Horryn?
The smell of cooking food fills the camp and mixes with the sounds of cheers and blessings coming from the ragged lot of starving refugees
translate: 음식 냄새가 캠프를 가득 채우고 굶주린 피난민들의 환호와 축복 소리가 뒤섞인다.

original: You enter the makeshift office of Markus to tell him the good news and find him agitatedly pacing back and forth
translate: 좋은 소식을 전하기 위해 마커스의 임시 사무실로 들어갔는데 그가 안절부절못하며 왔다 갔다 하고 있다.

original: {PLAYER}, I heard the news!
That is amazing!
You’ve given us a fighting chance!
And in the Emperor’s time it seems!
translate: 그것도 황제의 시간에 딱 맞춰서 말이오!

original: Iben here has returned from scouting the city and he comes bearing curious news
translate: 여기 이벤이 도시를 정찰하고 돌아왔는데 흥미로운 소식을 가져왔소.

original: Iben, tell {PLAYER} what you just told me!
translate: 이벤, 방금 나한테 한 말을 {PLAYER}에게도 해주게!

original: The recent excitement has evidently taken more than expected out of the plump man and Markus slumps heavily into his chair
translate: 최근의 흥분으로 뚱뚱한 남자는 예상보다 더 지쳤는지 마커스는 의자에 털썩 주저앉는다.

original: He gestures absent-mindedly to an unlit corner of the room as he catches his breath
translate: 그는 숨을 고르며 방의 어두운 구석을 무심코 가리킨다.

original: That will also work!
There is much to do here in camp to get those able to bear arms ready to storm the gate!
translate: 캠프에서 무기를 들 수 있는 자들을 모아 문을 공격할 준비를 시키려면 할 일이 많소!

original: I will lead them through once the signal is given and we will clasp hands over the corpses of our foes!
translate: 신호가 떨어지면 내가 그들을 이끌고 들어가 적들의 시체 위에서 손을 맞잡을 거요!

original: Then woe to those who stand against us!
translate: 그럼 우리에게 맞서는 자들에게 재앙이 있으라!

original: Iben slaps Markus on the back so briskly that his hat flies off
translate: 이벤이 마커스의 등을 세게 때리자 모자가 날아간다.

original: As Markus recovers, he begins nervously poring over papers
translate: 정신을 차린 마커스는 초조하게 서류를 들여다보기 시작한다.

original: I need to begin the mustering!
They’ll also need supplies and arms for the civilians, and we need to prepare to receive more wounded!
translate: 민간인들에게 줄 보급품과 무기도 필요하고, 더 많은 부상자를 받을 준비도 해야 해!

original: I best get to it!
Markus dips his quill in ink and starts scribbling
translate: 마커스는 깃펜에 잉크를 찍어 휘갈겨 쓰기 시작한다.

original: Ask now, while you have the chance!
Could there still be survivors in the city?
How should we eliminate the Reaver chieftains?
Is there a way to open the main gate?
Iben is humming a low tune as the thoughtfully chews his empty pipe when he notices you
translate: 이벤은 빈 파이프를 씹으며 콧노래를 흥얼거리다 당신을 알아본다.

original: Ho there {PLAYER}!
What news?
Shall we join forces?
We shall indeed!
I dare say, great deeds lie ahead of us
translate: 감히 말하건대, 우리 앞엔 위대한 일들이 기다리고 있소.

original: There are two gates in the city
The main gate to the north and one to the south, leading to the harbor
translate: 북쪽의 정문과 남쪽의 항구로 이어지는 문이지.

original: Both are heavy portcullises and the only way to raise them is to find the nearby mechanism that operates them
translate: 둘 다 무거운 내리닫이문이라 들어 올리려면 근처에 있는 작동 장치를 찾아야 하오.

original: Survivors may be hiding in barricaded houses and perhaps cellars!
translate: 생존자들은 바리케이드를 친 집이나 지하실에 숨어 있을지 모르오!

original: What’s more, the city has a large sewer system and if I were trapped inside with Reavers at my heels, I would certainly consider finding shelter there!
translate: 게다가 도시에 큰 하수구 시스템이 있는데, 내가 약탈자들에게 쫓겨 갇힌다면 분명 거기로 피신할 거요!

original: #Chapter1Maija
I can't say I remember seeing her
Doesn't mean I didn't - my emporium was always busy
translate: 안 봤다는 건 아니야. 내 상점은 항상 붐볐으니까.

original: Frantzo, the camp cook, used to own the main inn - you'll find him near the stables - if anyone saw her, it'd be him
translate: 캠프 요리사 프란조가 중앙 여관 주인이었어. 마구간 근처에 있을 텐데, 누군가 그녀를 봤다면 그 사람일 거야.

original: I wish I could tell you
Things have felt queer on Idra for a while
Folks in Horryn started changing
People I'd known for years became mean, hard
translate: 몇 년을 알고 지낸 사람들이 비열하고 거칠어졌어.

original: Violence and cruelty grew so common we stopped noticing it
translate: 폭력과 잔인함이 너무 흔해져서 신경도 안 쓰게 됐지.

original: Just last week, my neighbour... her children
translate: 지난주만 해도 내 이웃이... 그녀의 아이들이...

original: Maija's voice falters and her eyes begin to glisten with tears
translate: 마이야의 목소리가 떨리고 눈에 눈물이 맺힌다.

original: A few days ago, I was out of town, taking supplies to one of the whaling vessels
translate: 며칠 전, 포경선에 보급품을 갖다 주러 마을을 나갔었어.

original: On the way back, at sunset, I spotted a clutch of people, tearing towards us on foot from the outskirts of Horryn, covered in blood and shrieking
translate: 해질녘에 돌아오는데 호린 외곽에서 피투성이가 된 사람들이 비명을 지르며 우리 쪽으로 달려오더라고.

original: My mare was so spooked that she bolted and broke her leg in the halflight
translate: 내 말이 너무 놀라 날뛰다가 어스름 속에 다리가 부러졌어.

original: Poor old Aga - I had to help her pass on
translate: 불쌍한 아가... 내가 편히 보내줘야 했지.

original: When the townsfolk reached us, they regained their senses, and told us such terrible stories
translate: 마을 사람들이 우리에게 왔을 때 제정신을 차리고 끔찍한 이야기를 해줬어.

original: Stories of raving madmen rampaging across the town by night
translate: 미치광이들이 밤새 마을을 휘젓고 다닌다는 이야기.

original: They...let's just say, not even children were spared
translate: 그들이... 그냥 아이들도 살려두지 않았다고만 해두지.

original: But they didn't kill everyone - some were taken - to who knows where
translate: 하지만 다 죽인 건 아니야. 몇몇은 끌려갔어. 어디로 갔는지는 아무도 모르지만.

original: We heard screams on the wind for days afterwards
translate: 그 후 며칠 동안 바람에 실려 오는 비명 소리를 들었어.

original: It was clear there was no going back
There was something else
Hope to see you soon
Stay safe
The woman before you has the rugged and vital look of a life lived on the frontier
translate: 눈앞의 여자는 변방에서 살아온 삶의 거칠고 활기찬 모습을 하고 있다.

original: Though her clothes are rich and tailor-made, she wades through ankle-deep mud with rolled up sleeves, hefting heavy crates of goods off a broken cart
translate: 옷은 고급 맞춤복이지만 소매를 걷어붙이고 발목까지 오는 진흙탕을 헤치며 부서진 수레에서 무거운 물건 상자를 내리고 있다.

original: Do you need help?
Do nothing
Greetings!
The woman spins around as you greet her
What's this then?
See a lady in distress and thought you'd lend a hand did you?
The woman snaps at you
By the Golden Dead, can't this bloody wait?
translate: 황금의 망자시여, 좀 기다릴 수 없어?

original: It's not like I'm open for business!
she snaps at you
And then the poor lonely woman would owe you a debt of gratitude?
translate: 그래서 이 불쌍하고 외로운 여자가 너한테 빚이라도 지게 되나?

original: Is that it?
she snarls
I'm doing this by myself or not at all!
translate: 혼자 하든가 아예 안 하든가 할 거야!

original: The woman notices you observing her
translate: 여자가 당신이 지켜보고 있다는 걸 눈치챈다.

original: Enjoying the show are we?
Or are you just lame in the head?
In either case, come any closer and I'll have your balls!
translate: 어쨌든, 더 가까이 오면 불알을 터뜨려 버릴 줄 알아!

original: The woman snarls
Are you daft, or drunk, girl?
Lend me a hand!
The woman hefts the crate back onto the cart with a sigh
translate: 여자는 한숨을 쉬며 상자를 다시 수레에 싣는다.

original: Forgive me, I'm not myself - there's not been much rest for me amid the chaos
translate: 미안해, 내가 제정신이 아니야. 이 난리통에 제대로 쉬질 못해서.

original: All this jabbering about 'the end of all mankind!'
is starting to wear on me
In any case, I am Maija
I run - or ran - an emporium in Horryn
But you are not from Horryn, are you?
Maija's eyes light up with suspicion
What brings you to Idra, hmm?
I was heading for Horryn
We were shipwrecked just off the coast
A rescue mission
I'll ask no more, but it seems my merchant's intuition was right
translate: 더 묻진 않겠지만, 내 상인 직감이 맞았네.

original: Either way, we may yet be of help to one other
translate: 어쨌든 서로 도울 일이 있을지도 모르지.

original: Maija hefts the last of her crates off the damaged cart and into her makeshift tent
translate: 마이야는 마지막 상자를 부서진 수레에서 내려 임시 텐트로 옮긴다.

original: And I still have a modest selection of wares with me
My tight-fisted husband - probably still clutching at pennies when the lights went out - saved all our money in a bank on the mainland
translate: 구두쇠 남편이 - 아마 불이 꺼질 때도 동전을 쥐고 있었을 거야 - 전 재산을 본토 은행에 저금해 뒀어.

original: The damn bank dealt only with him - I need to retrieve the letters of credit to have any chance of accessing the funds
translate: 그 빌어먹을 은행은 남편하고만 거래해서 돈을 찾으려면 신용장을 찾아야 해.

original: They should still be in whatever is left of our old store
translate: 우리 옛 가게에 아직 남아 있을 거야. 뭐가 남았는지는 모르겠지만.

original: I understand
So?
What's it to be?
What have you got for sale?
Ask about work
What happened in Horryn?
I must be on my way
Maija
Good to see you back!
Only what I had with me when Horryn fell - but I'd be delighted to show you
translate: 호린이 함락될 때 가지고 있던 것뿐이지만 기꺼이 보여줄게.

original: They're still the same quality goods I'm known for!
translate: 여전히 내가 자랑하는 품질 좋은 물건들이야!

original: Show me!
#Chapter1Marsa
You and Marsa face each other and you can help but feel a little out of place as you engage in the clapping game with the small girl
translate: 당신은 마르사와 마주 보고 쎄쎄쎄 놀이를 하면서 자신이 좀 어울리지 않는다고 느낀다.

original: Right
Left
Both
Skip
I don't have time for this!
Great!
And now?
Keep the rythm!
Almost there!
Aaaand...?
Marsa rolls her eyes
Frogger says you're not very good at this
translate: 개굴이가 아저씨 이거 잘 못 한대.

original: The movements are 'left, left, both, right, both, skip'!
Let my try again!
I guess I'm too old for games
It's a rhyme!
All the kids in my street play it - or at least we used to I guess
translate: 우리 동네 애들은 다 이거 하고 놀아. 적어도 예전엔 그랬지.

original: She hesitates for a moment before proceeding with renewed vigor
translate: 그녀는 잠시 망설이다가 다시 활기차게 계속한다.

original: Let's try them first and then we can add the words!
Let's try!
You did it!
Now let's add in the words!
Just say them after me!
You and Marsa proceed to repeat the pattern - this time the girl begins to recite a rhyme
translate: 당신과 마르사는 동작을 반복하고 이번에는 소녀가 노래를 부르기 시작한다.

original: Hurry!
He doesn't like to be alone - he's afraid of the hounds!
translate: 혼자 있는 거 싫어해. 사냥개들을 무서워하거든!

original: Marsa
The child is ragged and muddy and crying in great big sobs
translate: 아이는 넝마를 걸치고 진흙 투성이가 된 채 펑펑 울고 있다.

original: As you approach, she wipes her nose and looks up at you, her eyes widening somewhat at the sight of Roland
translate: 다가가자 아이는 코를 훔치며 올려다보다가 롤랜드를 보고 눈이 휘둥그레진다.

original: Hrm
I'd prefer we just got on with our work
Roland grunts
As you approach, she wipes her nose and looks up at youwith teary eyes
translate: 다가가자 아이는 코를 훔치며 눈물 고인 눈으로 당신을 올려다본다.

original: What's wrong?
Marsa looks up at you
Did you find him?
Did you find Froggert?
Is this the reptilian rascal?
Give her the stuffed animal
I'm still looking
Despite the squalor surrounding the girl she's now smiling from ear to ear
translate: 주변의 지저분함에도 불구하고 소녀는 입이 귀에 걸리도록 웃고 있다.

original: Froggert is glad to be back!
Hey, do you want to play a game?
Alright!
Not right now
leave
Froggert!
the girl snatches the stuffed animal from you and showers it with hugs and kisses
translate: 소녀는 봉제 인형을 낚아채서 껴안고 뽀뽀 세례를 퍼붓는다.

original: She then turns towards you, but instead of giving you a hug, she dashes past you and throws her arms around Roland's waist
column3: 당신을 안아주는 대신 휙 지나쳐 롤랜드의 허리를 껴안는다.

original: The old warrior looks startled at the sudden show of affection
translate: 늙은 전사는 갑작스러운 애정 표현에 당황한 표정이다.

original: Alright girl, you've had your frog back - there's proper work to be done now
translate: 자 꼬마야, 개구리 찾았으니 이제 할 일을 해야지.

original: The girl steps back
Froggert says thank you!
She then turns towards you, and throws her arms around your waist
Glad to help!
Beware, beware don't dare to sleep, It brings you dreams of ebb and flow, Of churning seas and dreadful deep, And waves that lay the mountains low
translate: 조심해, 조심해, 감히 잠들지 마. 밀물과 썰물, 거친 바다와 무서운 심연, 산을 무너뜨리는 파도 꿈을 꾸게 될 거야.

original: But fear the mother most of all!
Awake before you hear her bell!
A thousand young will hear her call, And that was how the giants fell
translate: 천 마리의 새끼들이 그녀의 부름을 들으리니, 그렇게 거인들이 쓰러졌네.

original: Marsa laughs
You're getting good!
But now Froggert says it's time to go!
Bye!
The girl meanders of, chatting eagerly with her stuffed companion
translate: 소녀는 인형 친구와 열심히 수다를 떨며 어슬렁어슬렁 사라진다.

original: As you turn to leave, you can't help but feel a bit uneasy at the 'children's rhyme' and you find you mind wanders off to the horror that befell the Zephyr
translate: 떠나려는데 '아이들의 동요'에 왠지 모를 불안감을 느끼며 제피르 호에 닥쳤던 공포가 떠오른다.

original: You'd best be on your way
Driina cuts in with a surprsingly harsh tone
Girl!
Where did you learn such superstitious bilge?
translate: 그런 미신 같은 헛소리는 어디서 배웠니?

original: Marsa looks up at Driina with a startled look
I... all the children are doing it
I thought
Driina's face softens slightly
I don't think it is fitting my girl
Certainly not now. {PLAYER} let's just be on our way
Froggert small and green and fluffy and he's my best friend and now I've LOST HIM!
translate: 개굴이는 작고 초록색이고 푹신하고 내 제일 친한 친구인데 잃어버렸어요!

original: The girl looks truly heart-broken
I'll have a look
I CAN'T FIND FROGGERT!
I just had him and I was playing and now he's gone and all alone somewhere!!
translate: 방금까지 데리고 놀았는데 없어졌어요. 어딘가에 혼자 있을 거예요!!

original: Who's Froggert?
#Chapter1RefugeeMother
Driina touches the child’s hands and forehead and examines the child’s mouth
translate: 드리나는 아이의 손과 이마를 만져보고 입안을 살펴본다.

original: This infection is beyond me
translate: 이 감염은 내가 어쩔 수 없어요.

original: she says in a low voice
Drahl was right
If this Mother Katak does indeed have a cure, we’ll do well in paying her a visit
translate: 이 카탁 엄마라는 사람에게 정말 치료법이 있다면, 찾아가 보는 게 좋겠어요.

original: We'll see what we can do
translate: 우리가 할 수 있는 걸 해보죠.

original: Hannah
A tired-looking young woman is rocking back and forth, cradling a sick-looking child in her arms
translate: 지쳐 보이는 젊은 여자가 아파 보이는 아이를 팔에 안고 앞뒤로 몸을 흔들고 있다.

original: The child whimpers in pain as the mother tries desperately to sooth him
translate: 아이가 고통에 칭얼거리고 엄마는 필사적으로 달래려 한다.

original: Are you Hannah?
The woman peers up at you, her eyes wide and desperate
translate: 여자가 크고 절박한 눈으로 당신을 올려다본다.

original: What’s it to you?
That old arse send you?
Well, it don’t matter now
My Allyn’s sick
He needs medicine
Medicine?
Oh, if only I could visit mother Katak
The women say she might be able to help my Allyn
translate: 여자들은 그분이 앨린을 도와줄 수 있을지도 모른다고 했어요.

original: But Dead Emperors knows if the old woman's even still alive!
translate: 하지만 그 노인네가 아직 살아있는지는 죽은 황제들만 알겠죠!

original: Who is mother Katak?
An old woman who has provided us with remedies for as long as I can remember
translate: 내가 기억하는 한 오랫동안 우리에게 약을 지어주신 노인이에요.

original: She lives in the forest deep in the islands interior, but they say it’s not safe to stray from the camp and I couldn't leave my boy in any case
translate: 섬 내륙 깊은 숲속에 사는데, 캠프 밖으로 나가는 건 위험하다고들 하고 어쨌든 난 아이를 두고 갈 수 없어요.

original: But...you could go?
If you tell her Hannah sent you, she'll know just what I need to cure Allyn's!
translate: 한나가 보냈다고 하면, 앨린을 치료하는 데 뭐가 필요한지 아실 거예요!

original: I'll see what I can do!
I'll do it for the right price
Driina, can you help this child?
translate: 드리나, 이 아이를 도울 수 있나요?

original: The mother clasps your hands
The Golden Dead bless you!
I s'pose the clerics will want the medicine for the camp but I beg this of you
translate: 성직자들은 캠프를 위해 약을 원하겠지만 부탁드려요.

original: Bring a dose me’ Allyn first
I don’t think he has long left!
translate: 아이가 얼마 못 버틸 것 같아요!

original: She fiddles with something around her neck
All I have is this necklace my Petr gave me
translate: 내게 남은 건 표트르가 준 이 목걸이뿐이에요.

original: I'll gladly give it up to save my boy
translate: 내 아들을 살리기 위해서라면 기꺼이 내놓겠어요.

original: And I s'pose the clerics will want the medicine for the camp but I beg this of you
translate: 그리고 성직자들은 캠프를 위해 약을 원하겠지만 부탁드려요.

original: I can't help you
You've returned
Did you find the medicine?
The child looks healthier already and his fever appears to have broken
translate: 아이는 벌써 건강해 보이고 열도 내린 것 같다.

original: Hannah smiles gratefully at you
The mother removes the necklace from her neck
I can give you my necklace
I don't know how much it's worth, but it's all I have
I'll take it
Keep it
Bless the Holy Tombs!
You don't know how much this means to me
translate: 이게 저한테 얼마나 큰 의미인지 모르실 거예요.

original: And little Allyn!
Hannah gingerly feeds her child a piece of bread dipped in the foul brew
translate: 한나는 아이에게 역겨운 약물에 적신 빵 조각을 조심스럽게 먹인다.

original: The child offers a slight grimace at the taste but seems no worse for wear
translate: 아이는 맛 때문에 살짝 인상을 찌푸리지만 나빠 보이지는 않는다.

original: What about my reward?
#IdraFarmerDead
The corpse of Jakub and Ella
Jakub died attempting to shield his wife with his body
An ax is stuck in his back
Well, well
The fine folk of Horryn wasted no time in meting out justice it seems
translate: 호린의 훌륭한 분들이 정의를 실현하는 데 시간을 낭비하지 않았군.

original: Roland remarks
This should have been avoided
Driina states grimly
It would appear the people of Horryn wasted no time in meting out justice
translate: 호린 사람들이 정의를 실현하는 데 시간을 낭비하지 않은 모양이다.

original: He got what he deserved
We must try to do better
He was a cruel man no doubt, but acts like these are the last thing we need right now
translate: 그는 분명 잔인한 사람이었지만, 지금 우리에게 이런 짓은 정말 필요 없어.

original: This camp is hanging on by a thread as it is
Driina shakes her head and sighs
Let's just be on our way
Acts like these are the last thing we need right now
translate: 지금 우리에게 이런 짓은 정말 필요 없어.

original: #IdraRefugeeCampInfermary
The stench of disease and moans of the dying lie thick in the air of the makeshift infirmary
translate: 임시 진료소의 공기에는 질병의 악취와 죽어가는 이들의 신음 소리가 자욱하다.

original: An aging cleric shuffles back and forth as he tries as best he can to tend to the patients
translate: 늙은 성직자가 환자들을 돌보기 위해 최선을 다하며 이리저리 돌아다닌다.

original: He exchanges a worried glance with Driina
Drahl offers a short bow
And you know where to find me
Something about GoingOn
More about GoingOn
Finally the last part about GoingOn
The aged cleric’s face lights up when he sees you
translate: 늙은 성직자가 당신을 보자 얼굴이 밝아진다.

original: Blessing of the Dead upon you!
The gray-bearded cleric is thoughtfully wiping blood off his hands as you approach him
translate: 회색 수염을 기른 성직자는 당신이 다가가자 생각에 잠긴 채 손에 묻은 피를 닦는다.

original: Oh forgive me, I didn’t see you there
translate: 오 미안하오, 거기 있는 줄 몰랐소.

original: Are you sick?
Fever?
Stomach pains?
Bloody stool?
I don't think so
Should I be worried?
And upon you
The man examines your eyes and looks in your mouth
translate: 남자는 당신의 눈을 검사하고 입안을 살펴본다.

original: No, you do in fact seem fine
Sadly many are not so lucky
translate: 슬프게도 운이 좋지 않은 사람이 많소.

original: Is it as bad as we suspected?
Driina asks
Drahl leans in and his voice drops to a whisper
translate: 드랄이 몸을 기울이며 목소리를 낮춰 속삭인다.

original: I fear it is worse
Some sort of infection is spreading and so far I’ve been unable to cure it with neither spell nor concoction
translate: 일종의 감염이 퍼지고 있는데 지금까지 주문이나 약으로도 치료할 수가 없소.

original: I am, in fact, at my wit's end
A note of desperation creeps into the old man’s voice
Some sort of infection has broken out in the camp and so far I’ve been unable to cure it with neither spell nor concoction
translate: 캠프에 일종의 감염이 발생했는데 지금까지 주문이나 약으로도 치료할 수가 없소.

original: If I can’t find a cure, this outbreak may be the death of us all!
translate: 치료법을 찾지 못하면 이 전염병으로 우리 모두 죽게 될 거요!

original: Though I wouldn’t know where to start
That is
The old man furrows his brow
A woman, Hannah, came to me with her boy
Struck down by the outbreak
She appeared a simple girl and when she pleaded with me to look for a folk remedy
translate: 순진한 여자 같았는데 민간요법을 찾아달라고 애원하더군.

original: I chided her for it
Called her foolish
Surely Imperial medicine would prevail!
Perhaps I was the fool?
I wish now I had listened to her
translate: 지금은 그녀 말을 들었더라면 좋았을 텐데.

original: She left camp but I think she can be found in the little cottage south of here
translate: 그녀는 캠프를 떠났지만 남쪽 작은 오두막에 있을 거요.

original: I beg you, seek her out on my behalf and hear what she has to say!
translate: 부탁하오, 나 대신 그녀를 찾아가 무슨 말을 하는지 들어봐 주시오!

original: I suggest you seek out Hannah in her cottage south of camp
translate: 캠프 남쪽 오두막에 있는 한나를 찾아가 보시오.

original: She claimed to know of a folk-remedy
I’m ashamed to say that this is our best chance at this point
Drahl suspiciously accepts the potion
He grimaces as he examines the murky liquid against the light
translate: 그는 탁한 액체를 빛에 비춰보며 얼굴을 찌푸린다.

original: These are dark days indeed when the most holy order of Sepulchites must resort to folk cures and lay medicine
translate: 가장 신성한 무덤 기사단이 민간요법과 평신도 의술에 의존해야 하다니 참으로 암울한 시절이군.

original: Then again, I feel we’re left with little choice at this point
translate: 하지만 지금으로선 선택의 여지가 없는 것 같소.

original: With Driina’s help, the two clerics go from patient to patient administring the foul brew
translate: 두 성직자는 드리나의 도움을 받아 환자들을 돌아다니며 역겨운 약물을 투여한다.

original: Now we wait
The old man begins going from patient to patient, administring the foul brew
translate: 노인은 환자들을 돌아다니며 역겨운 약물을 투여하기 시작한다.

original: Have you found anything?
I have the medicine!
What do you need my child?
About the outbreak
Ask about GoingOn
The effect does not take long to manifest and within hours the patients seem to be back on their feet
translate: 효과는 금방 나타나 몇 시간 만에 환자들이 다시 일어설 수 있게 된다.

original: Drahl appears both relieved and pensive
We, you, cured them!
I was certain their lives were forfeit and yet here they walk out on their own two legs
translate: 목숨을 잃을 거라고 확신했는데 제 발로 걸어 나가다니.

original: Though at what price I wonder?
In any case, I took the time to gather some items that might serve you well in the trials that no doubt lie ahead of you
translate: 어쨌든, 앞으로 닥칠 시련에 도움이 될 만한 물건들을 좀 모아봤소.

original: He hands you a collection of potion-bottles
Go now
I’ll remain here if I am needed
May the Dead ever watch over you
Driina pats the old man gently on the back
You did well my old friend
So, what news?
Is a cure in sight?
About that
No news yet but I have other questions
translate: 아직 소식은 없지만 다른 질문이 있습니다.

original: I do have a small surplus of supplies, yes
Also, if you're gravely wounded or suffering from disease and the like, I can assist you
translate: 그리고 심각한 부상을 입거나 질병 등으로 고통받고 있다면 도와드릴 수 있습니다.

original: # Chapter_1_Wreck
#Chapter1Leva
Good to see ya again!
Just glad to see I’m not the only one left alive
Looking to barter a bit?
Sure
#Chapter1LostSailors
Hiding along the cliffs, is a lone surviving member of the Zephyr crew
translate: 절벽을 따라 숨어 있는 제피르 호의 유일한 생존자다.

original: They killed them all!
Stabbed old Nino right in the throat!
And now you've come to finish me?!
We need to find somewhere to hide!
Tell the sailor about the other survivors
Standing on the edge of the cliff is a crew-man from the Zephyr lucky enough to have made it ashore
translate: 절벽 가장자리에 운 좋게 상륙한 제피르 호 선원이 서 있다.

original: The man is swaying and looks in shock
translate: 남자는 비틀거리고 충격에 빠진 것 같다.

original: I saw it!
By the dead, I just saw it out there!
translate: 죽은 자들을 걸고, 방금 저기서 봤다고!

original: The thing that sunk us!
It's still out there!!!
The man begins jabbering incoherently
You're back!
Found anyone else alive?
Emperors watch over you for helping me find the other survivors
translate: 다른 생존자들을 찾게 도와줘서 황제께서 널 지켜주실 거야.

original: You’re always welcome in our camp as far as I’m concerned!
translate: 내 생각엔 넌 우리 캠프에 언제든 환영이야!

original: The man thanks you profusely and hastily makes his way towards the camp where his comrades are waiting
translate: 남자는 연신 고마워하며 동료들이 기다리는 캠프로 서둘러 간다.

original: #Chapter1Wreck
The monstrosity screeches and as it does, packs of rabid vermin spews forth from the dark recesses of the wreck!
translate: 괴물이 비명을 지르자 난파선의 어두운 구석에서 광견병 걸린 해충 떼가 쏟아져 나온다!

original: You stop dead in your tracks as the grotesque rat-thing sits up on its hind legs, its hunched form a full head taller than you
translate: 기괴한 쥐 괴물이 뒷다리로 일어서자 당신은 제자리에 멈춰 선다. 구부정한 모습이 당신보다 머리 하나는 더 크다.

original: The beast cocks its head slightly and its tiny eyes regard you intently
translate: 짐승은 고개를 살짝 갸웃거리며 작은 눈으로 당신을 뚫어지게 쳐다본다.

original: Then to your utter horror, words form in its bestial throat
translate: 그러자 끔찍하게도 짐승의 목구멍에서 말이 되어 나온다.

original: It comes
It is one!
With fangs it comes into the womb!
Does it come to feed?
To give offerings?
It?
Are you talking about me?
It stirs!
Does it bring offerings?
Or has it come to share in the meat?
The horrid creature gouges a lump of flesh from one of the corpses and offers it to you expectantly
translate: 끔찍한 생물이 시체 중 하나에서 살점 한 덩이를 파내어 기대에 찬 눈빛으로 당신에게 내민다.

original: Bloody filth!
Roland spits behind you!
What are you?
The song woke us!
Calls us!
It hears it!
Now we eat and multiply
And serve!
Song?
Serve what?
You emerge into the broken hull of the ship
The ruined hold is unrecognizable and strewn with the debris of ruined cargo
translate: 망가진 선창은 알아볼 수 없고 망가진 화물 파편이 널려 있다.

original: As your eyes adjust to the darkness you become aware of sounds emanating from the darkness
translate: 어둠에 눈이 익숙해지자 어둠 속에서 들려오는 소리를 알아차린다.

original: Chittering?
Or is it voices?
AhhHH!!!!
It does not serve!?
We eats it!!!
It rises!
From the deep!
Rise! it calls!
It does not hear it?
IT DOES NOT HEAR IT!
#Chapter1WreckSailors
The ragged band of survivors fan out around you like a pack of starved predators
translate: 누더기를 걸친 생존자 무리가 굶주린 포식자 떼처럼 당신 주위로 흩어진다.

original: Currents brought us straight ashore so if the Dead are with us, any survivors would have landed on this here shoreline
translate: 해류가 우릴 해안으로 바로 데려왔으니 망자들이 돕는다면 생존자들은 여기 해안선에 상륙했을 거요.

original: You might want to start by searching the cliffs just to the north
translate: 바로 북쪽 절벽부터 수색해 보는 게 좋을 거요.

original: Also others are bound to have landed in the same area where you landed
translate: 당신이 상륙한 곳에도 다른 사람들이 상륙했을 수 있소.

original: Finally there is a lighthouse to the south-east and some may have headed there
translate: 마지막으로 남동쪽에 등대가 있으니 그리로 간 사람들도 있을 거요.

original: What do you know of this island?
I had other questions
If you come across any more of my men, tell them where to find me
translate: 내 부하들을 더 발견하면 나를 어디서 찾을 수 있는지 말해 주시오.

original: Both I and the guild will thank you if you do
translate: 그러면 나도 길드도 당신에게 감사할 거요.

original: Snow turns his back on you and joins his men around the fire
translate: 스노우는 등을 돌리고 모닥불 주위의 부하들에게 합류한다.

original: But you are not all to blame
It seems our journey was doomed no matter!
translate: 어차피 우리 여정은 끝장날 운명이었던 것 같으니!

original: That thing!
What was it?
And this island
There is something terribly wrong here!
All I know is we need to work together if we are to survive!
translate: 내가 아는 건 살아남으려면 힘을 합쳐야 한다는 거요!

original: All I know is that it's each man for himself now
translate: 내가 아는 건 이제 각자도생이라는 거요.

original: The man's eyes flash from sorrow to rage in an instant
translate: 남자의 눈이 슬픔에서 순식간에 분노로 바뀐다.

original: Before you know it he draws his dagger
What can I do for you?
What was it that attacked the Zephyr?
What do you know of this place?
About the other survivors
I found your men
I've been here before, years ago
translate: 몇 년 전에 여기 온 적이 있소.

original: Didn't leave Horryn back then but it was nothing but a backwater port like any other
translate: 그때는 호린을 떠나지 않았지만 다른 곳과 다를 바 없는 시골 항구였소.

original: Full of people not too fond of strangers and superstitious fishermen
translate: 낯선 사람을 별로 좋아하지 않는 사람들과 미신을 믿는 어부들로 가득했지.

original: Nothing like now
Don't you feel it?
Air smells strange, like right before a thunder-storm!
translate: 공기 냄새가 이상해, 마치 폭풍우 직전처럼!

original: And the beasts!
I tell you, I've sailed 'round the Empire for near on twenty years and I've never seen creatures like these!
translate: 내가 제국을 20년 가까이 항해했지만 이런 생물은 본 적이 없소!

original: And then there are the men
The men?
We saw men stalking the fog
Dangerous men I thought
Then I came across some of their handy-work
Tommyn and Dill the cabin boy
Black arrows in their back the both of them
translate: 둘 다 등에 검은 화살이 박혀 있었소.

original: Best to keep far away from them
Where should I look for survivors?
Your group is growing I see?
It always is with you mercenaries
And honest men lose their lives!
I had not expected to see you alive mercenary!
But you stood up for us on the Zephyr and you saved the lives of some of my men so I'm glad you made it
translate: 하지만 제피르 호에서 우리 편을 들어줬고 내 부하들 목숨도 구해줬으니 살아남아서 다행이오.

original: Your captain was in the right so I was glad to
Your crew didn't deserve to be slaughtered
It was a means to an end
Nonetheless, it did us little good
translate: 그럼에도 불구하고, 별 도움은 안 됐소.

original: I've never seen anything like that beast before
The way it tore the ship appart?
Something is wrong here!
What curse has befallen us?
All I know is that we need to work together if we are to survive!
translate: 내가 아는 건 살아남으려면 힘을 합쳐야 한다는 거요!

original: It's each man for himself now
Back to finish the job?
Well, ship's gone
So the captain and most of my mates!
But by the depths you won't have me without a fight!
column3: 싸우지 않고 날 잡진 못할 거다!

original: Snow spits at you
Roland leans in and whispers in a low voice
translate: 롤랜드가 몸을 기울여 낮은 목소리로 속삭인다.

original: Remember, these are guilders
If the guild finds them and they talk, it'll mean trouble
translate: 길드가 놈들을 찾아서 입을 열면 골치 아파져.

original: Then a fight you shall have!
Calm down lest I end you here and now!
I'm sorry for how it turned out
A gaunt-faced man that looks like he's spent more years at sea than ashore stands before you
translate: 육지보다 바다에서 보낸 세월이 더 길어 보이는 수척한 얼굴의 남자가 당신 앞에 서 있다.

original: If you recall, this was the Zephyr's first mate
You remember his crewmates calling him 'Snow'
He glares at you with a set jaw and clenched fists
translate: 그는 턱을 앙다물고 주먹을 꽉 쥔 채 당신을 노려본다.

original: He offers a smile that doesn't quite reach his eyes as you apporach
translate: 다가가자 그는 눈에 닿지 않는 미소를 짓는다.

original: Greet the man
I've never seen anything like it
There are beasts in the depths but nothing like this!
translate: 심연에 짐승들이 있다지만 이런 건 아니었소!

original: It was like something out of a sailors nightmare!
Blessed dead, how will we ever get off this island?
translate: 망자들이여, 이 섬을 어떻게 빠져나가야 하나?

original: There’s safety in numbers and every face from the old crew that turns up in camp here is a boon
column3: 옛 동료가 캠프에 나타나는 건 언제나 반가운 일이지.

original: Especially considering how many were lost
In any case, I hear from the crew that you’ve been doing good work!
translate: 어쨌든, 선원들에게 당신이 잘하고 있다고 들었소!

original: We haven’t much, but we scraped together a small bag of gold for you
translate: 가진 건 별로 없지만, 금화를 조금 모았소.

original: Snow hands you a small, worn pouch of coins
translate: 스노우가 작고 낡은 동전 주머니를 건넨다.

original: That being said, it appears it might be too soon for celebration
translate: 그렇긴 하지만, 축하하기엔 너무 이른 것 같소.

original: Aye - that they did
And it cost the lives of many a good man
translate: 그리고 그 때문에 좋은 사람들이 많이 죽었소.

original: The man looks at you for a moment and his eyes begin to water from sorrow, anger and exhaustion
translate: 남자는 잠시 당신을 바라보다가 슬픔, 분노, 피로로 눈물이 맺힌다.

original: Why did you do it?
Gold?!
She was such a fine ship!
And us crewmen - we were like brothers!
And now both ship and men lie broken on these cursed cliffs!
translate: 그런데 이제 배도 사람도 이 저주받은 절벽에서 부서져 버렸소!

original: It was just a job
Things got out of hand
You had it coming
Sorry are you?
Tell that to men who were dragged under by that leviathan!
Tell that to the guild when they hear of this!
Calm down man!
You leave me no choice!
A small group of exhausted figures sit huddled around a small campfire
translate: 지친 기색이 역력한 작은 무리가 모닥불 주위에 옹기종기 모여 있다.

original: You recognize them immediately as a small group of survivors from the Zephyr
translate: 당신은 그들이 제피르 호의 생존자들임을 즉시 알아본다.

original: One of them suddenly notices you and the men stumble to their feet; Some grasping for makeshift weapons and others looking around for a way to flee!
translate: 그중 한 명이 갑자기 당신을 발견하고 남자들이 비틀거리며 일어선다. 몇몇은 급조한 무기를 잡고 다른 이들은 도망칠 길을 찾는다!

original: One of the men suddenly notices you and the men stumble to their feet, smiling at you and waving you over to their meager fire
translate: 그중 한 명이 갑자기 당신을 발견하고 남자들이 비틀거리며 일어서서 미소를 지으며 빈약한 모닥불 쪽으로 손짓한다.

original: Approach peacefully
Calm down?
I say there's one of you and more of us!
Of that I have no doubt
But if there is at least a shred of decency left in you, I'll beg this small favor
translate: 하지만 당신에게 조금이라도 양심이 남아있다면, 작은 부탁 하나만 하겠소.

original: Aye, there is no disagreeing with this
Though my men and I have naught to offer save our fire and what shelter these huts may provide
translate: 내 부하들과 내가 줄 수 있는 건 불과 이 오두막뿐이지만.

original: There are beds inside if you require, but little else
translate: 필요하다면 안쪽에 침대가 있지만, 그게 다요.

original: There is one last thing
A favor I'd ask of you
You may have already seen her, but a portion of the Zephyr lies upon the shore up along the coast north-west of here
translate: 이미 봤을지도 모르겠지만, 제피르 호의 일부가 북서쪽 해안을 따라 놓여 있소.

original: It breaks my heart to see the old girl like this
translate: 그 녀석을 그렇게 보는 게 가슴 아프군.

original: See, our duty to her doesn’t end with her sinking
translate: 배가 침몰했다고 우리의 의무가 끝난 건 아니오.

original: She’s still the property of the Guild
As is any cargo she was carrying
We were unable to get to her before but the tides seem to have shifted her now and I sent a small group out there to see if they couldn’t find a way into her
translate: 전에는 접근할 수 없었는데 조류 때문에 위치가 바뀐 것 같아서 안으로 들어갈 방법이 없는지 확인하려고 소규모 인원을 보냈소.

original: And?
Snow looks down
That was hours ago
Too long
Something’s wrong or they would be back by now
translate: 무슨 일이 생긴 게 아니라면 벌써 돌아왔을 거요.

original: Now, you’ve done a lot for us and I’m almost afraid to ask for more but I need to know what happened to my boyos
translate: 이미 많은 도움을 줘서 더 부탁하기 미안하지만, 내 부하들에게 무슨 일이 생겼는지 알아야겠소.

original: Snow looks at you pleadingly
Dead bless you
As I said, the wreckage lies just a few hundred yards up the coast
translate: 말했듯이, 잔해는 해안을 따라 수백 야드 위에 있소.

original: Watch your back and be ready for anything
translate: 등 뒤를 조심하고 만반의 준비를 하시오.

original: More bloodshed
I fear this island may be the end of us all yet
translate: 이 섬이 우리 모두의 무덤이 될까 두렵소.

original: At least the wreckage might be safe enough to explore now
translate: 적어도 지금은 잔해를 탐색하기에 안전할지 모르지.

original: The supplies she carries may keep us going for weeks
translate: 거기 실린 보급품이면 몇 주는 버틸 수 있을 거요.

original: I’m ashamed to say I have nothing to offer you besides the promise that the Nautical Guild will not forget your service
translate: 부끄럽지만 항해 길드가 당신의 노고를 잊지 않을 거라는 약속 외에는 줄 게 없소.

original: A lifetime under the mast is thanks enough for a Guilder isn’t it?
translate: 돛대 아래서 평생을 보내는 게 길드원들에겐 충분한 감사 아니겠어?

original: Kat offers sarcastically
Good bye
#Chapter1WreckSpotted
The ship is utterly shattered with its hull broken in half
translate: 배는 완전히 산산조각이 나 선체가 반으로 갈라져 있다.

original: It seems impossible that the ship would have remained afloat for long enough to settle on these cliffs in its current condition
translate: 이런 상태로 이 절벽에 안착할 만큼 오래 떠 있었다는 게 불가능해 보인다.

original: It’s almost as if something placed it here
translate: 마치 누군가 여기에 갖다 놓은 것 같다.

original: Though for what reason, you can only guess
translate: 이유는 짐작만 할 수 있을 뿐이지만.

original: You spot a makeshift plank bridge leading up into the shattered hull
translate: 부서진 선체로 이어지는 임시 판자 다리가 보인다.

original: As far as you can tell there is currently no way into the ship, though that may change as it shifts in the tides
translate: 현재로선 배 안으로 들어갈 방법이 없어 보이지만, 조류에 따라 바뀔 수도 있다.

original: Laying ahead of you like some gargantuan beached sea-creature, are the smashed remains of the Zephyr
translate: 거대한 바다 생물이 해변에 밀려온 것처럼, 제피르 호의 부서진 잔해가 눈앞에 놓여 있다.

original: You shudder to think of the monstrosity that caused the demise of the once-elegant ship
translate: 한때 우아했던 배를 이렇게 만든 괴물을 생각하니 몸서리가 쳐진다.

original: What manner of terror was that creature?
Kat muses as if reading your mind
translate: 캣이 당신의 마음을 읽은 듯 중얼거린다.

original: #Chapter1ZephyrSurvivors
One of the wretched surviors from the Zephyr
translate: 제피르 호의 비참한 생존자 중 한 명.

original: The man looks torn, tattered and exhausted
As you approach the sailor shrinks back in terror whilst avoiding your gaze
translate: 다가가자 선원은 공포에 질려 뒷걸음질 치며 시선을 피한다.

original: Talk to Snow if you want something
As you approach the sailor offers a tired, but grateful smile
translate: 다가가자 선원은 지쳤지만 감사한 미소를 짓는다.

original: #HoundAmbush
A sudden sound makes you stop dead in your tracks
Someone or something is charging towards you through the tall grass!
column3: 혹은 무언가가 긴 풀숲을 헤치고 당신에게 달려든다!

original: A woman dressed in the livery of the nautical guild emerges from the fog!
translate: 항해 길드 제복을 입은 여자가 안개 속에서 나타난다!

original: Panic is written on her face and she’s panting heavily!
translate: 얼굴에는 공포가 서려 있고 숨을 헐떡인다!

original: They’re… they’re right behind me!!
the woman shouts excitedly
Leva!
What’s going on?
Kat grabs the woman by the shoulders
A pack of lean, growling predators emerges from the fog
translate: 안개 속에서 날렵하고 으르렁거리는 포식자 무리가 나타난다.

original: The hounds snarl and then lunge at you!
Bless you for saving my hide!
I saw smoke rising from the south and was making my way there when these mongrels picked up my scent!
translate: 남쪽에서 연기가 피어오르는 걸 보고 그쪽으로 가고 있었는데 이 잡종들이 내 냄새를 맡았어!

original: I need to get going but be sure to come visit the camp - I might have some things to trade!
translate: 가봐야겠지만 꼭 캠프에 들러. 교환할 물건이 있을지도 모르니까!

original: The woman hurriedly jogs off towards the south
#IdraWreckRatAmbush
Suddenly an echoing cacophony of chittering and screeching erupts from the narrow ravines around you!
translate: 갑자기 주변의 좁은 협곡에서 찍찍거리고 비명 지르는 소리가 메아리친다!

original: A wave of mangy fur and snapping jaws dripping diseased mucus rolls towards you
translate: 병든 점액을 뚝뚝 흘리는 턱을 딱딱거리며 지저분한 털 뭉치 파도가 당신을 향해 밀려온다.

original: # Chapter_2_Horryn
#HorrynAmbush
As you approach the city-square, panicked cries of fear, pain and dispair echo across the plaza
translate: 도시 광장에 다가가자 두려움, 고통, 절망에 찬 공포의 외침이 광장에 메아리친다.

original: Acting quickly you quickly loosen your belt and wrap it around her leg
translate: 당신은 재빨리 허리띠를 풀어 그녀의 다리를 감싼다.

original: Out of the fog, coming fromthe Fisherman’s Gate, a thin wretch of a man limps into view
translate: 안개 속 어부의 문 쪽에서 비쩍 마른 불쌍한 남자가 절뚝거리며 나타난다.

original: He hefts a rusty cleaver, and drags a terrified woman behind him by her auburn hair
translate: 그는 녹슨 식칼을 들어 올리며 겁에 질린 여자의 적갈색 머리채를 잡고 뒤로 끈다.

original: #HorrynGuardLedgerScene
The boy’s jaw goes slack at first
Then the smallest hint of resolve comes across his face
translate: 그러다 얼굴에 아주 작은 결의가 스친다.

original: He’s determined to face his end standing up and he lunges at you!
translate: 그는 서서 최후를 맞이하기로 결심하고 당신에게 달려든다!

original: The boy’s weapon lowers slightly
I’m guarding the eastern harbor tower
translate: 난 동쪽 항구 망루를 지키고 있어.

original: So don’t you get any ideas - This is Imperial property!
translate: 그러니 딴생각하지 마. 이건 제국 재산이야!

original: You know, it's pretty safe out there now
You could just leave
I need to get to that shelf behind you
translate: 네 뒤에 있는 선반에 가야 해.

original: As you enter the chamber a pale young man in ill-fitting armor belonging to the Horryn city guard staggers backwards
translate: 방에 들어서자 호린 경비대 소속의 헐렁한 갑옷을 입은 창백한 청년이 뒷걸음질 친다.

original: He holds his weapon before him in trembling hands
Don’t come any closer!
I know how to use this!
Do you now... boy?
Roland grumbles as he stalks into the room next to you
translate: 롤랜드가 당신 옆으로 성큼성큼 걸어 들어오며 투덜거린다.

original: Put that away before you get hurt!
Take it easy
I'm not going to hurt you
I was asked to guard this tower and by the Golden, that is what I’m going to do!!!
translate: 이 망루를 지키라고 명령받았고, 황금의 망자를 걸고 난 그렇게 할 거야!!!

original: His voice breaks into the falsetto of someone not quite past their teenage years
translate: 그의 목소리가 십 대를 갓 넘긴 듯한 가성으로 갈라진다.

original: Roland takes a step forwards, causing the boy to let out a pathetic whimper
translate: 롤랜드가 한 발짝 다가서자 소년은 애처로운 신음 소리를 낸다.

original: Want to die for duty, hm?
translate: 임무를 위해 죽고 싶은 거냐, 엉?

original: I just want to talk a bit
You leave me no choice
Y-you’re not?
Then what are you doing here?
These records are Imperial property and I’m not letting you have them!
translate: 이 기록들은 제국 재산이고 절대 못 가져가!

original: Now back away!
It's pretty safe out there now
You can leave if you want to
The chamberlain sends orders
It's safe out there now and you can leave
Lie
About what?!
It's pretty safe out there now!
The young man brandishes his weapon with trembling hands
Halt!
I need to talk to you
As if to confirm your words, the shouts of the boy's comrades echo from the plaza
translate: 당신의 말을 확인시켜 주듯, 소년의 동료들의 외침이 광장에서 메아리친다.

original: A wave of relief washes over the his face
Golden bless me!
He pushes past you and flees into the city without looking behind
translate: 그는 당신을 밀치고 뒤도 돌아보지 않은 채 도시로 도망친다.

original: #HorrynReaverChief1
Oleg smiles broadly as he imitates a sawing motion with his hands
translate: 올렉은 손으로 톱질하는 시늉을 하며 활짝 웃는다.

original: Savage blades do bloody work
The Whispering tablets came to me
Begon now and do not return until you are done
translate: 이제 가라. 그리고 일을 마치기 전엔 돌아오지 마.

original: #HorrynReaverChief1GateGuard
He had the tablets even before the Father came to us
translate: 그는 아버지가 우리에게 오기도 전에 석판을 가지고 있었어.

original: #HorrynReaverChief2
My patience is running low
I just wanted to ask some questions
Hmm, I see
And when the Butcher feast’s on the old fool’s liver he’ll be so certain he’s won Father’s favor that he might not even feel my blade between his ribs
translate: 그리고 도살자가 그 늙은 바보의 간을 먹으며 아버지의 총애를 얻었다고 확신할 때
column3: 내 칼이 갈비뼈 사이로 들어오는 것조차 느끼지 못할 거야.

original: Blood sprays from the Butcher’s mouth as the strains from the effort and with a wet, sickening snap, Kala’s arm is torn from her body
translate: 도살자가 힘을 주자 입에서 피가 뿜어져 나오고, 질척하고 끔찍한 소리와 함께 칼라의 팔이 몸에서 뜯겨나간다.

original: #HorrynReaverChief3
Mesmerized, he traces the grotesque carvings with fat, blood smeared fingers
translate: 그는 넋을 잃고 피 묻은 굵은 손가락으로 기괴한 조각들을 더듬는다.

original: WHat now?
#HorrynSpiral1
#HorrynSurvivorCora
Tell me about the reavers?
Figthing each other?
#HorrynSurvivorNatia
#HorrynSurvivorPhilip
Besides the reavers seem to be holed up in their separate parts of town for now
translate: 게다가 약탈자들은 당분간 도시 각 구역에 숨어 있을 것 같아.

original: #ReaverZombieScene
# Chapter_3_Horryn
#HorrynBlacksmithScene
Good bye!
You meet someone for the first time
More intro exposition
You have formed a first impression and are ready to act
So, what will it be?
Show me your wares
I have only the finest wares!
#HorrynChiefsDead
You stand dazed, surveying the carnage around you
translate: 당신은 멍하니 서서 주변의 참상을 둘러본다.

original: The three Reaver chieftains lie dead
translate: 세 명의 약탈자 우두머리가 죽어 있다.

original: Now the one they call Father awaits you inside the still occupied keep
translate: 이제 그들이 아버지라 부르는 자가 여전히 점령 중인 성채 안에서 당신을 기다린다.

original: The sound of footsteps interrupt your thoughts and you whirl around ready for another melee
translate: 발소리가 당신의 생각을 방해하고 당신은 또 다른 싸움을 준비하며 획 돌아선다.

original: To your surprise you see the surviving soldiers of the Horryn guard bolstered by armed refugees!
translate: 놀랍게도 무장한 피난민들로 보강된 호린 경비대의 생존 병사들이 보인다!

original: Moving methodically from house to house, they begin the task of retaking the ravaged town
translate: 그들은 체계적으로 집집마다 이동하며 황폐해진 도시를 탈환하기 시작한다.

original: Cries of jubilation mix with the anguished cries of people finding the corpses of former loved ones
translate: 환호성과 사랑하는 이들의 시체를 발견한 사람들의 고통스러운 울부짖음이 뒤섞인다.

original: Nonetheless, it does not take long for life to creep back into the desolate streets
translate: 그럼에도 불구하고 황량한 거리에 다시 활기가 도는 데는 그리 오래 걸리지 않는다.

original: One of the soldiers approaches you
translate: 병사 중 한 명이 당신에게 다가온다.

original: {PLAYER}, I bring word from the chamberlain!
He’s requested you find him at the tavern over by the temple
He asks you make haste
The young man offers a short bow and continues on his way
translate: 청년은 짧게 목례하고 제 갈 길을 간다.

original: #HorrynClothierScene
#HorrynFirgolQuestGiverScene
A grimy woman with a haggard look on her face approaches you
translate: 지저분하고 수척한 얼굴의 여자가 당신에게 다가온다.

original: You get the impression she would normally be quite beautiful but starvation, disease and constant fear has erased that from her features
translate: 원래는 꽤 아름다웠을 것 같지만 굶주림, 질병, 끊임없는 공포가 그녀의 얼굴에서 그 흔적을 지워버렸다.

original: Perhaps for good
Please, they say you are looking for a way off of this island!
translate: 제발요, 이 섬을 나갈 방법을 찾고 계신다면서요!

original: I’m Julia
My sister, Ylia, lives in a small village called Firgol on the island north of here
translate: 제 언니 일리아가 여기 북쪽 섬에 있는 퍼골이라는 작은 마을에 살아요.

original: I was supposed to travel to her before this all broke out and she must be worried sick that I have not arrived yet
translate: 이 사단이 나기 전에 언니에게 가기로 했었는데 아직 도착하지 않아서 걱정하고 있을 거예요.

original: She wrings her hands
I’m in no condition to travel now and so should your travels take you to Firgol, would you please seek out Ylia?
translate: 전 지금 여행할 상태가 아니에요. 혹시 퍼골에 가시게 되면 일리아 언니를 찾아주시겠어요?

original: Tell her that I’m still alive and not to worry?
I’m sure they have all kinds of troubles themselves up there and I wouldn’t want her to spend time worrying about me as well
translate: 거기도 온갖 문제가 많을 텐데 저 때문에 걱정하게 하고 싶지 않아요.

original: I'll see if I can't find her
May the Golden bless you
I’m sure my sister can spare a few coins once you tell her the good news
translate: 좋은 소식을 전해주시면 언니가 동전 몇 푼 정도는 줄 수 있을 거예요.

original: A few tears of joy leave streaks on her soot-covered face
translate: 기쁨의 눈물이 그을음 묻은 그녀의 얼굴에 자국을 남긴다.

original: Hello there!
Looking for something?
Are you Ylia?
Do you have a sister in Horryn?
Why yes that’s me!
My sister you say?
You must mean Julia?
I’m expecting her to visit me any day now!
She apologies for being late but at least she’s still alive
Tell Ylia about Horryn
Ylia looks more surprised than horrified
translate: 일리아는 공포보다는 놀라움이 더 큰 표정이다.

original: Are you sure you’re not mistaken?
Julia is not late at all
In fact she’s still not due until a day or two!
translate: 사실 도착하려면 하루 이틀 더 있어야 해요!

original: And what’s this you’re saying about Horryn?
We’ve had no news of any calamities!
translate: 재앙 같은 소식은 전혀 못 들었는데요!

original: I can assure you I’m not mistaken
Well, I’m not sure what to say about this
I suppose that it’s good my sister is safe if we are indeed talking about the same person
translate: 정말 같은 사람 얘기라면 동생이 무사하다니 다행이네요.

original: Thank you in any case
I was promised payment
As the woman goes about her chores you meet Embla’s eyes
translate: 여자가 집안일을 하러 가자 엠블라와 눈이 마주친다.

original: The woman was late for her arrival two days before she even supposed to set out?
translate: 출발하기도 전인 이틀 전에 도착이 늦었다고?

original: A misunderstanding perhaps?
Though I fear this is just another expression of the madness that grips these isles
translate: 하지만 이 또한 이 섬들을 덮친 광기의 또 다른 일면일까 두렵군요.

original: Ylia looks slightly taken aback
Oh
Yes I suppose you’re right
I don’t have much but here are a few gold-pieces at least,
translate: 가진 건 별로 없지만, 적어도 금화 몇 닢이라도 여기 있습니다.

original: Now goodbye
#HorrynFlopHouseScene
A matronly woman with red cheeks and impressively bad teeth gives you a suspicious look
translate: 붉은 뺨에 치열이 엉망인 중년 여인이 당신을 의심스러운 눈초리로 쳐다봅니다.

original: You’re either looking for a bed and a bowl of stew or you ain’t got nuffin to do here!
translate: 침대랑 스튜 한 그릇을 찾는 게 아니라면, 여기서 얼쩡거리지 마쇼!

original: Let's see what you have to offer!
#HorrynFrantzo
You say goodbye and leave
Have a look!
Rooms are being cleaned and we even have warm food on the stove
translate: 방은 청소 중이고 스토브엔 따뜻한 음식도 있습니다.

original: Finally the last part about Menu
You may ask some questions!
Show me your list of services!
Ask about Rumors
Something about Rumors
More about Rumors
Finally the last part about Rumors
#HorrynGallian
Driina sighs
Truly there are many things you do not understand about this world
translate: 진정 당신은 이 세상에 대해 모르는 것이 많군요.

original: It nourishes me to stand in this hall and find its altar unmolested by the madness that has engulfed this island
translate: 이 섬을 뒤덮은 광기 속에서도 훼손되지 않은 제단을 보며 이 회당에 서 있으니 힘이 나는군요.

original: Tenderly, she touches the base of the statue and offers a whispered prayer
translate: 그녀는 조각상의 기단을 부드럽게 어루만지며 속삭이듯 기도를 올립니다.

original: Why is he masked?
He looks so frail
You worship a corpse
Madness
It symbolizes the sacrifices he made when he built the world we see around us today
translate: 오늘날 우리가 보는 세상을 건설할 때 그분이 치르신 희생을 상징합니다.

original: The cost of all those touched by the reticulum is indeed steep in the end
translate: 레티큘럼의 손길이 닿은 이들이 치러야 할 대가는 결국 혹독하니까요.

original: We must never forget that
translate: 우린 결코 그걸 잊어서는 안 됩니다.

original: But why is he masked?
The elegant marble statue looms over you
translate: 우아한 대리석 조각상이 당신 위로 우뚝 솟아 있습니다.

original: Unblemished and pristine
An emaciated form, dressed in ragged robes frozen mid-gesture while unmasking
column3: 가면을 벗으려는 동작을 취한 채 굳어 있습니다.

original: Gallian - the first Emperor - presides over the serene temple interior
translate: 초대 황제 갈리안이 고요한 사원 내부를 관장하고 있습니다.

original: Driina reverently presses her palms lightly against her face and then removes them in a gesture reminding you of the statue
translate: 드리나는 경건하게 손바닥을 얼굴에 가볍게 댔다가 떼는데

original: Driina?
The Emperors are very old
Often several hundred years
They are also beyond powerful - one with the Reticulum
translate: 또한 그분들은 강력함을 넘어선 존재들입니다. 레티큘럼과 하나가 되신 분들이죠.

original: One can only imagine the effect it has on their physical form
translate: 그것이 육신에 어떤 영향을 미칠지는 상상에 맡길 뿐입니다.

original: Perhaps it is best that the common folk never have to see the price of such power
translate: 어쩌면 평범한 사람들은 그런 힘의 대가를 보지 않는 편이 나을지도 모릅니다.

original: For a moment, a shadow falls over the room - then it passes
translate: 잠시 방 안에 그림자가 드리워지더니 이내 지나갑니다.

original: You must be on your way
Nothing
They are our Golden Dead and we must give praise that they watch over us
translate: 그분들은 우리의 '황금의 죽은 자들'이시니, 우리를 지켜봐 주심에 찬양을 드려야 합니다.

original: Driina offers a comforting smile
Shall we be on our way?
Emperors don masks when they ascend to the throne
Being amongst the oldest and most powerful of the Magi, they are already more-than-human
translate: 마법사들 중 가장 오래되고 강력한 존재로서

original: When they don the mask, it symbolizes that they have risen beyond even their brethren
translate: 가면을 쓴다는 건 그들의 형제들조차 뛰어넘어 승천했음을 상징합니다.

original: And they are never seen without it?
translate: 그럼 가면 없이는 절대 볼 수 없나요?

original: The Emperor is never seen without their mask save by the Excubitors of the Imperial Palace
column3: 황제의 가면 벗은 모습을 본 자는 없습니다.

original: The silence hangs for a moment
There is something unsaid
#HorrynGuardCaptainScene
I’m ashamed to say me and a handful of my lads ended up captured by Reavers
column3: 저와 부하 몇 명이 약탈자들에게 붙잡혔었습니다.

original: They started killing us off one by one
Real slow while the rest were forced to watch
translate: 나머지가 억지로 지켜보는 가운데 아주 천천히요.

original: Or even
Her eyes grow glassy then she shakes her head defiantly
Then the mad-men suddenly started infighting!
translate: 그런데 그 미치광이들이 갑자기 자기들끼리 싸우기 시작하더군요!

original: Like bloody animals!
But at least we managed to flee
translate: 덕분에 우린 간신히 도망칠 수 있었죠.

original: And who are you?
Best of luck and stay safe
She holds up her hands in apology
translate: 그녀가 사과하듯 두 손을 들어 올립니다.

original: I’m sorry!
Without your aid, we’d all be dead
translate: 당신 도움이 없었더라면 우린 모두 죽었을 겁니다.

original: It’s just that me and the boyos missed most of the fighting and it pains me to see we had to rely on mercenaries to keep Imperial citizens safe
translate: 저와 부하들이 전투 대부분을 놓친 것도 모자라, 제국 시민의 안전을 용병에게 의존해야 했다는 사실이 뼈아파서 그럽니다.

original: Indeed, I don't remember seeing you on the battlefield
translate: 확실히 전장에서 당신을 본 기억은 없군요.

original: As I said, people are streaming back into town
A lot more people than were at the refugee camp in fact!
translate: 사실 난민 캠프에 있던 사람들보다 훨씬 더 많아요!

original: Isn't that a good thing?
Yes it is
A lot of people did what I did and hid until the terror passed
translate: 많은 사람이 저처럼 공포가 지나갈 때까지 숨어 있었던 거겠죠.

original: But not this many
Let me ask you this
Once a Reaver washes off the paint and blood and shit and puts regular clothing back on, is he still a Reaver?
translate: 약탈자가 물감이랑 피, 똥오줌을 씻어내고 평상복으로 갈아입으면, 그래도 여전히 약탈자일까요?

original: Are you saying Reavers are hiding amongst the regular people?
translate: 일반인들 사이에 약탈자들이 숨어 있다는 말인가요?

original: That’s the thing, isn’t it
The Reavers were regular people
Friends and neighbors
Family even
Most of them lie dead now or have fled Horryn
translate: 그들 대부분은 지금 죽었거나 호린을 떠났습니다.

original: But not all
I think some of them just took off their rags and just went right back to being ordinary people
translate: 제 생각엔 일부는 그냥 누더기를 벗어 던지고 아무렇지 않게 평범한 사람으로 돌아간 것 같아요.

original: Food for thought
What did you need?
How did you say you survived the Reavers?
How are things going in Horryn?
Look lively boys
The savior of Horryn graces our halls!
A tall woman dressed in platemail with a greatsword on her back offers a short bow
translate: 판금 갑옷을 입고 등에 대검을 멘 키 큰 여자가 짧게 목례를 합니다.

original: You’re unsure if she’s being sarcastic or not
How about some gratitude?
I didn't see you out there, fighting!
translate: 밖에서 싸우는 건 못 본 것 같은데!

original: Who are you, loudmouth?
I trust all is well?
We hid under the docks like bloody rats
translate: 우린 빌어먹을 쥐새끼들처럼 부두 밑에 숨어 있었소.

original: For days we hunkered down
Ate limpets and drank salt water
Had no weapons and my men were all exhausted or hurt so we just stayed there
translate: 무기도 없고 부하들은 다들 지치거나 다쳐서 그냥 거기 처박혀 있었소.

original: I suppose surviving doesn’t make you a hero
But here we are and I intend to make the most out of it
column3: 난 이 기회를 최대한 활용할 생각이오.

original: That's all for now I guess
She sighs
And you are?
Name’s Vivian Laruto
I’m the newly minted captain of the city-guard
It would appear the city’s stock of officers is running low indeed
translate: 이 도시의 장교 인력난이 심각한 모양이군.

original: You don't sound too sure of yourself?
Put me on the street to wrestle with thugs and drunkards any day!
translate: 깡패나 주정뱅이들과 뒹굴라고 하면 언제든 하겠어!

original: But this - being captain - is a bit of a change of pace for me
translate: 하지만 이 대장 노릇은... 나한텐 좀 낯선 일이라서.

original: A lot more responsibility as you can probably guess
Especially now with the city in ruins and people streaming back in to pick up the pieces of their lives
translate: 특히 지금처럼 도시는 폐허가 되고 사람들이 삶의 조각을 맞추러 돌아오는 상황에서는 더더욱.

original: I can imagine
That reminds me
With more people streaming in, you’ll find the streets a bit more busy
translate: 사람들이 몰려오면서 거리가 좀 더 분주해질 거요.

original: Even more businesses are open as well now and I recommend you spend some time looking around before you continue on your travels
column3: 여행을 계속하기 전에 좀 둘러보는 걸 추천하오.

original: At least be sure to get a hot meal and a warm bed!
translate: 적어도 따뜻한 밥과 잠자리는 꼭 챙기라고!

original: I'll do that
Noted
#HorrynHierophant
The old man gives you a determined nod before producing a large key from his robes
translate: 노인은 결연하게 고개를 끄덕이더니 로브에서 커다란 열쇠를 꺼냅니다.

original: Inserting it into the main door’s keyhole, he turns it with great effort until something clicks inside
translate: 열쇠를 정문 열쇠구멍에 넣고 끙끙대며 돌리자 안에서 딸깍하는 소리가 납니다.

original: The perfectly balanced doors of the temple swing open soundlessly
translate: 완벽하게 균형 잡힌 사원의 문이 소리 없이 열립니다.

original: The temple’s pristine interior lies in stark contrast to the rest of the town and something about the aura of silence feels off
translate: 사원의 깨끗한 내부는 마을의 다른 곳과 극명한 대조를 이루며
column3: 침묵의 기운이 왠지 모를 위화감을 줍니다.

original: Enter
Do you have anything for sale?
The desecrated temple stands as a sad reminder of the last days’ calamities
translate: 더러워진 사원은 지난날의 재앙을 슬프게 상기시키며 서 있습니다.

original: Standing in front of the main gates with eyes closed in prayer is Hierophant Drahl
translate: 정문 앞에 눈을 감고 기도하는 사람은 대사제 드랄입니다.

original: As you approach you can make out a simple prayer of gratitude to the long line of deceased Emperors that now watch over the Gallian people
column3: 갈리안 사람들을 굽어살피는 역대 선황들에게 감사를 올리는 소박한 기도 소리를 들을 수 있습니다.

original: For all their savagery, it seems the mad-men were not able to breach the gates of the temple
translate: 그들의 야만성에도 불구하고, 미치광이들이 사원의 문을 뚫지는 못한 모양이군요.

original: Drahl’s voice is a mixture of gratitude and disbelief
translate: 드랄의 목소리에는 감사와 불신이 섞여 있습니다.

original: He opens his eyes and looks at you for the first time
translate: 그가 눈을 뜨고 처음으로 당신을 바라봅니다.

original: A small miracle perhaps?
Markus sent me
And he could have found no better hero for what lies ahead!
translate: 앞으로 벌어질 일을 위해 이보다 더 훌륭한 영웅을 찾을 순 없었겠지요!

original: You seek a way into the keep and in their infinite wisdom, I believe our forefathers have provided for us
translate: 성채로 들어가는 길을 찾고 계시군요. 선조들께서는 무한한 지혜로 우리에게 길을 마련해 주셨으리라 믿습니다.

original: As Markus no doubt told you, it is said that a tunnel exists between the keep and the temple
translate: 마르쿠스가 말했겠지만, 성채와 사원 사이에 터널이 있다는 전설이 있습니다.

original: I’ve always considered it a bit of a myth and in any case we’ve never had cause to search for it
translate: 전 항상 그저 신화일 뿐이라고 생각했고

original: Until now that is
Where do you suggest we search?
If the tunnel does indeed exist, I can say with absolute certainty that its entrance lies in the catacombs beneath the temple
translate: 터널이 정말 존재한다면, 그 입구는 사원 아래 지하 묘지에 있을 것이라 확신합니다.

original: In the crypts of the deepest, oldest portions would indeed be where I would place my faith
translate: 가장 깊고 오래된 구역의 묘지에 제 믿음을 걸겠습니다.

original: Then that is where I will search!
Have you found a way into the keep yet?
As I said
Seek out the tombs in the deepest part of the crypt!
translate: 지하 묘지 가장 깊은 곳의 무덤들을 찾아보십시오!

original: Blessed Dead watch over you!
I wish to talk
I do indeed!
It’s not much given the circumstances but I have a selection of potions and concoctions in addition to my healing services
translate: 상황이 이렇다 보니 별것 없지만, 치료 서비스 외에도 물약과 조제약이 좀 있습니다.

original: #HorrynMaija
Ask about Wares
Ask about Something
Something about Wares
Something about Something
More about Something
Finally the last part about Something
#HorrynOuterRetakenChamberlain
Markus is standing by the inn’s fireplace warming his frozen fingers when he sees you
translate: 여관 벽난로 옆에서 얼어붙은 손가락을 녹이던 마르쿠스가 당신을 발견합니다.

original: His face lights up
Hail {PLAYER}!
The savior of Horryn!
His voice breaks half way through the greeting and a coughing fit overcomes him
translate: 인사를 하던 도중 목소리가 갈라지더니 발작적인 기침이 그를 덮칩니다.

original: I think I’ve caught a cold
Though considering what we’ve been through I think I should count myself lucky
translate: 우리가 겪은 일을 생각하면, 이 정도는 운이 좋다고 해야겠지요.

original: Come, join me by the fire while we talk
Thanks to your bravery, we’ve retaken most of Horryn and we now have access to supplies and shelter
translate: 당신의 용기 덕분에 호린의 대부분을 탈환했고, 이제 물자와 거처를 확보할 수 있게 되었습니다.

original: The refugees have been streaming back in from the camp
They’re desperate to learn the fate of loved ones or property that was left behind
translate: 다들 두고 온 재산이나 가족의 생사를 확인하고 싶어 안달이 나 있죠.

original: Understandably so
He lets out a sigh and leans in
translate: 그가 한숨을 내쉬며 몸을 가까이 기울입니다.

original: However, were it not for the fact that I would have a mutiny on my hands, I would have kept them in the camp for now
translate: 하지만 폭동이 일어날까 봐 막지 못했을 뿐, 마음 같아선 당분간 그들을 캠프에 잡아두고 싶었습니다.

original: Things are much more dangerous here in Horryn than they realize
translate: 이곳 호린은 그들이 생각하는 것보다 훨씬 위험하니까요.

original: As far as my men report, the Reavers in the inner city seem to have been slain or driven off
translate: 부하들의 보고에 따르면, 내성의 약탈자들은 죽거나 쫓겨난 것 같습니다.

original: However, the one they call… ‘Father’ still occupies the keep in the south-west corner of the harbor
translate: 하지만 놈들이 '아버지'라고 부르는 자가 여전히 항구 남서쪽 성채를 점거하고 있습니다.

original: He’s barricaded himself inside with the remainder of his pack and that’s not the worst of it
translate: 놈은 남은 무리와 함께 안에 바리케이드를 치고 있는데

original: Reports are coming in that dozens of townsfolk were taken alive by the Reavers and taken to the keep
translate: 수십 명의 마을 사람들이 약탈자들에게 산 채로 잡혀 성채로 끌려갔다는 보고가 들어오고 있어요.

original: I dread even contemplating what they are going through if they are still alive
translate: 그들이 아직 살아 있다면 어떤 일을 겪고 있을지 상상조차 하기 두렵습니다.

original: We must purge Horryn of this remaining ‘infestation’ and, if the Holy Tombs will it, rescue the captives
translate: 우리는 호린에서 이 남은 '해충'들을 박멸하고, 신성한 무덤의 뜻이 있다면 포로들을 구출해야 합니다.

original: A frontal assault is out of the question
The keep is well defended when held by a determined enemy and I have not the man-power to attempt it
translate: 작정한 적이 지키는 성채는 방어가 견고한 데다, 제게는 그럴 만한 병력이 없습니다.

original: There is hope however
Hierophant Drahl, shared an ancient legend with me
translate: 대사제 드랄이 제게 고대 전설을 들려주더군요.

original: When the current temple was constructed, a secret tunnel between it and the keep was reportedly build
translate: 지금의 사원이 지어질 때, 사원과 성채를 잇는 비밀 터널이 건설되었다고 합니다.

original: It served the purpose of allowing the governor in the keep to escape through the temple in case of a siege or, alternatively, it made it possible for the clergy to seek shelter inside the keep if need be
translate: 포위당했을 때 성채의 영주가 사원을 통해 탈출하거나, 반대로 사제들이 필요시 성채로 피신할 수 있도록 만든 것이죠.

original: Ironically, the tunnel was constructed centuries ago and since Horryn has seen very little warfare, it’s never been used
translate: 아이러니하게도 터널은 수세기 전에 지어졌지만 호린에 전쟁이 거의 없었던 탓에 한 번도 사용된 적이 없습니다.

original: In other words, it’s very existence is… less than ensured
translate: 다시 말해, 존재 자체가... 확실치 않다는 거죠.

original: Markus offers a sheepish smile
Nonetheless, at this time the secret tunnel is our best bet
translate: 그렇다 해도, 지금으로선 비밀 터널이 최선의 방책입니다.

original: Hierophant Drahl is waiting for you outside the temple
translate: 대사제 드랄이 사원 밖에서 당신을 기다리고 있습니다.

original: Meet him there and he’ll fill you in
translate: 그곳에서 그를 만나 자세한 설명을 들으십시오.

original: Also, among the refugees returning were Maija and our blacksmith
translate: 아, 그리고 돌아온 난민 중에는 마이야와 대장장이도 있었습니다.

original: Both have opened their stores for you if you need to resupply
translate: 보급품이 필요하면 그들의 가게를 이용하십시오. 둘 다 문을 열었습니다.

original: And lastly {PLAYER}
Please be careful
I fear dangers ahead, far exceed those behind you
translate: 앞으로 닥칠 위험은 지나온 것보다 훨씬 더 클까 두렵소.
