original: It must have been the wind
How do you fit into all of this?
translate: 넌 이 모든 것과 무슨 관련이 있는 거야?

original: Embla leans back and massages her temples
I’m here for you when you need to talk but I agree
translate: 네가 얘기하고 싶을 땐 언제든 들어주겠지만 나도 동의해.

original: Let’s say it’s enough for today
She stands up slowly
I’m going to go lie down
Ship-travel does not agree with me
translate: 배 타는 건 나랑 안 맞아.

original: The ship is alive with nervous energy as the crew scuttles back like pieces of some well-crafted machinery
translate: 선원들이 정교한 기계 부품처럼 분주히 움직이자 배는 긴장된 에너지로 활기를 띤다.

original: Though your journey is bound to be fraught with danger, there is little doubt that being back at sea has done the crew well
translate: 여정은 위험으로 가득 차겠지만, 바다로 돌아온 것이 선원들에게 활력을 불어넣은 것은 분명하다.

original: Not for the monastery itself
But what was said to lie underneath it
translate: 그 아래 묻혀 있다는 것 때문이지.

original: Embla grasps your wrist and leans in while her voice drops ever so slightly
translate: 엠블라가 당신의 손목을 잡고 몸을 기울이며 목소리를 아주 조금 낮춘다.

original: The monks built the Priory to guard something
translate: 수도사들은 무언가를 지키기 위해 수도원을 지었어.

original: A grave
An ancient tomb from the earliest days of the Empire
And if the Priory’s existence was truly lost to history, it means that at some point, the very Empire itself must have aided in the conspiracy of silence
translate: 그리고 만약 수도원의 존재가 정말 역사 속으로 사라졌다면, 어느 시점에는 제국 자체가 침묵의 음모를 도왔다는 뜻이야.

original: But who could be buried there to warrant such extreme measures?
translate: 도대체 누가 묻혀 있길래 그런 극단적인 조치를 취한 거지?

original: I cannot tell you exactly how I know this, but I have not a single shred of doubt
translate: 어떻게 아는지는 정확히 말할 수 없지만, 추호의 의심도 없어.

original: What lies buried under that priory is the corpse of a Magos-Emperor
translate: 수도원 아래 묻혀 있는 건 마법사 황제의 시체야.

original: Not only that, but it must be one of the first and oldest of the line
translate: 그뿐만 아니라, 가장 먼저이자 가장 오래된 혈통 중 하나일 거야.

original: That can't be!
It can and it is!
Not all of the corpses of the first Emperors can be accounted for and interment in the Eternity Vale did not begin until centuries after Gallian’s Ascension
translate: 초대 황제들의 시신이 모두 확인된 건 아니야. 영원의 계곡 안치는 갈리안 승천 후 수세기가 지나서야 시작됐으니까.

original: The Cabal knew it to be true and as do I
translate: 결사는 그게 사실이란 걸 알았고 나도 알아.

original: Their expedition arrived at the island of Gradla a few months ago
translate: 그들의 원정대는 몇 달 전 그라들라 섬에 도착했어.

original: I suspect they breached the tombs underneath the temple a few weeks later
translate: 몇 주 뒤에 사원 아래 무덤을 뚫은 것 같아.

original: Whatever they found there, its reticular reverberations were powerful enough to throw all of the Outer Isles into madness
translate: 거기서 뭘 찾았든 간에, 그 그물망의 반향은 외곽 제도 전체를 광기로 몰아넣을 만큼 강력했어.

original: And now we're sailing into the heart of madness?
translate: 그리고 우린 지금 그 광기의 심장부로 항해하고 있는 거고?

original: Embla smiles weakly
He’s calling out to me
I feel it in every ounce of my being
Unfortunately, I’m not the only one to hear the call
translate: 불행히도 그 부름을 듣는 건 나뿐만이 아니야.

original: Like sharks drawn to blood in the water, ‘other’ things are drawn to it as well
translate: 피 냄새를 맡은 상어처럼, '다른' 것들도 끌려오고 있어.

original: Things from outside
Embla swallows hard and her voice drops to a whisper
The Dragon
It’s awakening and its seven eyes are fixed on the Outer Isle
translate: 깨어나고 있어. 그 일곱 개의 눈이 외곽 제도를 향하고 있어.

original: On the Black Priory!
The nearby lanterns flicker
Crawling tendrils of madness stretch greedily towards the Priory
translate: 광기의 기어가는 덩굴손이 수도원을 향해 탐욕스럽게 뻗어가고 있어.

original: It hungers for the holy corpse and if it reaches it
translate: 성스러운 시체를 갈망하고 있고 만약 닿게 된다면

original: Embla halts, and for a moment struggles to control her breathing
translate: 엠블라는 말을 멈추고 잠시 호흡을 가다듬는다.

original: You know I’m right
You can feel it in your guts
There is no other path out of the Outer Isles except that which leads to the Black Priory and the secrets it holds
translate: 외곽 제도를 벗어날 길은 검은 수도원과 그 비밀로 이어지는 길밖에 없어.

original: Embla slumps and sighs
She looks exhausted and for a moment you see her as the quiet and aloof youngling you once knew
column3: 잠시 당신이 알던 조용하고 냉담했던 어린아이의 모습이 겹쳐 보인다.

original: True to his idiom, Iago swings in on a rope in dramatic fashion, landing elegantly next to you
translate: 이야고는 그답게 밧줄을 타고 극적으로 등장해 당신 옆에 우아하게 착지한다.

original: It is good to feel the wind on our faces, no?
We are about to leave the fjord and from there we may set our course north towards Gradla
translate: 곧 피요르드를 벗어나면 그라들라를 향해 북쪽으로 항로를 잡을 수 있을 거요.

original: Iago scans the horizon ahead
The leviathan no doubt stalks us so we must be careful from now on
translate: 레비아탄이 우릴 쫓고 있는 게 분명하니 이제부터 조심해야 하오.

original: We must keep to coastal waters and pray to the Maidens that our speed will keep us safe
translate: 연안 수역을 따라가며 우리의 속도가 우리를 지켜주길 처녀들에게 기도해야지.

original: Nonetheless, we must take every precaution
translate: 그럼에도 불구하고 모든 예방 조치를 취해야 하오.

original: For now, I have posted double look-outs and I’ll be manning the helm myself
translate: 일단 파수꾼을 두 배로 배치했고 키는 내가 직접 잡을 거요.

original: I trust we are in the best of hands
Indeed you are. {PLAYER}, come see me in my quarters below later if you wish to talk further
translate: 물론이오. {PLAYER}, 더 얘기하고 싶으면 나중에 내 선실로 오시오.

original: Iago bows and leaves
It is out there
I feel it
You turn to see Embla standing behind you
The leviathan
It hungers
I suspect the Deep Ones called it here
Though, who is the master and who is the servant I cannot tell
It is certainly older than them
You owe me answers, Embla
Idra is behind us and I need to know why we’re risking our lives on this fool's errand
column3: 왜 우리가 이 무모한 짓에 목숨을 걸어야 하는지 알아야겠어.

original: I do and now is as good a time as any
Embla takes you below deck and you find a small corner in the hold that is as close to privacy as can be found on the cramped vessel
translate: 엠블라는 당신을 갑판 아래로 데려가 비좁은 배 안에서 그나마 사적인 대화를 나눌 수 있는 선창 구석을 찾는다.

original: She takes a deep breath, as if she is about to plunge into freezing water, and begins talking
translate: 그녀는 마치 얼음물에 뛰어들기라도 하려는 듯 심호흡을 하고 말을 시작한다.

original: Two years ago I was, let’s say, put on the trail of a rumor that an expedition had been mounted to the Outer Isles
translate: 2년 전, 외곽 제도로 원정대가 파견되었다는 소문을 쫓게 됐어.

original: More accurately, to an island north of Idra by the name of Gradla
translate: 정확히는 이드라 북쪽에 있는 그라들라라는 섬으로.

original: It’s a cold and barren place but it is allegedly the location of an ancient monastery referred to as “the Black Priory
translate: 춥고 황량한 곳이지만 '검은 수도원'이라 불리는 고대 수도원이 있다고 알려진 곳이지.

original: The Black Priory?
Though you’ve never heard the name before, it echoes in your mind as if stirring old memories
translate: 처음 들어보는 이름인데도, 마치 오래된 기억을 자극하듯 머릿속에 울린다.

original: The site was built a full age into the past and for millennia it stayed unnoticed and far removed from the affairs of the empire
translate: 그곳은 아주 오래전에 지어졌고 수천 년 동안 눈에 띄지 않은 채 제국의 일에서 멀리 떨어져 있었어.

original: So much so, in fact, that it virtually passed out of the historical record centuries ago
translate: 사실상 수세기 전에 역사 기록에서 사라졌을 정도로.

original: No small feat in an Empire built on the backs of its archivists and record keepers
translate: 기록관과 서기들의 노력으로 세워진 제국에서 결코 작은 일이 아니지.

original: And thus it would have remained if it wasn’t for the boundless ambition of a group of powerful men known as the Cabal
translate: 결사라고 알려진 강력한 집단의 끝없는 야망이 아니었다면 그대로 남았을 거야.

original: I don’t know who it was that whispered in their ear but something convinced them that the Black Priory was not forgotten
translate: 누가 그들의 귀에 속삭였는지는 모르겠지만 무언가가 검은 수도원이 잊힌 게 아니라고 확신하게 만들었어.

original: It was willfully expunged
Ask!
Now is the time
What if it's the corpse of an Emperor?
What more can you tell me of the Cabal?
translate: 결사에 대해 더 말해줄 수 있어?

original: Do you know anything else about the Black Priory?
translate: 검은 수도원에 대해 더 아는 건 없어?

original: Do we stand a chance at rescuing the people who were taken from Horryn?
translate: 호린에서 끌려간 사람들을 구할 가망이 있을까?

original: I suspect they are already dead… or worse
translate: 이미 죽었거나... 더 끔찍한 일을 당했을 거야.

original: You lied to Markus?
Would you rather I was as blunt to him as I am to you?
Better they have a sliver of hope
translate: 희망의 끈이라도 잡고 있는 게 나아.

original: There are still trials ahead for Markus and the Horrynites and it would do them no good to face it with a broken heart
translate: 마커스와 호린 사람들에게는 아직 시련이 남아있고
column3: 상처받은 마음으로 맞서는 건 도움이 안 되니까.

original: # Chapter_4_Firgol
#FirgolBarkeepScene
He rubs his hands together in glee!
Oh yes!
It’s an old tradition that goes back as far as anyone can remember where the Baron of Firgol invites all us common folk up to the manor to feast
translate: 퍼골의 남작님이 우리 평민들을 저택으로 초대해 잔치를 벌이는 건 아주 오래된 전통이죠.

original: If you go up there and ask around a bit I’m sure you could come too!
translate: 올라가서 좀 물어보시면 당신도 올 수 있을 겁니다!

original: If you offer to lend a hand that is
Manor lies north-west of the village - just across the river
translate: 저택은 마을 북서쪽 강 건너에 있습니다.

original: And you said something about cider?
Ari, the brewer, makes the best cider this side of the Sea-Gates!
translate: 양조업자 아리는 바다 관문 이쪽에서 최고의 사과주를 만들죠!

original: His brewery is up behind the general store
Though he might be a bit on the busy side with the Carnivale and all
Carnivale?
It’s been quiet as ever and that’s the way we like it here
translate: 여느 때처럼 조용하고 우린 그게 좋습니다.

original: Well unless you count the Carnivale preparations of course
So no unrest here?
Well we did have Mary’s goat run off and knock over that pail of milk last week if that’s what you mean?
translate: 지난주에 메리의 염소가 도망치다 우유통을 엎지른 걸 말씀하시는 거라면?

original: But that was mostly funny, mind you
A jovial, red-faced man greets you enthusiastically
translate: 쾌활하고 얼굴 붉은 남자가 열정적으로 당신을 맞이한다.

original: Hello-hello and welcome to Firgol!
Bernard’s my name!
I’ve not seen your face around here!
Come for the Carnivale?
Or perhaps the cider?
I just had some questions
Cider?
Coming right up!
So, how are things in Firgol?
Let's see what's on the menu!
Have you heard about something called the 'Tower of Ash'?
What can I get you?
Lets talk a bit!
I have indeed!
It lies north of here, on the other side of the bay
Strange old hermit lives there, they say
He keeps away from us so we keep away from him
translate: 그가 우리를 멀리하니 우리도 그를 멀리하죠.

original: #FirgolBarmaidScene
#FirgolBaronesseScene
Kat lets out a small squeal of joy
I knew you couldn’t turn down a chance for some fun!
translate: 네가 재미 볼 기회를 거절할 리 없지!

original: The Dead knows we could all do with something to take our mind off all the bleakness!
translate: 이 암울함을 잊을 무언가가 우리 모두에게 필요하다는 건 망자들도 알 거야!

original: Even Roland, it seems, can’t help but smile at the prospect of a night of some light debauchery
translate: 롤랜드조차 가벼운 방탕의 밤을 기대하며 미소 짓지 않을 수 없는 듯하다.

original: The Baroness exclaims contently
With you to aid us, we shall be done in no time!
Now, pay attention!
Embla offers a tired smile in return
We have much work to do and Gradla beckons me
translate: 우린 할 일이 많고 그라들라가 날 부르고 있어.

original: But perhaps
Perhaps a small bit of respite would do us good before we press on?
translate: 나아가기 전에 잠시 쉬는 것도 좋지 않을까?

original: Just so long as we don’t tarry for too long
Roland?
We'll help!
Roland sighs
So much death and dying
I’m tired
If we are to venture into the jaws of madness, I’d like to be able to get shit drunk at least once before we go
translate: 광기의 아가리로 들어가야 한다면, 가기 전에 적어도 한 번은 곤드레만드레 취해보고 싶군.

original: Oh my
I dare say things are as they have always been, no?
Are you sure this isn’t just the grumblings of a few malcontents?
It didn't seem like 'grumblings' when Horryn was razed
You m'lady, are off your rockers
Well, if things are indeed a bit on the busier side as of late, I’d venture that there’s nothing people need more than a party to take their minds off the drab monotony of everyday-life
translate: 뭐, 최근에 좀 바빠진 게 사실이라면, 일상의 지루함에서 벗어나게 해줄 파티만큼 사람들에게 필요한 것도 없지 않을까요?

original: Wouldn’t you say?
Perhaps you're right
How's the planning going?
So what you’re saying is you and your friends would eat and feast while the peasantry suffers?
translate: 그러니까 백성들이 고통받는 동안 당신과 친구들은 먹고 마시겠다는 겁니까?

original: You must hurry up my dear!
The Carnivale is contingent upon your diligence
Do think of the children!
Your task is simple
Our Carnivale is dependent on the work of some of our beloved villagers
translate: 우리 축제는 사랑하는 마을 사람들의 수고에 달려 있거든요.

original: They may have clever hands but they are a bit on the lazy side
She chuckles
And you want me to offer them my aid?
Talk to Ari the brewer, Camilla the weaver and Klara the cook
translate: 양조업자 아리, 직조공 카밀라, 요리사 클라라와 얘기해 보세요.

original: Offer them your help so we might expedite their tasks
translate: 그들을 도와서 일을 빨리 끝내도록 하세요.

original: Give them my warmest greetings and remind them that the Carnivale is nigh
translate: 제 따뜻한 안부를 전하고 축제가 가까웠음을 상기시켜 주세요.

original: Oh, and do try not to mention anything about the surprise
translate: 아, 그리고 깜짝 선물에 대해서는 절대 말하지 마세요.

original: I positively can’t wait to see their faces!
Now my lovely, be on your way!
We shall await your return
An elderly noble woman and a robed, portly man stand in front of the villa’s gate, discussing enthusiastically
translate: 나이 든 귀족 부인과 로브를 입은 뚱뚱한 남자가 저택 정문 앞에서 열정적으로 토론하고 있다.

original: And we shall flank the road with torches for the procession!
And as they enter the grounds, my hand-maidens shall place wreaths upon their heads!
translate: 그리고 그들이 들어오면 내 시녀들이 머리에 화환을 씌워줄 거야!

original: And they shall have their libations as soon as they enter!
Not a throat shall be dry for the Carnivale!
translate: 축제 때는 누구도 목마르면 안 되니까!

original: The man vigorously nods and takes notes
translate: 남자는 격렬하게 고개를 끄덕이며 받아 적는다.

original: Yes m’lady!
Splendid idea!
Well, well Henry, what have we here?
More revelers come to partake in our great Carnivale!
translate: 우리 위대한 축제에 참여하러 온 구경꾼들이 더 왔네!

original: Grrrreetings my adorable vagabonds!
I bid thee welcome to the estates of the Baron of Firgol
translate: 퍼골 남작의 영지에 온 것을 환영하네.

original: I am his wife, the Baroness Griselda, and this sweet-cake of a man is our majordomo
translate: 난 그의 아내 그리젤다 남작부인이고, 이 달콤한 케이크 같은 남자는 우리 집사야.

original: Henry Flagstone
Henry offers several enthusiastic bows
translate: 헨리는 여러 번 열광적으로 허리를 굽혀 인사한다.

original: Do you mean to say you are not here for the Carnivale?
translate: 축제 때문에 온 게 아니란 말이야?

original: Oh what delicious irony!
The Baroness offers a snorting laugh that seems oddly out of place for a lady of her station
translate: 남작부인은 지위에 어울리지 않게 콧방귀를 뀌며 웃는다.

original: You see, my dear husband and I have taken it upon ourselves to arrange a magnificent feast
translate: 내 사랑하는 남편과 내가 성대한 잔치를 준비했거든.

original: A Carnivale where one might eat and drink and say farewell to the sufferings of the flesh!
translate: 먹고 마시며 육체의 고통과 작별하는 축제지!

original: There is even an added surprise this year that is sure to elevate the spirits and enlighten the minds of all those who are fortunate enough to attend!
translate: 올해는 참석하는 행운아들의 기분을 고조시키고 마음을 깨우칠 깜짝 선물도 준비되어 있어!

original: The Outer Isles are thrown into chaos and you throw a party?
translate: 외곽 제도가 혼란에 빠졌는데 파티를 연다고요?

original: How delightful!
Tell me more!
Typical nobles
Eating and feasting while the peasantry starve!
translate: 백성들은 굶주리는데 먹고 마시며 잔치를 벌이다니!

original: Surprise?
The Baroness puts on a face of exaggerated sadness
My dear traveler
There is a patina of world-weariness over you
A certain odor one might even say
Won’t you please reconsider?
I'll help!
Kat steps between you and the baroness
Are you not hearing this?
Food!
Drink!
Entertainment!
We’ve been up to our knees in blood and shit and filth and, by the Magis’ balls, who knows when we’ll have a chance like this again!
translate: 피와 똥, 오물을 무릎까지 뒤집어썼는데, 마법사의 불알을 걸고, 이런 기회가 언제 또 오겠어!

original: Kat grabs you by the shoulders and leans in
translate: 캣이 당신의 어깨를 잡고 몸을 기울인다.

original: Make
This
Happen
My dear, is your head made of marzipan?
An adorable little marzipan piglet with a marzipan head made from eggs and almonds and powdered sugar?
column4: 설탕 가루로 만든 마지판 머리를 가진 귀여운 아기 돼지처럼?

original: I can’t be bothered to repeat myself - surely you keep a journal?
translate: 두 번 말하긴 귀찮은데... 일지는 쓰고 있겠지?

original: Greetings little one
Have you come to call upon me?
Are your tasks done?
Not yet but I'm working on it!
The woman looks taken aback
My dear, you misunderstand!
My husband adores the peasantry of this island!
translate: 내 남편은 이 섬의 백성들을 아껴요!

original: Salt of the earth he calls them
This feast is for the common folk of Firgol and they're invited one and all
translate: 이 잔치는 퍼골의 평범한 사람들을 위한 것이고 모두 초대받았어요.

original: It’s a tradition that goes back for generations
Once a year the Baron of Firgol would always invite the commoners for a night of feasting and drinking!
translate: 일 년에 한 번 퍼골 남작은 항상 평민들을 초대해 밤새 먹고 마시게 했어요!

original: I dare say, this year will be a feast to remember - with the surprise and all
translate: 올해는 깜짝 선물도 있으니 정말 기억에 남는 잔치가 될 거예요.

original: A night of feast and drink sounds just about right
translate: 밤새 먹고 마시는 잔치라니 딱 좋네.

original: Kat mutters under her breath
So how is the planning going?
A surprise indeed!
Oh, but I cannot help myself but give you a little morsel - Do promise not to tell anyone!
translate: 오, 살짝만 알려줄게. 아무한테도 말하지 않기로 약속해!

original: The lady leans in conspiratorially
My dear husband is putting on a play for the Carnivale!
translate: 내 사랑하는 남편이 축제 때 연극을 할 거야!

original: He himself will play the lead role
Oh he has such wonders to show us
I’ve never seen him so enthusiastic about anything before
translate: 그가 이렇게 열정적인 건 처음 봐.

original: What kind of play?
It will be a grand comedy in three acts!
Or… a drama
Or… well I can’t exactly remember but it will be spectacular in any case!
translate: 아니면... 뭐 정확히 기억은 안 나지만 어쨌든 굉장할 거야!

original: And how is the planning going?
Well, as it turns out organizing the Carnivale is quite time-consuming
translate: 음, 알고 보니 축제 준비가 꽤 시간이 걸리더군요.

original: In fact I’m a bit overwhelmed with the amount of preparation remaining
translate: 사실 남은 준비가 너무 많아서 좀 벅차요.

original: As the Baroness dramatically wafts herself with a fan you can’t help but notice that her majordomo rolls his eyes
translate: 남작부인이 과장되게 부채질을 하는 동안 집사가 눈을 굴리는 게 보인다.

original: But perhaps the fates have provided for us after all, Henry?
translate: 하지만 운명이 우릴 도왔나 봐요, 헨리?

original: Oh, isn’t it obvious?
You seem like a most resolute ragamuffin and I’m sure that if you were to lend a hand, the Carnivale would be under way in no time!
translate: 당신은 아주 결단력 있는 부랑자 같아 보이는데, 도와준다면 축제 준비는 금방 끝날 거예요!

original: And you would of course join us in the festivities
The food and drink will be marvelous!
Isn’t that just a marvelous idea Henry?
She excitedly claps her hands and Henry agrees so strongly that his jowls flap
translate: 그녀가 흥분해서 손뼉을 치자 헨리는 턱살이 출렁거릴 정도로 격하게 동의한다.

original: I really don't know if I have time for this
What do you say?
#FirgolBeeHive
This hive is dead and abandoned
Neither bees, nor honeycombs can be found within
You realize the best way of avoiding the little fiends is to dive into the nearby lake
translate: 이 작은 악마들을 피하는 가장 좋은 방법은 근처 호수로 뛰어드는 것임을 깨닫는다.

original: Clever thinking!
Your strategic retreat turns into a route as you are hunted down by the swarm in enraged insectoids
translate: 전략적 후퇴는 경로가 되어 격분한 곤충 떼에게 쫓기게 된다.

original: Though you eventually outrun them, you are left stung and woozy from the sheer amount of poison pumped into your system
translate: 결국 따돌리지만, 엄청난 양의 독이 몸에 퍼져 쏘인 채로 어지러움을 느낀다.

original: You are, however, still alive
You carefully lift the top off the hive and peer inside
translate: 벌통 뚜껑을 조심스럽게 열고 안을 들여다본다.

original: Immediately a swarm of angry bees fly out and within seconds you feel the burn of several stings!
translate: 즉시 성난 벌 떼가 날아오르고 순식간에 여러 군데 쏘여 화끈거림을 느낀다!

original: They DO sting!
I hate bees!
Iben slaps his neck and brushes his face furiously
translate: 이벤은 목을 때리고 얼굴을 거칠게 쓸어내린다.

original: Reach inside for the honey
Use smoke on the bees
Reconsider and leave
Reaching deep into the hive, you pull out a gorgeous honeycomb dripping with rich golden-yellow honey
translate: 벌통 깊숙이 손을 뻗어 진한 황금빛 꿀이 뚝뚝 떨어지는 멋진 벌집을 꺼낸다.

original: As the smoke effect on the bees begins to wear off, you find it best to make off with your prize
translate: 연기 효과가 떨어지기 시작하자 전리품을 챙겨 달아나는 게 최선임을 깨닫는다.

original: The hive begins to aggressively buzz as you approach
translate: 다가가자 벌통에서 공격적인 윙윙거리는 소리가 나기 시작한다.

original: The honey inside suddenly seems much less attractive
translate: 안에 있는 꿀이 갑자기 훨씬 덜 매력적으로 보인다.

original: Well, the cook did say that Firgol bees do not sting, yes?
translate: 글쎄, 요리사가 퍼골 벌은 쏘지 않는다고 했지?

original: Iben sounds uncharacteristically hesitant
Then again, the cook did say that the bees of Firgol do not sting
translate: 하지만 요리사는 퍼골 벌이 쏘지 않는다고 했다.

original: Try to harvest the honey
Gingerly, you attempt to reach in
Suddenly something large shifts in the depths of the hive and swarms of large soldier-bees swarm out to attack
translate: 갑자기 벌통 깊은 곳에서 거대한 무언가가 움직이더니 거대 병정벌 떼가 공격해 온다.

original: Each sting feels like a red-hot needle and you can’t help but panic!
translate: 쏘일 때마다 벌겋게 달아오른 바늘에 찔리는 것 같아 공포에 휩싸인다!

original: Where can you run to get away from the buzzing horde?
Flee towards the village
Flee towards the lake
Play dead
Playing dead is a terrible way of escaping hundreds of murderous insectoids
translate: 죽은 척하는 건 수백 마리의 살인 곤충을 피하는 끔찍한 방법이다.

original: Your fate is death by acute anaphylactic shock
Bursting out from the pile of smoke-stricken bees, comes a single gargantuan individual
translate: 연기에 질식한 벌 더미를 뚫고 거대한 개체 하나가 튀어 나온다.

original: A large swollen body clad in vibrant yellow chitin, iridescent wings and a face that looks unlike any insect you’ve ever seen before
translate: 선명한 노란색 키틴질로 덮인 거대하게 부풀어 오른 몸, 무지개 빛 날개, 그리고 본 적 없는 곤충의 얼굴.

original: This must be a queen!
The creature lets out a tiny albeit terrifying screech and snaps at your fingers with its jaws
translate: 생물은 작지만 끔찍한 비명을 지르며 턱으로 손가락을 문다.

original: Ignore queen and get the honey
Squash the queen
Swiftly you grasp the creature
It easily fills up your entire hand and squirms as you tighten your grip around its thorax
translate: 한 손에 꽉 차는 크기다. 흉부를 꽉 쥐자 꿈틀거린다.

original: Snapping jaws first hiss and then emit a kind of pained wail as the chitin begins to give way
translate: 딱딱거리는 턱이 쉬익 소리를 내더니 키틴질이 부서지기 시작하자 고통스러운 비명을 지른다.

original: Crushing the creature takes a surprising amount of strength until the exoskeleton collapses with a wet squelch
translate: 생명체를 으깨는 데는 놀라울 정도로 큰 힘이 들어갔고, 마침내 젖은 소리를 내며 외골격이 무너져 내립니다.

original: Gore splatters your face
Take the honey
You approach the hive and a slight buzzing rises from within
translate: 벌통에 다가가자 안에서 미세한 웅웅거림이 들려옵니다.

original: Even with your limited knowledge of bees however, you get a strong impression that there is something wrong with the hive
translate: 벌에 대한 지식이 별로 없음에도 불구하고
column3: 벌통에 뭔가 문제가 있다는 강한 느낌을 받습니다.

original: Examine the hive
Slowly lifting off the top of the hive, you’re able to look inside
translate: 천천히 벌통 뚜껑을 들어 올리자 내부가 보입니다.

original: There are still plenty of bees left, however they seem slow and lethargic
Furthermore, there is no honey in sight
Examine the bees
Looking around more closely you find several dead bees
translate: 자세히 살펴보니 죽은 벌들이 몇 마리 보입니다.

original: Some clearly belong to the hive in question
translate: 개중에는 분명 이 벌통 출신인 벌들도 있지만

original: A handful of others however, look foreign
Larger and with a vibrant yellow color
translate: 더 크고 선명한 노란색을 띠고 있습니다.

original: If you were to guess, you’d say these bees have been fighting bees from another hive
translate: 짐작건대 다른 벌통의 벌들과 싸운 것 같습니다.

original: Who are you kidding?
You know nothing about bees
Smartly using the bee smoker, you fill the hive with calming fumes
translate: 훈연기를 능숙하게 사용하여 벌통을 진정시키는 연기로 채웁니다.

original: Before you know it, the buzzing has subsided and you feel confident enough to reach for the honeycombs
column3: 벌집에 손을 뻗을 수 있을 만큼 자신감이 생깁니다.

original: Reach in
#FirgolBeeKeeperScene
Please don’t hurt me!
I’ll give you the bloody smoker
Just promise you won’t tell anyone
Pert sobs
Driina shakes her head
That was uncalled for
Don’t you think this poor fool’s had enough misery?
translate: 이 불쌍한 바보는 이미 충분히 고통받은 것 같지 않나요?

original: Hand it over
No reason to worry about that!
Firgol bees don’t sting
Now, please, just leave me alone!
translate: 그러니 제발, 날 좀 내버려 두세요!

original: Listen, there's something wrong with your bees
They seem to be killing each other
If you tell me how I can harvest the honey safely, I'll see if I can't help save your hives as well
translate: 어떻게 하면 안전하게 꿀을 채취할 수 있는지 알려주면

original: Well, I’m here helping the Baroness organizing the Carnivale and I can only do that if you tell me how to get to the honey
translate: 난 남작부인을 도와 카니발 준비를 하고 있어. 꿀을 얻는 법을 알려줘야 내가 일을 할 수 있다고.

original: You better help me or I'll be forced to make you!
translate: 도와주는 게 좋을 거야. 아니면 억지로라도 하게 만들 테니까!

original: I get going then
The man’s lips tremble and his eyes water up
translate: 남자의 입술이 떨리고 눈에 눈물이 고입니다.

original: I ‘spose you’re right
But you have to promise not to tell anyone I helped you!
translate: 하지만 내가 도와줬다는 건 아무한테도 말하지 않겠다고 약속해요!

original: I promise
Firgol bees do not sting!
And that's the end of it!
Please just leave me alone!
You better help me or I'll be forced to hurt you!
Pert looks around again
Oh, I shouldn’t be doing this
He sets off at a run and before you know it, he’s gone
translate: 그는 달리기 시작하더니 어느새 사라져 버립니다.

original: Yes m'lord!
I can assure you, Firgol honey is the best in the land
translate: 장담하건대 피르골 꿀은 이 땅에서 최고입니다.

original: Please, go right ahead - the hives are over there
Let me know if you need any help!
Yes m'lady!
But how do I avoid getting stung?
translate: 하지만 벌에 쏘이지 않으려면 어떻게 해야 하죠?

original: I better be on my way then!
Before you stand one of the ugliest men you have ever seen
translate: 당신 앞에는 지금껏 본 중 가장 추한 남자가 서 있습니다.

original: Already cursed at birth, the man’s appearance is not improved by the numerous bee stings that mar his face
column3: 얼굴을 뒤덮은 수많은 벌 쏘인 자국들이 그를 더욱 흉하게 만들고 있습니다.

original: His face contorts into something passing for a smile and he croaks
translate: 그의 얼굴이 미소 비슷한 것으로 일그러지며 걸걸한 목소리를 냅니다.

original: Greetings m'lord
How can I serve?
Greetings m'lady
I'm Pert m'lord
I’m the bee-keeper here in Firgol
I tend the Baron’s bees
He gestures towards the nearby hives and you can’t help but notice that, like his face, his hands are also swollen with bee stings
column3: 당신은 그의 얼굴처럼 손도 벌에 쏘여 퉁퉁 부어 있다는 것을 알아챕니다.

original: I'm Pert m'lady
Tough job?
Hello m'lord
Hello m'lady
I need to get honey!
You need to tell me how I'm going to avoid getting stung
The man wrings his swollen hands while he thinks
translate: 남자는 생각에 잠겨 부은 손을 비 듭니다.

original: If I give you the smoker, you might be able to… help my bees?
translate: 제가 훈연기를 드리면... 제 벌들을 도와주실 수 있을까요?

original: Well, I suppose I can give you the smoker if you promise not to tell anyone!
translate: 아무한테도 말하지 않겠다고 약속하시면 훈연기를 드릴 수 있을 것 같아요!

original: The man looks around nervously and hands you a small tin can with a handle and a spout
translate: 남자는 초조하게 주위를 둘러보더니 손잡이와 주둥이가 달린 작은 깡통을 건네줍니다.

original: This is a bee smoker, see
You just mix kindling with some wet grass and light a fire
translate: 불쏘시개랑 젖은 풀을 섞어서 불을 붙이면 돼요.

original: Not too hot mind you!
You only want a bit of smoke
Just open the hive carefully and let the smoke settle inside and the bees will go all drowsy
translate: 벌통을 조심스럽게 열고 연기를 안에 채우면 벌들이 졸음에 빠질 거예요.

original: But please
Don’t tell anyone I use the bee smoker
translate: 제가 훈연기를 쓴다는 건 아무한테도 말하지 마세요.

original: Firgol bees don’t sting!
Oh no!
Not in the slightest m'lord
Firgol bees don’t sting you see!
They’re as docile as cows
And that’s good because the Baroness wouldn’t want it any other way
Not in the slightest m'lady
They don't look docile!
Point to his stings
In fact I'm helping out the Baroness
I've come ot fetch honey!
The man half averts his face in shame as you point out his stings
translate: 당신이 쏘인 자국을 지적하자 남자는 부끄러운 듯 얼굴을 반쯤 돌립니다.

original: It’s as the Baroness says
And if they do then it’s my own bloody fault!
translate: 만약 쏘인다면 그건 제 잘못인 거죠!

original: That’s all there’s to be said about that
Well, I'm here for some honey
Well, I best be going
#FirgolBrewerScene
Of course!
My lad sells it by the bottle in front of the general store
translate: 제 아들놈이 잡화점 앞에서 병으로 팔고 있습니다.

original: Oh, and Bernard might even have a few bottles left over at the inn
column3: 여관의 버나드에게도 몇 병 남아있을지도 모르겠군요.

original: The man can’t help but hide his disappointment
Oh… well, suit yourself I suppose
What can I do for you then?
A pot-bellied man hums to himself as he pours a clear, golden liquid from glass to glass, swirling it around and then tasting it
translate: 배불뚝이 남자가 맑은 황금색 액체를 이 잔 저 잔 옮겨 따르며 콧노래를 부릅니다. 잔을 흔들어 향을 맡고 맛을 봅니다.

original: He thoughtfully sloshes it around in his mouth a few times and then spits it into a bucket
translate: 그는 입안에서 술을 몇 번 굴리며 맛을 음미하더니 양동이에 뱉어냅니다.

original: Taste funny?
Oh my no!
This cider is my best batch yet
He looks at you with a roguish smile
translate: 그가 장난기 어린 미소로 당신을 바라봅니다.

original: Only problem is my wife gets a bit on the sour side if I come home red-cheeked after tasting the wares all day
translate: 유일한 문제는 하루 종일 술맛을 보느라 얼굴이 빨개져서 집에 가면 아내가 좀 까칠해진다는 거죠.

original: The man chuckles and offers his hand
I’m Ari, I run the local brewery
translate: 전 아리입니다. 이 지역 양조장을 운영하죠.

original: I’d wager you’ll find no finer cider in all of the Northern Empire - And certainly not in the outer isles
translate: 북부 제국 전체를 통틀어도 이보다 더 좋은 사과주는 없을 겁니다. 외곽 군도에선 더더욱 없고요.

original: Here!
Have a try!
Ari offers a glass of the golden cider
translate: 아리가 황금빛 사과주 한 잔을 권합니다.

original: Accept
No thank you
Did she now?
Aye, she’s ordered the beverages for the Carnivale for me
He leans in and lowers his voice
By the barrel load
Let me tell you, it’ll be a night to remember
Good for business as well
She’s paid me out the nose
So what's the hold-up?
Ah I don’t really have a good excuse
Barrels are lined up and almost ready to go
translate: 통들은 줄지어 서 있고 갈 준비도 거의 다 됐는데.

original: But there’s just been so much to do around the farm and I sort of… forgot
translate: 농장 일도 너무 많고 해서... 깜빡했지 뭡니까.

original: A hint of despair flashes across his jovial face
translate: 그의 유쾌한 얼굴에 절망의 빛이 스칩니다.

original: Do you ever wonder ‘what’s the use'?
translate: 이게 다 무슨 소용인가 싶을 때가 있지 않나요?

original: Like, it’s all dust on black winds in the end?
translate: 결국 검은 바람에 날리는 먼지 같은 거 아닐까 하고요?

original: Anything I can do to help you?
I suppose there is actually!
The cloud of despair seems to lift and at once the man’s light-hearted demeanor returns
translate: 절망의 구름이 걷히는 듯하더니 금세 남자의 쾌활한 태도가 돌아옵니다.

original: Moles have been tearing up my orchard real bad
translate: 두더지들이 과수원을 아주 엉망으로 만들어놓고 있거든요.

original: They gnaw at the roots and wreak havoc on the trees
They’ve stood for hundreds of years you know and losing even a single one is a disaster
translate: 수백 년을 버텨온 나무들인데 한 그루라도 잃으면 재앙이나 다름없죠.

original: You wnat me to go mole hunting?
You offered to help didn’t you?
If you could deal with the mole problem, I could devote my full attention to getting the cider delivered at the Baron’s villa!
column3: 남작님 별장에 사과주 배달하는 일에 전념할 수 있을 겁니다!

original: My orchard is just north of here
I’ve counted at least three burrows but they can be hard to spot so make sure you search properly
translate: 굴이 적어도 세 개는 있는 것 같던데
column3: 찾기 힘들 수도 있으니 꼼꼼히 찾아보세요.

original: When you find them, dig those little bastards out and return to me once you’re done!
translate: 찾으면 그 작은 녀석들을 파내 버리시고

original: Ari hands you a shovel and slaps you on the back
translate: 아리가 삽을 건네주며 당신의 등을 두드립니다.

original: You can’t help but feel that a bit of spring has returned to his step
translate: 그의 발걸음이 한결 가벼워진 것 같습니다.

original: By Strange Moons, you did it!
I can’t tell you how good it is to see my trees all nice and secure
translate: 나무들이 무사한 걸 보니 얼마나 좋은지 모릅니다.

original: I’ve not much to give you but I think I can spare some coins and a few bottles of cider that ‘fell off the wagon’
translate: 드릴 건 별로 없지만 약간의 동전과 '마차에서 떨어진' 사과주 몇 병 정도는 드릴 수 있겠네요.

original: Ari winks at you and throws you a small sack of coins
translate: 아리가 윙크하며 작은 동전 주머니를 던져줍니다.

original: Barrels of cider are loaded on carts and you watch as the brewer and his helpers set off for the Barno’s villa
column3: 양조장 주인과 조수들이 남작의 별장으로 출발하는 모습을 지켜봅니다.

original: No doubt, the drink will flow soon enough!
What did you need me to do?
I've cleared out the moles!
The Baroness told me to ask if you needed help!
About your task
Can I buy some of your cider?
What's your secret to making the cider so good?
I'll see you later
As I’ve said
There are at least three mole-burrows there if you search properly
translate: 잘 찾아보시면 두더지 굴이 적어도 세 개는 있을 겁니다.

original: When you find them, use a shovel and dig those little bastards out
translate: 찾으면 삽으로 그 녀석들을 파내 버리세요.

original: Return to me once you’re done!
Wel - 'hic' - come back!
The beverage is cool, sweet and sparkly - truly is some of the best cider you’ve ever had
translate: 음료는 시원하고 달콤하며 탄산이 톡 쏘는 게
column3: 정말이지 지금까지 마셔본 중 최고의 사과주입니다.

original: Good, yes?
Ari nods in eager anticipation as you drink
translate: 당신이 마시는 모습을 보며 아리가 기대에 차서 고개를 끄덕입니다.

original: Let me, let me, let me!
Kat greedily grabs the cup from you, drinks deeply and then belches in a way that is decidedly unladylike
translate: 캣이 탐욕스럽게 잔을 뺏어 벌컥벌컥 들이키더니

original: Magi’s ball
Is there any more?
Her eyes are wide with excitement
It's indeed excellent
Do you mind if I ask some questions?
I remember one of them Imperial surveyors called it ‘micro climate’, At least that’s what I think he said!
translate: 제국 측량사 중 한 명이 이걸 '미기후'라고 불렀던 게 기억나요. 적어도 그렇게 말했던 것 같네요!

original: Means that the area around Firgol is real mild and soft on the fruit trees compared to the rest of the outer isles
translate: 피르골 주변 지역이 외곽 군도의 다른 곳에 비해 과일 나무에 아주 온화하고 부드럽다는 뜻이죠.

original: And then, since we’re so far north everything takes a long time to grow and ripen and that’s what causes the fruits to be so sweet
translate: 게다가 우린 북쪽에 있어서 모든 게 자라고 익는 데 시간이 오래 걸리는데
column3: 그게 과일을 그렇게 달콤하게 만드는 겁니다.

original: He gives you an impish smile
There’s that and then there’s the family secrets of course
My family has been doing this for a long, long time
translate: 우리 가문은 아주 오랫동안 이 일을 해왔거든요.

original: #FirgolCarnivale1
All your work is done and now you’ve come to feast!
translate: 할 일을 다 마치고 이제 잔치를 즐기러 오셨군요!

original: My husband is ever so grateful for all you have done for him and I dare say this will be a night to remember
translate: 제 남편은 당신이 해준 모든 일에 깊이 감사하고 있어요. 감히 말하건대
column3: 오늘 밤은 잊지 못할 밤이 될 거예요.

original: My dear, Carnivale is about to begin
Behold!
Coming up the road is a procession of villagers
translate: 길을 따라 마을 사람들의 행렬이 올라옵니다.

original: Clad in their finest and with beautiful wreaths of flowers on their head, the simple folk of Firgol gasp in awe as they pass under the flowered arch of the manor’s gate
translate: 가장 좋은 옷을 입고 머리에 아름다운 화환을 쓴 피르골의 순박한 사람들은 저택 정문의 꽃 아치를 지나며 감탄사를 내뱉습니다.

original: Tastes like no other, sights like no other, flesh like no other
What wonder we shall show you tonight
The Baroness has moved much closer and you feel her breath on your ear
translate: 남작부인이 훨씬 더 가까이 다가와 귓가에 숨결이 느껴집니다.

original: Then, raising her voice again, she exclaims in an official tone
translate: 그러다 다시 목소리를 높여 공식적인 어조로 외칩니다.

original: I declare that Carnivale has begun!
Eat, drink and revel!
I shall retire momentarily and make my final preparations
translate: 전 잠시 물러가 마지막 준비를 하겠습니다.

original: As a lady must
The Baroness and her handmaidens retire into the manor
You are left, head spinning, as the scents of fine food and sounds of merriment begin to fill the air
translate: 맛있는 음식 냄새와 즐거운 소리가 공기를 채우기 시작하자

original: The pain and toil of the last weeks begins to fade
translate: 지난 몇 주간의 고통과 노고가 희미해지기 시작합니다.

original: All that is left is Carnivale
Begin
#FirgolCarnivalePlay
The simple folk of Firgol find their place in silence
translate: 피르골의 순박한 사람들은 조용히 자리를 잡습니다.

original: A sense of reverence appears to have fallen over them
You scan the rows for an empty seat
Sit with Roland
Sit with Kat
Sit with Embla
Sit with Driina
Sit with Iben
Sit alone
Larger and with a vibrant yellow colour
translate: 더 크고 선명한 노란색을 띠고 있습니다.

original: Grrrrrreetings!
His voice is high-pitched and overly dramatic, yet oddly captivating
translate: 그의 목소리는 높고 지나치게 과장되어 있지만

original: On foreign shores we set our play,
Where setting suns casts shadows long,
translate: 지는 해가 긴 그림자를 드리우는 곳

original: O’er streets no longer touched by day,
And halls forgotten but in song
Strange is the night where black stars rise,
With flapping of the tattered wings,
And strange moons circle through the skies,
Chased by black and faceless things
An edifice where kings once sat
Where maidens pale did once cavort,
The charnel house that time begat,
A stranger has arrived at court
The strange little man bows deeply and walks off stage
translate: 기이한 작은 남자는 깊이 허리를 숙여 인사하고 무대 뒤로 사라집니다.

original: For a long moment all is quiet, yet the crowd sits frozen with anticipation
column3: 관중들은 기대감에 얼어붙은 채 앉아 있습니다.

original: Then a sharp gasp from one of the onlookers
translate: 그때 관중석에서 날카로운 탄성이 터져 나옵니다.

original: You crane your neck trying to get a better view but there is nothing there!
translate: 더 잘 보려고 목을 빼보지만 그곳엔 아무것도 없습니다!

original: Or…?
You see it
A robed and gloved hand dramatically extends onto the stage from between two of the backdrop panels
translate: 배경 패널 사이로 로브와 장갑을 낀 손이 극적으로 무대 위로 뻗어 나옵니다.

original: Slowly he emerges; a tall figure, gliding more than walking with elegant, almost dance-like motions
translate: 천천히 그가 모습을 드러냅니다. 걷는다기보다 미끄러지듯
column3: 우아하고 춤추는 듯한 동작의 키 큰 인물입니다.

original: The Baron!
It must be!
whispers one of the audience
Look!
whispers another
He wears a mask!
The figure glides onto the center of the stage
Like some strange pantomime, he begins to wordlessly orate with dramatic, exaggerated gestures
column3: 그는 극적이고 과장된 몸짓으로 말 없는 웅변을 시작합니다.

original: Or was it wordless?
Weren't there words hidden in the silence?
translate: 침묵 속에 말이 숨겨져 있지 않았던가?

original: Terrible words!
Hints of secrets no mortal mind was meant to hold
translate: 인간의 마음으로는 감당할 수 없는 비밀의 암시들.

original: The unspoken words seep into your mind like a poison
translate: 말하지 않은 단어들이 독처럼 당신의 마음속으로 스며듭니다.

original: You wince
someone pleads
The time has come for you to unmask!
The words sound strange
Like an echo older than time, doomed to repeat for all eternity
Slowly the Baron turns his masked face towards the speaker
translate: 천천히 남작이 가면 쓴 얼굴을 화자에게 돌립니다.

original: The words that follow are the only ones you could later recall
translate: 이어지는 말들은 나중에 당신이 기억할 수 있는 유일한 말입니다.

original: I WEAR NO MASK
Inhuman howls of terror mix with the gibbering laughter of the insane
translate: 비인간적인 공포의 울부짖음이 미치광이의 횡설수설하는 웃음소리와 뒤섞입니다.

original: Teeth shatter in clenched jaws and eyes are torn from sockets
translate: 꽉 깨문 턱에서 이빨이 부서지고 눈알이 소켓에서 뽑혀 나갑니다.

original: Hair pulled out in great clumps and loved ones claw each other to death
translate: 머리카락이 한 뭉치씩 뜯겨 나가고 사랑하는 이들이 서로를 할퀴어 죽입니다.

original: HE exists now only as the afterimage of an eclipse and then he is gone
translate: 그는 이제 일식의 잔상으로만 존재하다가 사라집니다.

original: Nowhere and everywhere
Like a tide of gnawing eye-less things, madness overwhelms you
You sink to your knees clawing at your skull in a vain attempt to dislodge the terrible words that have taken place there
translate: 당신은 머릿속에 박힌 끔찍한 말들을 빼내려 헛되이 머리통을 쥐어뜯으며 무릎을 꿇습니다.

original: Then, like a ray of light, something cuts through the morass
column3: 한 줄기 빛처럼 무언가가 수렁을 가르고 들어옵니다.

original: A hand on your shoulder
You turn and see
You get up
The only way out is through
Then it strikes you
The terrible crystal revelation that you are, and will forever be, alone
column3: 영원히 혼자일 것이라는 끔찍하고 명징한 계시를.

original: No one is going to save you but yourself
Death may be coming but not now and not like this
You get to your feet and prepare to fight
lorem ipsum
The stage is set, but the play is not yet ready to begin
column3: 연극은 아직 시작될 준비가 되지 않았습니다.

original: Eat!
Revel!
Sitting down, you notice the backdrops for the first time
translate: 자리에 앉자 처음으로 배경막이 눈에 들어옵니다.

original: Camilla’s hauntingly vibrant scene looks at once familiar yet subtly alien
translate: 카밀라의 잊히지 않을 정도로 생생한 풍경은 낯익으면서도 미묘하게 이질적입니다.

original: For a moment, the cloud waves seem to break upon the shore as twin suns set
column3: 두 개의 태양이 지는 해안가에 구름 파도가 부서지는 듯합니다.

original: Watch the play
Driina sits back straight and eyes closed with her hands in her lap
translate: 드리나는 손을 무릎에 얹고 눈을 감은 채 곧게 앉아 있습니다.

original: You see her breathing slowly and deeply
translate: 그녀가 천천히 깊게 숨을 쉬는 것이 보입니다.

original: As you sit down, without opening her eyes, she smiles ever so slightly
column3: 그녀는 눈을 감은 채 아주 희미하게 미소 짓습니다.

original: What a nice surprise
Come, I think it’s about to begin
For the first time, you notice the backdrops
Driina gasps next to you
No doubt in awe of the artwork’s vivid nature
translate: 분명 작품의 생생함에 경외감을 느낀 것이겠죠.

original: Try to hold her hand
Embla sits in deep thought
translate: 엠블라는 깊은 생각에 잠겨 앉아 있습니다.

original: It would appear all the nights revelries were not enough to lighten the burden she carries
translate: 밤새 흥청거리는 축제도 그녀가 짊어진 짐을 덜어주기엔 역부족인 모양입니다.

original: As you sit down she looks up at you and blinks as if waking from a dream
translate: 당신이 앉자 그녀는 당신을 올려다보며 꿈에서 깬 듯 눈을 깜빡입니다.

original: I’m sorry I was lost in thought
But let’s not speak of such things for now
translate: 하지만 지금은 그런 얘기 하지 말아요.

original: Come, let us watch the play
Embla gasps next to you
Iben sits red-faced and smiling with a mug of ale in his hand
translate: 이벤은 맥주잔을 들고 얼굴이 빨개져서 웃고 있습니다.

original: He jovially quips and jests and exchanges toasts as people pass him to find their places
translate: 그는 자리를 찾아 지나가는 사람들과 유쾌하게 농담을 주고받으며 건배를 합니다.

original: His eyes light up when he sees you
I’ve saved you a seat!
Sit and look around
Iben gasps next to you
Try to hold his hand
Kat sits wide-eyed in amazement as she takes in every sight and sound
translate: 캣은 모든 광경과 소리를 담으려는 듯 눈을 동그랗게 뜨고 앉아 있습니다.

original: Rosy cheeks tells you she’s enjoyed her night and she beams up at you as you take the seat next to her
translate: 발그레한 뺨이 오늘 밤을 즐겼음을 말해주고
column3: 당신이 옆에 앉자 그녀가 당신을 보며 활짝 웃습니다.

original: Would you believe this is my first time?
At the theater I mean
I can’t wait for it to begin!
Kat gasps next to you
The hulking man sits arms-crossed and with furrowed brow
translate: 거구의 사내는 팔짱을 끼고 미간을 찌푸린 채 앉아 있습니다.

original: Like a misplaced tool, he looks quite out of place in a theater-crowd
column3: 그는 극장 관중들 사이에서 꽤 어색해 보입니다.

original: As you sit next to him he notices the unspoken question and with a grunt and the hint of a smile he growls
translate: 옆에 앉자 그는 무언의 질문을 알아채고는 툴툴거리는 소리와 함께 희미한 미소를 지으며 으르렁거립니다.

original: I hate crowds
Roland gasps next to you
Take his hand
#FirgolCarnivaleRevel
The song and laughter echoing throughout the courtyard is a testament to the quality of Ari's Cider
translate: 안뜰에 울려 퍼지는 노래와 웃음소리는 아리의 사과주 맛이 일품이라는 증거입니다.

original: You eagerly grab a mug
and drink it alone
The rich flavor of the cider leaves you red-cheeked and light-headed
translate: 사과주의 풍부한 맛에 얼굴이 달아오르고 기분이 들뜹니다.

original: You cannot help but laugh
Loud and uninhibited
You laugh because there is no evil in the world
Or perhaps because there is so much of it and yet, here you stand?
translate: 아니면 악이 너무 많음에도 불구하고 당신이 여기에 서 있기 때문일까요?

original: The table overflows with the treats from Klara’s kitchen
translate: 테이블에는 클라라의 주방에서 나온 음식들이 넘쳐납니다.

original: Your mouth waters as you stand momentarily paralyzed by the abundance of choice
translate: 너무 많은 선택지에 잠시 멍하니 서 있자니 입안에 군침이 돕니다.

original: The urge to partake is almost primal
translate: 먹고 싶은 충동은 거의 본능에 가깝습니다.

original: A sublime piece of stuffed pastry
translate: 속을 채운 숭고한 페이스트리 한 조각

original: Lying there alone, a vibrant platonic ideal, almost beckoning you
Gingerly you pick it up
It’s feather-light
Wolf it down!
Biting into the pastry, its perfect crust yields up the soft crumb-flesh with a satisfying crunch
column3: 완벽한 껍질이 기분 좋은 바삭함과 함께 부드러운 속살을 드러냅니다.

original: The jam-filled interior bursts in your mouth; Apples, sugar, cinnamon - a touch of lemon
translate: 잼으로 가득 찬 속이 입안에서 터집니다. 사과

original: Ecstasy
This is the best stuffed pastry you’ve ever had
translate: 지금껏 먹어본 속을 채운 페이스트리 중 최고입니다.

original: Resplendently attired and with her handmaidens in tow, the baroness emerges from the manor
translate: 화려하게 차려입은 남작부인이 시녀들을 거느리고 저택에서 나옵니다.

original: The music dies down
Beloved guests!
The second act is upon us!
My beloved husband asks that you take your places in front of the stage
translate: 사랑하는 남편이 무대 앞으로 자리를 옮겨달라고 합니다.

original: The time has come for the evening's surprise
translate: 오늘 밤의 깜짝 이벤트 시간이 다가왔거든요.

original: And for all our rosy-cheeked little crumplins there is a special surprise
translate: 그리고 볼이 발그레한 우리 귀여운 꼬마들을 위한 특별한 선물도 있답니다.

original: My lovely ladies and I have prepared a scavenger hunt!
There will be whimsy and prizes and sweets!
The children clap their pudgy hands as they squeal with joy
translate: 아이들이 통통한 고사리손으로 박수를 치며 기뻐 소리를 지릅니다.

original: Is there one among you with the courage to brave the manor and find the treasure within?
translate: 저택을 탐험하고 보물을 찾을 용기 있는 어린이가 있나요?

original: Come one - come all!
The children stream past the baroness into the manor while the adults begin to file towards the rows of benches placed in front of the stage
translate: 아이들은 남작부인을 지나쳐 저택으로 몰려 들어가고
column3: 어른들은 무대 앞에 놓인 벤치로 줄지어 이동하기 시작합니다.

original: It is time for you to take your place
The music filling the air is raw and primal
Its beat is the pulse of something vast waiting to be born
translate: 그 비트는 태어나기를 기다리는 거대한 무언가의 맥박과도 같습니다.

original: The piper at the gates of dawn
translate: 새벽의 문에 선 피리 부는 사나이.

original: It drives you
Carries you
A howl builds inside
You give in to it
Dance like no one’s watching
You sway and leap and whirl to the mesmerizing beat
translate: 당신은 최면을 거는 듯한 비트에 맞춰 흔들고 뛰고 돕니다.

original: For a moment you are one with something
translate: 잠시 동안 당신은 무언가와 하나가 됩니다.

original: With everything or nothing
There really isn't a difference
Stars wheel overhead and by the time the trance ends it takes a moment for you to remember where, or even when, you are
column3: 무아지경이 끝날 때쯤 당신은 자신이 어디에 있는지
column4: 심지어 언제인지 기억하는 데 시간이 걸립니다.

original: #FirgolCassildaScene
A young woman dressed in the manner of a wandering minstrel stands alone looking out across the small lake
translate: 떠돌이 음유시인 차림의 젊은 여자가 홀로 서서 작은 호수를 바라보고 있습니다.

original: She hums softly to herself - stopping and starting over as if trying to think of words for a song
translate: 그녀는 가사를 생각하려는 듯 멈췄다 다시 시작하며 부드럽게 콧노래를 흥얼거립니다.

original: Are you Cass?
The woman blinks in surprise
What, you’ve heard of me then?
Wait, is this about that bar-tab?
As I’ve already told Bernard, I’ll pay him the moment I have the coin on hand
It’s just that I’ve been a bit preoccupied
Cass looks at her feet
Camilla asked me to talk to you
A pained expression falls across her face
Please don’t say she’s angry with me
She's sad you weren't interested in her
Not interested?!
I’m crazy for her
Finding her note made me happier than words can describe
translate: 그녀의 쪽지를 발견했을 때 말로 표현할 수 없을 만큼 기뻤어요.

original: Then why didn't you respond?
Because I couldn’t find the words
Can you believe it?
Me, a bard, at a loss for words!
I’ve been trying to put my feelings into verse
A song
I’m nearly there, but over and over, the words escape me
I don’t understand it
It feels like I’m grasping at tendrils of mist
translate: 마치 안개 자락을 잡으려는 것 같아요.

original: Can I hear what you have so far?
translate: 지금까지 쓴 걸 들어볼 수 있을까요?

original: The song Cass reads to you is sad and beautiful
It brings to mind images of far and wondrous shores
Stranger yet, is the fact that try as you might, you have never been able to recall the first three verses she recounted to you
column3: 아무리 애를 써도 그녀가 들려준 처음 3절은 기억나지 않는다는 사실입니다.

original: Only the first line of the last verse remains
Song of my soul, my voice is dead
That’s exactly it
I can’t get past that
Nor can I change it
It has to be that line!
But what comes next?
It’s like I’m deaf to my own inner voice!
translate: 마치 제 내면의 목소리가 들리지 않는 것 같아요!

original: Cass repeats the line, now with a slight hint of panic in her voice
translate: 캐스는 이제 약간의 공포가 섞인 목소리로 그 구절을 반복합니다.

original: Die thou, unsung, as tears unshed
Cass squeezes your hand and offers a warm but slightly sad smile before walking off
translate: 캐스는 당신의 손을 꼭 잡고 따뜻하지만 조금 슬픈 미소를 지으며 걸어갑니다.

original: You’re left with the note for Camilla
The woman appears lost in thought as she mumbles the verse of some half-composed song to herself over and over
translate: 여자는 반쯤 완성된 노래의 구절을 계속해서 중얼거리며 생각에 잠겨 보입니다.

original: The words flow from your mouth and fits the song like a key fits a lock
translate: 단어들이 당신의 입에서 흘러나와 열쇠가 자물쇠에 맞듯 노래에 딱 들어맞습니다.

original: You spoke more words as well, but like the rest of the song, they too are lost in the void of time
column3: 노래의 나머지 부분처럼 그것들도 시간의 공허 속으로 사라졌습니다.

original: What you do remember however, is Cass scribbling the words down as tears of joy streamed down her face
translate: 하지만 기쁨의 눈물을 흘리며 가사를 받아 적던 캐스의 모습만은 기억에 남습니다.

original: That’s it!
I have it
A song for Camilla
She folds the piece of paper containing the words of the song neatly and writes in beautiful cursive
translate: 그녀는 노래 가사가 적힌 종이를 곱게 접어 아름다운 필기체로 글을 씁니다.

original: To Camilla - From Cassilda
With trembling hands she offers you the folded note
translate: 그녀는 떨리는 손으로 접은 쪽지를 당신에게 건넵니다.

original: Would you do me one last favor
Take this note to Camilla
It will explain everything to her
And please
Would you tell her to come find me at the Carnivale?
Tell her we’ll dance together then
#FirgolCiderMerchantScene
The Baron and Baroness are arranging it!
It’ll have food and drink and even a surprise they say!
If you haven’t already done so, you should go talk to the Baroness and offer to help!
I’m sure she’ll let you attend if you help out
My da’s supplying the drinks, you see!
The boy beams with pride and excitement
A party?
When the Outer Isles flow with blood?
translate: 외곽 군도에 피가 흐르는 이 마당에?

original: Ah, I see
The boy’s eyes water over
I’m sorry I don’t know anything about any blood or any such
column3: 전 피라든가 그런 건 아무것도 몰라요.

original: I’m just looking forward to the party
It’s not often us common folk get to experience something like that
translate: 우리 같은 평민들이 그런 걸 경험할 기회는 흔치 않으니까요.

original: Well the Carnivale of course!
I can’t wait!
They say it’s going to be one for the ages!
My da’ might need a hand!
He’s been a bit flustered about getting his shipment of cider ready for the Carnivale and all
translate: 카니발용 사과주 선적 준비로 좀 정신이 없으시거든요.

original: Something about moles in the orchard
I’m sure you’ll find him in the brewery somewhere
In the warehouse maybe?
I'll go talk to him then!
A smiling young lad with a shock of yellow hair calls out to you
translate: 노란 머리의 웃는 얼굴을 한 소년이 당신을 부릅니다.

original: Greetings traveler!
Can I interest you in some fine Firgol cider?
I promise, you’ll not get it fresher of better anywhere in the Outer Isles!
column3: 외곽 군도 어디서도 이보다 신선하고 좋은 건 못 구할 거예요!

original: Sounds like a local specialty?
It doesn’t get more local than this!
My da’ makes it right here at the family brewery!
translate: 우리 아버지가 여기 가족 양조장에서 직접 만드시거든요!

original: He motions to the buildings behind him
Now what will it be?
Can I interest you in a few bottles?
Perhaps later but I had some questions first!
Can I buy some cider?
What's going on here in Firgol?
translate: 여기 피르골에선 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는 거니?

original: Hi there!
Back for more cider?
#FirgolEnter
As Roland slinks off, Iben walks up to you
translate: 롤랜드가 슬그머니 사라지자 이벤이 당신에게 다가옵니다.

original: Cruel deeds scar those who perform them as much as their victims and Roland is a man with many scars
translate: 잔인한 행위는 피해자만큼이나 가해자에게도 상처를 남기는 법이고

original: As you approach the small cluster of quaint houses you can’t help but be struck by a feeling of calm and peace you’ve not felt in a long time
translate: 작고 고풍스러운 집들이 모여 있는 곳에 다가가자
column3: 오랫동안 느끼지 못했던 평온함과 평화로움에 사로잡히지 않을 수 없습니다.

original: By the grace of the Golden Dead, it would appear a small sliver of life as it once was in the Outer Isles has survived
column3: 외곽 군도의 예전 삶의 작은 조각이 살아남은 것 같군요.

original: Driina says with a sad smile
Ahead on your right, lies a tavern that looks exactly like the kind of tavern where the meals are hearty and the ale cooled just right
column3: 푸짐한 식사와 딱 알맞게 시원한 맥주가 있을 것만 같은 여관이 보입니다.

original: Your stomach growls at the thought
translate: 그 생각에 배에서 꼬르륵 소리가 납니다.

original: Kat stares, mouth agape, first at the tavern and then at you pleadingly
translate: 캣은 입을 딱 벌린 채 여관을 한번 쳐다보고는 당신을 애원하는 눈빛으로 바라봅니다.

original: We’re stopping by there whether you want to or not!
translate: 당신이 원하든 말든 저기는 꼭 들러야 해요!

original: You continue on your way, and for a moment an irrational fear passes over you
Will you be able to return to the cold, brutal world at large if you spend too much time in this quite little piece of bliss?
translate: 이 작고 조용한 행복 속에 너무 오래 머물면
column3: 춥고 잔혹한 바깥세상으로 다시 돌아갈 수 있을까요?

original: Looking around, you notice Roland has fallen behind the group and now stands, seemingly transfixed, a few steps behind you
translate: 주위를 둘러보니 롤랜드가 일행 뒤로 처져서
column3: 넋을 잃은 듯 몇 걸음 뒤에 서 있는 게 보입니다.

original: What's wrong Roland?
Is it a trap?
No time to linger
He blinks a few times with watery eyes and an expression that is hard to place
translate: 그는 물기 어린 눈으로 몇 번 눈을 깜빡이며 알 수 없는 표정을 짓습니다.

original: Families
Children
Feeling homesick?
He looks down and for a moment you could have sworn he looks ashamed
Let's just get some bloody ale
His voice breaks in a way that is uncharacteristic for the laconic brute
#FirgolGeneralGoodsScene
Ask about Firgol
Ask about Help
Show me your goods!
Something about Firgol
More about Firgol
Finally the last part about Firgol
Something about Help
More about Help
Finally the last part about Help
#FirgolInnCookScene
Their line has ruled over Firgol for a long time
translate: 그들 가문은 오랫동안 피르골을 다스려 왔어요.

original: They live in the villa north-west of the village
Just across the stream
I’m sure the Baroness would appreciate it if you called upon her
She’s eccentric but she means well - loves the children of the village
translate: 괴짜시긴 하지만 본심은 착하신 분이에요. 마을 아이들을 정말 예뻐하시거든요.

original: I had some other things I wanted to ask you
In fact, the Baroness told me to ask if you needed help!
Well, the Carnivale is nigh, right?
That means plenty of extra work for me but the thing is, there’s still the inn to take care of!
Who’s going to cook for the guest, you know?
Well, the Baroness told me to ask if you needed help!
The Carnivale is the time to feast and drink and dance
It’s the Baron and the Baroness’ way of showing their love for us common folk
translate: 남작님과 남작부인께서 우리 평민들에게 사랑을 베푸시는 방식이죠.

original: Baron and the Baroness?
Besides the Carnivale?
Nothing - and that's just the way we prefer!
translate: 아무것도 없어요. 우린 그게 더 좋고요!

original: Really?
Nothing?
Idra was nearly overrun by Reavers and Horryn was all but sacked!
translate: 이드라는 리버들에게 거의 점령당했고 호린은 쑥대밭이 됐는데도요!

original: Well, I ain’t seen no ‘Reavers’ here and if I do, I’ll be sure to show them the back of my hand!
column3: 여긴 '리버' 같은 건 코빼기도 안 보였고

original: Let's talk about something else
A woman bustles about the kitchen, stirring pots, adding spices and tending fires
translate: 한 여자가 주방을 분주하게 오가며 냄비를 젓고

original: I beg your pardon, but I’m not really in any position to talk right now!
Why so busy?
Please, I just had a few questions!
Well, come to think of it, there is actually something you could help me with
Name it!
See, the Baroness has asked me to prepare something special for the children of the feast
translate: 남작부인께서 축제에 온 아이들을 위해 특별한 걸 준비해 달라고 하셨거든요.

original: My famed honey cakes
Only problem is, I’m still waiting on the honey
translate: 문제는 아직 꿀을 못 받았다는 거예요.

original: Perhaps you could be a dear and run over to the beehives and fetch it for me?
translate: 혹시 양봉장에 가서 꿀 좀 받아와 주실 수 있나요?

original: Will any honey do?
It needs to be honey from our own hives
There’s nothing quite like it
And where do I find these beehives?
The bee-hives lie to the west of the village
Just cross the bridge and continue straight ahead and you’ll see them on your left-hand side eventually
translate: 다리를 건너서 쭉 가다 보면 왼쪽 편에 보일 거예요.

original: I think even a single honeycomb should do it!
See if you can’t find Pert the beekeeper
He’ll help you
But how will I avoid getting stung?
translate: 하지만 벌에 쏘이지 않으려면 어떻게 하죠?

original: Klara chuckles a heart laugh and slaps her knee
Oh I wouldn’t worry about that!
We wouldn’t want the children to not get their honey-cakes!
translate: 아이들이 꿀 케이크를 못 먹게 할 순 없잖아요!

original: I'll do my best!
Will you be able to return to the cold, brutal world at large if you spend too much time in this quite little piece of bliss?
translate: 이 작고 조용한 행복 속에 너무 오래 머물면
column3: 춥고 잔혹한 바깥세상으로 다시 돌아갈 수 있을까요?

original: Just cross the bridge and continue straight ahead until you see them on your left-hand side
translate: 다리를 건너서 왼쪽 편에 보일 때까지 쭉 가세요.

original: Look at these honey-combs!
Have you ever seen honey this golden?
translate: 이렇게 황금빛인 꿀을 본 적 있나요?

original: The children will love this
Oh, the Baroness is going to be so pleased
Now, the cakes are for the children but I’ll tell you what
I baked one too many apple-pies for the feast
translate: 축제용으로 사과 파이를 하나 더 구웠거든요.

original: It’s yours if you want it
Klara winks at you and hands you a fresh apple pie
translate: 클라라가 윙크하며 갓 구운 사과 파이를 건네줍니다.

original: Now, off you go!
I have the honey!
Go on then!
Can you teach me a few recipes?
translate: 조리법 몇 개만 알려주실 수 있나요?

original: What's going on in Firgol?
Want to learn how to cook eh?
Well I can’t blame you
Nothing soothes the soul like a home-cooked meal
Have a look in my recipe-book
I’ll teach you for a few coins per recipe!
Browse Recipes
Klara rushes back and forth, red-faced and sweating but with movements that seem so choreographed and intentional that she appears more like a dancer than a cook
translate: 클라라는 얼굴이 빨개져 땀을 흘리며 이리저리 뛰어다니지만
column3: 그 움직임이 너무나 잘 짜여 있고 의도적인 것 같아 요리사라기보단 무용수처럼 보입니다.

original: You are truly watching a master at work here
translate: 진정한 장인의 솜씨를 보고 있는 것입니다.

original: Let's talk for a bit!
#FirgolManorEnter
The scene before you is one of utter insanity
translate: 눈앞의 광경은 그야말로 광기 그 자체입니다.

original: The Baroness presides over it with a look of exhausted contentment on her face
translate: 남작부인은 지쳤지만 만족스러운 표정으로 그 광경을 지휘하고 있습니다.

original: I’m so glad to see you here
The great work is nearly done and I couldn’t have done it without you
translate: 위대한 과업이 거의 끝났어요. 당신 없이는 해내지 못했을 거예요.

original: It’s only fitting you should be here at the finale
translate: 피날레에 당신이 함께하는 건 당연한 일이죠.

original: She produces a long dagger from her sleeve
Put down the dagger!
Beyond hope and reason you see that the children are still alive - albeit paralyzed in some kind of trance
translate: 희망도 이성도 사라진 상황에서 아이들은 아직 살아있습니다. 비록 어떤 최면 상태에 빠져 마비된 상태지만요.

original: The Baroness begins laughing but the sound morphs into a wailing cry of sorrow and anger
translate: 남작부인은 웃기 시작하지만 그 소리는 슬픔과 분노의 통곡으로 바뀝니다.

original: They are mine now!
Why shouldn’t I have one as well!
translate: 왜 나만 아이를 가질 수 없는 거야!

original: Every fucking cow with a cunt in the village can squeeze one out SO WHY CAN’T I?!
translate: 마을의 씹어먹을 암소 같은 년들도 다 새끼를 까는데 왜 나는 안 되는 거야?!

original: She screams and lunges for the nearest child
translate: 그녀는 비명을 지르며 가장 가까이 있는 아이에게 달려듭니다.

original: #FirgolManorFinal
Sitting in silent majesty upon the throne, is the desiccated corpse of what must have been the Baron of Firgol
translate: 왕좌에 침묵의 위엄을 갖추고 앉아 있는 것은 피르골 남작이었을 말라비틀어진 시체입니다.

original: Tattered, yellow robes hang loosely from the body and around the head, a thin crown of ivy has grown
translate: 누더기가 된 노란 로브가 몸에 헐렁하게 걸쳐져 있고
column3: 머리 주위에는 얇은 담쟁이덩굴 왕관이 자라나 있습니다.

original: A king out of time
Though similar, this figure cannot be the one that performed that horrid play
column3: 이 형상은 그 끔찍한 연극을 공연했던 인물일 리가 없습니다.

original: And even as you stand here, the memory of it has begun to fade
Like a dream upon waking, you are left wondering if it even happened at all
No matter, there is nothing more here for you now
translate: 상관없습니다. 이제 여기엔 당신을 위한 것이 아무것도 없으니까요.

original: Only bones dust
You turn to leave
For a moment you imagine that you hear the flapping of tattered robes, but then it passes
translate: 잠시 누더기 로브가 펄럭이는 소리를 들은 것 같지만

original: #FirgolMoleBurrow
You dig the shovel into the soft soil and easily collapse the burrow
translate: 삽을 부드러운 흙에 박아 넣어 굴을 쉽게 무너뜨립니다.

original: After a few strokes however, the shovel-head comes up coated in dark blood
You root through the soil and to your disgust find numerous, small, hairless blobs of flesh that have been hacked to death by the shovel’s action
translate: 흙을 파헤쳐 보니 역겹게도 털 없는 작은 살덩이들이 삽질에 난자당해 죽어 있습니다.

original: You can’t properly identify the strange things, nor do you want to, and quickly cover up the gruesome scene with dirt before moving along
translate: 그 기괴한 것들의 정체를 제대로 알 수도
column3: 알고 싶지도 않기에 서둘러 끔찍한 현장을 흙으로 덮고 자리를 뜹니다.

original: More carefully this time, you set to work collapsing the second tunnel
translate: 이번에는 좀 더 조심스럽게 두 번째 굴을 무너뜨리는 작업을 시작합니다.

original: The work progresses nicely until suddenly the earth shifts slightly as if something is moving underneath
translate: 작업은 순조롭게 진행되다가 갑자기 땅 밑에서 무언가 움직이는 듯 흙이 살짝 들썩입니다.

original: Whatever it is, it grabs onto the shovel blade and tugs violently at it!
You yank back with all your might and manage to free the shovel from whatever lurks under the dirt
translate: 온 힘을 다해 뒤로 잡아당겨 흙 속에 숨어 있는 무언가로부터 간신히 삽을 빼냅니다.

original: Swinging wildly, you pummel the ground and walk away hoping you’ve seen the last of whatever lurks underneath this orchard
translate: 미친 듯이 삽을 휘둘러 땅을 두들겨 패고는
column3: 이 과수원 밑에 도사린 것이 무엇이든 다시는 보지 않기를 바라며 자리를 뜹니다.

original: Arriving at the third hole you feel an unease grow in your stomach
translate: 세 번째 구멍에 도착하자 뱃속에서 불안감이 피어오릅니다.

original: Carefully, you bend down and try to peer into the small, dark burrow
translate: 조심스럽게 몸을 굽혀 작고 어두운 굴 안을 들여다보려 합니다.

original: To your horror, something glances back
A pair of eyes that appear far too intelligent than an animal has any right to be
translate: 짐승이라고 하기엔 너무나 지적으로 보이는 두 눈.

original: Then, in an instance they are gone - retreated underground
translate: 그리고 순식간에 그것들은 사라집니다. 땅속으로 물러난 것입니다.

original: Perhaps your mind is playing tricks on you?
You decide to not wait and find out and with a slight hint of panic, you utterly demolish the hole
column3: 약간의 공황 상태에 빠져 구멍을 완전히 메워버립니다.

original: Your task is done and you should return to Ari
You come across a freshly dug hole in the ground
Dig out the burrow
#FirgolQuestOver
As you leave the grounds of the accursed manor, your head spins and nausea overcomes you
translate: 저주받은 저택을 나서자 머리가 빙빙 돌고 구역질이 밀려옵니다.

original: The things you have seen linger in your mind like the after-images of some alien sun burned into your eyes
translate: 목격한 것들이 마치 이계의 태양에 눈이 타버린 잔상처럼 머릿속에 맴돕니다.

original: Try as you might you will neither be able to exorcize the memories, nor ever make sense of them
translate: 아무리 애를 써도 그 기억들을 지울 수도

original: Embla puts her hand on your shoulder
Are you alright?
Somewhere, Kat alternates between crying and retching
I don't think I'll be 'alright' ever again
I suspect none of us ever will
translate: 우리 중 누구도 그러지 못할 것 같아요.

original: The Dragon spreads its poison unto all the things it touches
translate: 용은 자신이 닿는 모든 것에 독을 퍼뜨리니까요.

original: There is nowhere safe
Not even this tiny little village
Now more than ever, I am certain that the only way forward is to the very heart of darkness
translate: 이제 그 어느 때보다 확실해졌어요. 앞으로 나아가는 유일한 길은 어둠의 심장부로 향하는 것뿐이라는 걸요.

original: To Gradla and the Black Priory
Embla helps you up
Indeed it would seem there is no going back
translate: 정말이지 되돌아갈 길은 없는 것 같군요.

original: #FirgolWeaverScene
A young maiden stands looking at a pile of white canvas cloth
translate: 젊은 처녀가 흰 캔버스 천 더미를 바라보며 서 있습니다.

original: She sighs deeply and appears to be lost in deep thought
translate: 그녀는 깊은 한숨을 쉬며 깊은 생각에 잠겨 있는 듯합니다.

original: Is something wrong?
Oh, I didn’t see you there
I’m sorry if I seem rude but I’d rather just be left alone
translate: 무례하게 보였다면 죄송하지만 혼자 있고 싶어서요.

original: She offers a weak but apologetic smile
Camilla’s eyes tear up
I’m
I’m so ashamed
The Baroness was so kind to think of me for making the backdrops for their ‘surprise’
translate: 남작부인께서 그 '깜짝쇼'의 배경막 제작을 저에게 맡겨주실 정도로 친절하셨는데

original: I thought I could do it
I have the canvases and everything
All she asked was that I paint her a ‘wondrous vista’
But I can’t bring myself to make the first stroke
Why not?
Camilla blushes
I'm lost
My head, My heart
There’s a girl, Cass, and I have… feelings for her
It was from a distance but I felt like there was something there
translate: 멀리서였지만 뭔가 통하는 게 있다고 느꼈어요.

original: Me being me, I didn’t have the nerve to go talk to her
column3: 가서 말을 걸 용기가 안 났죠.

original: Instead I left a note for her explaining my feelings
translate: 대신 제 마음을 적은 쪽지를 남겼어요.

original: And then?
Nothing at all
Oh, I’m such an oaf
I write like a pig - How could I ever think my stupid note could sway someone like Cass
translate: 글씨도 엉망인데 어떻게 그 멍청한 쪽지로 캐스 같은 사람의 마음을 움직일 수 있다고 생각했는지.

original: Tears stream down Camilla’s face
She has such a way with words
A bard, she is
And me?
I’m just simple, plain, and common
translate: 전 그냥 단순하고 평범하고 흔해빠진 사람인걸요.

original: What if I talked to Cass for you?
translate: 내가 대신 캐스와 얘기해 보면 어떨까요?

original: You would do that for me?
I suppose it would let me know one way or another
But please, try to be subtle about it
Don’t let her know I’m besides myself thinking about her
translate: 제가 그녀 생각에 정신이 없다는 건 모르게 해주세요.

original: She draws in a deep breath and her mood appears to lift ever so slightly
translate: 그녀는 심호흡을 하고 기분이 아주 조금 나아진 듯합니다.

original: Cass is a free spirit and she loves the water
I’d look for her along the small creek that runs west of here
translate: 여기서 서쪽으로 흐르는 작은 개울가를 찾아보세요.

original: Thank you so much for offering to help
I'll return when I have news
Well, since you offered to help I would really appreciate it if you talked to Cass for me
translate: 도와주신다고 했으니 캐스와 얘기해 주시면 정말 감사하겠습니다.

original: I need to know if she got my note and what her feelings are for me
Just look for her along the creek west of the village
Camilla goes pale
What… what did she say?
She doesn’t fancy me, right?
I just know it!
She asked me to give you this
She accepts the note and slowly unfolds it
As she consumes the song, line by line, her eyes water and her hands tremble
translate: 노래를 한 줄 한 줄 읽어 내려가면서 그녀의 눈가가 촉촉해지고 손이 떨립니다.

original: By the end, she has to tear her eyes away from it
translate: 끝에 다다르자 그녀는 눈을 떼지 못합니다.

original: Such words
I’ve never read such words
Was there more?
Did she say anything?
She told me she wanted to dance with you at the Carnivale
Camilla covers her mouth, smiling through tears of joy
translate: 카밀라는 입을 가린 채 기쁨의 눈물을 흘리며 미소 짓습니다.

original: She then blinks a few times as if remembering something
translate: 그러다 무언가 기억난 듯 눈을 몇 번 깜빡입니다.

original: The backdrops for the Baroness!
I see it so clearly now
Cass’ song
Oh, this will be amazing!
Glad I could help!
And now, if you’ll excuse me, I have to get to work
I’d rather you not see the result until at the Carnivale
translate: 결과물은 카니발 때까지 안 보셨으면 좋겠어요.

original: It’ll be more impressive that way!
Camilla smiles a secretive smile and grabs a ream of canvas and a pot of paint before hastily walking off
translate: 카밀라는 비밀스러운 미소를 지으며 캔버스 한 뭉치와 페인트통을 챙겨 급히 걸어갑니다.

original: What about the quest?
I've talked to Cass
Hello again
Camilla smiles timidly
Oh, I’ve said too much
The Baroness made me promise not to tell
Please, you need to ask her if you want to know more
Not that it matters in any case
I’m getting nowhere with this
She motions to the reams of canvas
And why is that?
# Chapter_4_Overland
#GradlaSpotted
Land ho!
sounds the cry from the crows nest
Iago offers you a spyglass
There!
Fogbanks to the north
Try as you might you will neither be able to exorcise the memories, nor ever make sense of them
translate: 아무리 애를 써도 그 기억들을 지울 수도

original: If I remember correctly the coastline is littered with underwater reefs and dangerous to navigate
translate: 제 기억이 맞다면 해안선은 암초 투성이라 항해하기 위험해요.

original: I fear we cannot follow it without being forced into deeper waters and within grasp of the Behemoth
translate: 그걸 피하려고 깊은 물로 들어갔다간 베헤모스에게 잡힐까 두렵군요.

original: Embla, what now?
Embla closes her eyes for a moment as if recalling some distant memory
translate: 엠블라는 먼 기억을 떠올리려는 듯 잠시 눈을 감습니다.

original: The Priory lies on the plateau of the mountain chain that dominates Gradla’s inland
translate: 수도원은 그라들라 내륙을 지배하는 산맥의 고원에 있어요.

original: As far as I know, the Cabal expedition landed at a small mining-village called Adler’s Helm and proceeded from there
translate: 제가 알기로 카발 원정대는 아들러의 헬름이라는 작은 광산 마을에 상륙해서 그곳에서 출발했어요.

original: Iago, what do you recommend?
Iago carefully scans the emerging shoreline
I suspect we will not be able to reach Adler’s Helm without exposing ourselves to the dangers of the high seas
translate: 먼 바다의 위험에 노출되지 않고는 아들러의 헬름에 닿을 수 없을 것 같소.

original: If you are to reach the village, you must land on the southern shore and then travel overland
translate: 마을에 가려면 남쪽 해안에 상륙해서 육로로 이동해야 하오.

original: Let's make landfall!
#GradlaSpottedVulcano
Ahead, a volcanic peaks of mount Karaban rises steeply
translate: 전방에 카라반 산의 화산 봉우리가 가파르게 솟아 있습니다.

original: It lies there like some giant of titanic proportions that is thankfully still asleep
translate: 마치 거대한 거인이 다행히도 아직 잠들어 있는 것처럼 놓여 있습니다.

original: If it were to awaken however
You shudder at the thought, thankful that your journey takes you in a different direction
column3: 여정이 다른 방향으로 이어진다는 사실에 감사해합니다.

original: #OverlandEnterBadland
Katabatic winds howl through the valley
To the north, great snow-covered peaks loom over you like the ramparts of some great, cosmic fortress
translate: 북쪽에는 눈 덮인 거대한 봉우리들이 마치 우주의 거대한 요새 성벽처럼 당신 위로 솟아 있습니다.

original: Embla leans in and shouts over the wind
translate: 엠블라가 몸을 기울여 바람 소리를 뚫고 소리칩니다.

original: These are the interior mountains!
We must find a way to ascend them to reach the plateau and the Priory!
translate: 고원과 수도원에 가려면 산을 오를 방법을 찾아야 해요!

original: And we'll find that in Adler's Helm?
translate: 아들러의 헬름에 가면 찾을 수 있겠지?

original: All I know is that the Cabal expedition traveled there, and that means we must too
translate: 제가 아는 건 카발 원정대가 거기로 갔다는 거고

original: I’m sure once we get there, the way will somehow reveal itself
translate: 거기 도착하면 어떻게든 길이 보일 거예요.

original: That's a lot to hope for
For now, let’s just try to get there in one piece
From what I understand, Adler’s Helm lies somewhere near the north-eastern parts of this mountain-range
translate: 제가 알기로 아들러의 헬름은 이 산맥의 북동쪽 어딘가에 있어요.

original: If we follow its circumference, I believe we’ll eventually arrive there
translate: 둘레를 따라가다 보면 결국 도착할 거예요.

original: # Chapter_4_Priory
#PrioryCaveAncientRoom
Like the tons of stone that presses down from above, so does this chamber convey the weight of untold eons
column3: 이 방은 헤아릴 수 없는 영겁의 무게를 전달합니다.

original: Rows of embalmed corpses line the wall, sitting in perfect stillness with empty eye-sockets that stare into eternity
translate: 방부 처리된 시체들이 벽을 따라 줄지어 완벽한 정적 속에 앉아
column3: 텅 빈 눈구멍으로 영원을 응시하고 있습니다.

original: How long have they been here?
These men and women came here to worship long before the first stone of the Empire was laid
translate: 이 남녀들은 제국의 첫 초석이 놓이기 훨씬 전부터 예배를 드리러 이곳에 왔습니다.

original: Their corpses were already ancient when Gallian landed on Erdahn’s shores
translate: 갈리안이 에르단 해안에 상륙했을 때 그들의 시체는 이미 고대 유물이었죠.

original: A strange thought occurs to you
These corpses are ‘dreaming’
Waiting and dreaming
Waiting on what?
They… are ‘dreaming’
You turn and realize it was Kat who spoke
translate: 고개를 돌려보니 말한 사람이 캣이라는 걸 깨닫습니다.

original: She looks surprised
I don’t know why I said that
translate: 내가 왜 그런 말을 했는지 모르겠어요.

original: The thought just came to me!
But, they ARE dreaming
Sharing the Sleeper’s dream
Waiting for him to return to them
Where are these thoughts coming from?!
translate: 도대체 이런 생각은 어디서 오는 거야?!

original: Can we please leave?
Yes, let's move
#PrioryCaveBossFight
The strange construct rises menacingly above you
translate: 기이한 구조물이 당신 위로 위협적으로 솟아 있습니다.

original: As you approach, the fungal growths that cling to it writhe in greedy anticipation - clawing impotently at the portal set into the structure’s side
translate: 다가가자 구조물에 달라붙은 곰팡이 덩어리들이 탐욕스러운 기대로 꿈틀거리며
column3: 구조물 측면에 있는 포털을 향해 무기력하게 발톱을 세웁니다.

original: You cannot easily discern the material used in its construction nor the hands that made it beyond the fact that there is an aspect about it that makes you think of the artifacts that the Magi sometimes employ
translate: 마기들이 가끔 사용하는 유물을 떠올리게 한다는 점 외에는
column3: 어떤 재료로 만들어졌는지 누가 만들었는지 쉽게 알아낼 수 없습니다.

original: Now, its outer skin is pockmarked and weathered by the shifting of stone over endless millennia
translate: 지금 그 표면은 끝없는 수천 년의 세월 동안 돌의 이동으로 인해 곰보 자국이 나고 풍화되었습니다.

original: For the briefest moment you see it in your mind's eye, free of stone, moving over a landscape of jagged mountains and jungle-clad hills
translate: 아주 짧은 순간 마음의 눈으로 봅니다. 돌에서 벗어나 뾰족한 산과 정글로 덮인 언덕 위를 움직이는 그것을.

original: Great ferns sway in the humid breeze, and in the distance you see great, singing towers
A sudden tremor shakes you out of it
This one more violent than the previous ones
As you reel from the quake, Embla walks past you, moving towards the portal with her hand outstretched like a sleepwalker
column3: 엠블라가 몽유병 환자처럼 손을 뻗은 채 당신을 지나쳐 포털로 향합니다.

original: The air hums with energy that appears to be emanating from the portal itself
translate: 포털 자체에서 뿜어져 나오는 듯한 에너지로 공기가 웅웅거립니다.

original: The fungal tentacles begin to thrash wildly in anticipation
translate: 곰팡이 촉수들이 기대감에 미친 듯이 요동치기 시작합니다.

original: The tremors return, more powerful now, and around you stones fall from the cave’s roof
Embla, wait!
She does not hear you and before you can grab her, she has touched the door
column3: 당신이 붙잡기도 전에 문에 손을 댑니다.

original: The effect is instant
Strangely shaped glyphs set into the portal begin to glow with a light so bright it’s nearly blinding
translate: 포털에 새겨진 기이한 문양들이 눈이 멀 정도로 밝은 빛을 내기 시작합니다.

original: An undulating vibration that you feel in your bones rises and echoes through the cave and for a moment it sounds as if someone, or something is howling madly
translate: 뼈 속까지 느껴지는 진동이 동굴에 울려 퍼지고
column4: 혹은 무언가가 미친 듯이 울부짖는 소리처럼 들립니다.

original: Then sudden silence
What was
Before you can finish your sentence, the ground again shakes violently, knocking you to the ground
translate: 말을 끝내기도 전에 땅이 다시 격렬하게 흔들려 당신을 바닥에 쓰러뜨립니다.

original: Rocks and debris explode outwards from the center of the cave and an inhuman roar so loud it causes your ears to bleed emits from the horror that emerges into the cave
translate: 동굴 중앙에서 바위와 파편이 폭발하듯 튀어나오고
column3: 동굴로 나타난 공포스러운 존재가 귀에서 피가 날 정도로 큰 비인간적인 포효를 내지릅니다.

original: Bursting forth from the depths below, it towers above you
translate: 깊은 곳에서 튀어나온 그것은 당신 위로 솟구칩니다.

original: A squirming mass of untold millions of strands of fungal growths animated into a gigantic, mawed worm-horror
translate: 수백만 가닥의 곰팡이 덩어리가 꿈틀거리는 거대한 입 달린 벌레 괴물로 살아났습니다.

original: Tentacles thrash wildly with enough force to break rock as the abomination claws its way out of the emergence hole and towards you
translate: 그 흉물은 구멍에서 기어 나와 당신을 향해 바위를 부술 듯한 힘으로 촉수를 마구 휘두릅니다.

original: Embedded into its roiling half-flesh are the forms and faces of men
translate: 요동치는 반쪽짜리 살덩어리 속에는 인간의 형상과 얼굴들이 박혀 있습니다.

original: You know with certainty that these are indeed the final members of the Cabal expedition
translate: 당신은 이것들이 카발 원정대의 마지막 멤버들임을 확신합니다.

original: Stagger to your feet
The creature lumbers towards you, emitting yet another terrible scream
translate: 괴물은 또다시 끔찍한 비명을 지르며 당신을 향해 쿵쿵거리고 다가옵니다.

original: Your heart sinks as you set to receive the charge
translate: 공격을 받아내려 준비하자 가슴이 철렁 내려앉습니다.

original: From around you echoes dozens of replies as its smaller siblings are called forth to the feast
translate: 주변에서 작은 형제들이 잔치에 초대받은 듯 수십 개의 응답 소리가 메아리칩니다.

original: #PrioryCaveSpottedShip
The cave expands into a vast chamber littered by the remains of what you deem to be the final resting-place of the Cabal expedition to the Black Priory
translate: 동굴은 검은 수도원으로 향했던 카발 원정대의 최후 안식처로 보이는 유해들이 널려 있는 거대한 방으로 확장됩니다.

original: Large quantities of stone and dirt have been shifted in what appears like an attempt to excavate… what?
translate: 엄청난 양의 돌과 흙이 옮겨져 있는데
column3: 무언가를 발굴하려 했던 것 같습니다... 대체 무엇을?

original: Your eyes strain in an attempt to make sense of the structure partially protruding from the rock
translate: 바위에서 부분적으로 튀어나온 구조물을 이해하려고 눈을 가늘게 뜹니다.

original: Your mind reels at the thought that whatever this is, it must have been placed here thousands, nay, hundreds of thousands of years ago
column3: 아니 수십만 년 전에 이곳에 놓였을 거란 생각에 정신이 아득해집니다.

original: What’s more, despite seeing just a small segment of the structure, you feel certain that whatever is buried here is vast
translate: 게다가, 구조물의 아주 일부만 보았음에도 불구하고 여기에 묻혀 있는 것이 거대하다는 확신이 든다.

original: We’re here!
We’ve made it!
All these years, this is what was buried under the Priory
translate: 이 오랜 세월 동안 수도원 아래 묻혀 있던 게 이거였어.

original: This is where the Sleeper awaits!
Emblas voice trembles like a prisoner who senses that freedom is finally within reach
translate: 엠블라의 목소리는 마침내 자유가 눈앞에 있음을 감지한 죄수처럼 떨린다.

original: T-this thing
It cannot exist
It should not!
Who can build something like this?
translate: 누가 이런 걸 지을 수 있지?

original: Driina’s voice is the closest to panic you’ve ever heard her
translate: 드리나의 목소리는 당신이 들어본 것 중 가장 공포에 질려 있다.

original: This is the very heart of madness itself
Roland whispers to himself
The sleeper awaits
#PrioryDreamChamber
I think the monks came down here to commune with him using those machines
translate: 수도사들이 저 기계들을 사용해서 그와 교감하러 내려온 것 같아.

original: Dreaming his dreams
You walk over to the shaft and peer down it
There is no end in sight
Whatever lies at the bottom, lies far below this level of the catacombs
translate: 바닥에 무엇이 있든, 이 지하 묘지 층보다 훨씬 아래에 있다.

original: The octagonal room has four throne-like machines arranged around a central aperture
translate: 팔각형 방에는 중앙 구멍 주위에 왕좌 같은 기계 네 개가 배치되어 있다.

original: Thick, squirming tentacles spew forth from the shaft, and you can’t help but wonder where it terminates
translate: 두껍고 꿈틀거리는 촉수가 구멍에서 뿜어져 나오고, 그 끝이 어디인지 궁금해하지 않을 수 없다.

original: A strange humming can be felt, rather than heard, coming from the center of the room
translate: 방 중앙에서 이상한 웅웅거림이 들리기보다는 느껴진다.

original: Examine the machines
Though no doubt some form of arcane machinery, it’s beyond your ken and you feel loath to examine it further
translate: 어떤 형태의 신비한 기계임은 분명하지만, 당신의 지식을 넘어서고 더 이상 조사하고 싶지 않은 마음이 든다.

original: Leaning in, you examine the indentation further and notice inlays of pure sylver radiating out from where the user’s skull would be
translate: 몸을 기울여 홈을 자세히 살펴보니 사용자의 두개골이 놓일 위치에서 순은 상감이 뻗어 나가는 것을 발견한다.

original: You follow the inlays, and find that they seem to converge towards the room’s central shaft
translate: 상감을 따라가 보니 방의 중앙 수직 통로를 향해 모이는 것 같다.

original: Intricately wrought in a complex design that appears more like machinery than decoration, each throne has an indentation that would accommodate a human figure
translate: 장식보다는 기계처럼 보이는 복잡한 디자인으로 정교하게 만들어진 각 왕좌에는 사람의 몸에 맞는 홈이 파여 있다.
