# GenericScenes
#BedRest
The prospect of resting in a proper bed is a rare treat for a mercenary travelling the roads so you should think twice before passing up on it
translate: 제대로 된 침대에서 쉬는 건 길을 떠도는 용병에게 드문 호사니 포기하기 전에 다시 한번 생각해 봐야 한다.

original: Make Camp
#DELUXEMerchantScene
An old man looks you carefully up and down as if evaluating some farm animal
translate: 노인이 가축을 평가하듯 당신을 위아래로 꼼꼼히 훑어본다.

original: You find him somewhat unnerving
Decrepit as he appears, there is nonetheless some unnatural vitality upon him
translate: 노쇠해 보이지만, 어딘가 부자연스러운 활력이 느껴진다.

original: Magic no doubt
What are you doing?
Why, I’m examining you
There is something about you
A sheen of sorts
Something in your past - or perhaps your future?
I cannot tell
That is indeed the question” the man answers obtusely
translate: 그게 바로 문제지. 남자가 뚱딴지같이 대답한다.

original: He squints and strokes his beard as if trying to remember some long lost memory
translate: 그는 잊어버린 기억을 떠올리려는 듯 눈을 가늘게 뜨고 수염을 쓰다듬는다.

original: You may call me Malachai
I am a purveyor of sorts
Say, you strike me as one who might be on the lookout for exotic ware?
translate: 보아하니, 이국적인 물건을 찾고 있는 것 같은데?

original: Ask about Trade
The fated one returns
What will they ask of old Malachai, I wonder
Feast your eyes on my selection of wondrous items
#DemoOver
End of the Demo
You’ve reached the end of the demo for now!
Feel free to continue exploring the starting area and please take the time to wishlist our game on your preferred platform!
Thank you so much for playing and keep supporting this project
It truly is a labor of love for all of us!
Anders
# NPC
#Dog
The dog sniffs at you expectantly
translate: 개가 기대에 찬 눈빛으로 냄새를 맡는다.

original: Pet the dog
It happily wags its tail as you pet it
translate: 쓰다듬어 주자 기분 좋게 꼬리를 흔든다.

original: # PartyMembers
#NPCRoland
Hrm?
What do you want!
# Shrines
#ShrineAgility
A pilgrim's shrine
Driina answers as she thoughtfully strokes the ancient masonry
translate: 드리나가 고대 석조물을 생각에 잠겨 쓰다듬으며 대답한다.

original: There are a number of these spread throughout the Outer Isles
translate: 외곽 제도 곳곳에 이런 게 꽤 있어요.

original: Pilgrims would come from throughout the Empire to pray at them
translate: 제국 전역에서 순례자들이 와서 기도를 올리곤 했죠.

original: It is said to bring good luck and clarity
But you have not visited them?
I’m a Sepulchite
My order is not required to do pilgrimages and I’ve had little time to wander in my time here
column3: 여기 있는 동안 돌아다닐 시간도 별로 없었거든요.

original: That being said, it would give me great joy to be able to visit all the shrines one day
translate: 그렇긴 해도, 언젠가 모든 성소를 방문할 수 있다면 정말 기쁠 거예요.

original: Travelling north along the coast, you notice a young man standing at the side of the road
translate: 해안을 따라 북쪽으로 이동하다가 길가에 서 있는 한 청년을 발견한다.

original: We might still find some there
translate: 거기서 몇 명 찾을 수 있을지도 몰라요.

original: Perhaps they could teach us the proper prayers and rituals to perform at these sites?
translate: 그들이 이 성소에서 행하는 올바른 기도와 의식을 가르쳐 줄 수 있지 않을까요?

original: Yes let's keep an eye out for them
An ancient, weathered Imperial way-shrine stands before you
translate: 오래되고 풍화된 제국 길가 성소가 눈앞에 있다.

original: Despite its remote location you suspect it still sees occasional use
translate: 외딴곳에 있지만 여전히 가끔 사용되는 것 같다.

original: Pray at the shrine
Driina, what is this?
Examine the shrine
You are a bit rusty on your Imperial religious history and have no clue as to the way-shrine’s purpose
translate: 제국 종교사에 대한 지식이 좀 녹슬어서 이 길가 성소의 용도가 무엇인지 전혀 알 수 없다.

original: This is one of several pilgrim sites in the Outer Isles
translate: 이것은 외곽 제도에 있는 여러 순례지 중 하나다.

original: It is said that to pray at them offers wholeness of body and clarity of mind
translate: 이곳에서 기도하면 신체의 온전함과 정신의 명료함을 얻을 수 있다고 한다.

original: However, you have no idea of the proper prayers and rituals to perform
translate: 하지만 어떤 기도와 의식을 행해야 하는지 전혀 모른다.

original: Perhaps there are pilgrims in the region for you to ask?
translate: 이 지역에 물어볼 만한 순례자가 있지 않을까?

original: You kneel by the way-shrine and begin to recite the pilgrim’s prayer
translate: 길가 성소 옆에 무릎을 꿇고 순례자의 기도를 읊기 시작한다.

original: You successfully complete the ritual
